Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_attribute_bonus_Des: Improves all attributes per point spent
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_attribute_b: Improves all attributes per point spent
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_fountain_glyph_Desc: Grant your structures and lane creeps invincibility for 6 seconds. Refreshed if a first-tier tower falls.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_fountain_buyback_De: Respawns your hero immediately, for a price.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_radar_Description: Scans a targeted 900 AoE for 8 seconds. Indicates whether there are enemy heroes in that area during the 8 seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_turbo_courier_invu: The courier fears not your spells.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_backdoor_protection: Structure takes reduced damage, and quickly regenerates any damage taken while no enemy creeps are nearby.
Structure takes reduced damage, and quickly regenerates any damage taken while no enemy creeps are nearby.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_filler_ability_Desc: Generates an aura that provides increased health and mana regeneration to nearby allies when activated.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_filler_ability_Note: Right click the Shrine to activate.
Regeneration values increase by +2/1 health/mana per minute.
Additionally restores 2% health/mana pool per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_courier_go_to_secre: Sends the courier to your team's secret shop
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_courier_shield_Desc: Summons a protective shield around the courier
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_courier_burst_Descr: The courier gains a burst of speed for %duration% seconds
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necronomicon_warrio: Mana burned per hit, a portion of which is dealt as damage.
Deals damage to the unit that kills the Necronomicon Warrior.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necronomicon_archer: Launches an arrow that burns away the targeted unit's mana, dealing damage equal to the amount of mana burned.
Removes positive buffs from enemies and slow their movement speed.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_mana_break: Burns an opponent's mana on each attack and deals damage equal to a percentage of the mana burnt. Enemies with no mana left are temporarily slowed.
A modified technique of the Turstarkuri monks' peaceful ways is to turn magical energies on their owner.
Mana Break has %illusion_percentage%%% effect if caused by illusions.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_blink_Desc: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_blink_Lore: In his encounter with the Dead Gods, Anti-Mage learned the value of being elusive.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_blink_Note: You can use Blink to dodge incoming projectiles.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_spell_shie: Increases Anti-Mage's resistance to magic damage.
Years of meditation and obsession with revenge have hardened Anti-Mage's skin against mystical opponents.
Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_counterspe: Passively grants magic resistance. Counterspell may be activated to create an anti-magic shell around Anti-Mage that blocks and sends any targeted spells back towards enemies instead.
Counterspell passively grants an aura that reduces enemy spell damage. The reduction is stronger in close range.
With the proper focus, Anti-Mage turns innate resistance into calculated retaliation.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_mana_void_: For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies.  The main target is also mini-stunned.
After bringing enemies to their knees, Anti-Mage punishes them for their use of the arcane arts.
Damage is calculated based on the primary target's mana, but applied to all enemies within the area of effect.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_mana_overl: Blinks an illusion at the target enemy or location and attack for a brief time. Counterspell is replicated on the Blink Fragment illusion. Has 3 Charges.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_mana_focus: Anti-Mage creates an aura of anti-magic, making enemy spells more expensive and gaining Mana Break Charges every time an enemy casts a spell. Passively grants Anti-Mage attack speed the more Mana Break Charges he has.
After bringing enemies to their knees, Anti-Mage punishes them for their use of the arcane arts.
While Focused, Anti-Mage can hold twice as many Mana Break Charges
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_antimage_countersp: Causes all spells that target you to be blocked and reflected onto the enemy.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_antimage_mana_void: Ability Cooldown Increased due to Mana Void.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_antimage_dampen_ma: Close proximity to Anti-Mage is amplifying the effect of Spell Weakness.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_queenofpain_shadow_: Hurls a poisoned dagger which deals large initial damage, and then deals damage over time. The poisoned unit has its movement speed slowed for %duration% seconds.  An instance of damage is dealt every %damage_interval% seconds. Queen of Pain relishes in the pain inflicted, healing every time the enemy takes damage. Creeps heal for half the damage only.
Akasha's envenomed dagger allows her to delight in the drawn out suffering of her victims.
The affected unit slowly regains its original movement speed every second during the duration.
Units afflicted by Shadow Strike can be denied by their allies when their HP drops below 25% of their maximum health.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_queenofpain_blink_D: Short distance teleportation that allows Queen of Pain to move in and out of combat.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_queenofpain_blink_s: Releases a sonic boom when Queen of Pain blinks, at both her starting and ending locations. Deals %shard_damage% damage in a %shard_aoe% AoE and silences the target for %shard_duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_queenofpain_blink_L: The Secret Queen lives up to her title, making her pain impossible to escape.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_queenofpain_blink_N: You can use Blink to dodge incoming projectiles.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_queenofpain_scream_: The Queen of Pain lets loose a piercing scream around her, damaging nearby enemies.
The sultry voice of Akasha beckons her opponents while stealing their souls.
Scream Of Pain will hit invisible units.
Scream Of Pain cannot be disjointed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_queenofpain_sonic_w: Creates a gigantic wave of sound in front of Queen of Pain, dealing heavy damage to all enemy units in its wake and pushing them back.
Her most exquisite of all of torments, Akasha's Sonic Wave puts her poor foes out of their misery.
Sonic Wave can hit units up to 1150 units away.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_queenofpain_shadow: Taking periodic damage and moving %fMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% slower.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_dragon_slave_D: Lina channels the breath of a dragon, sending out a wave of fire that scorches every enemy in its path.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_dragon_slave_L: In the scorched barren of Misrule, Lina learned to manipulate the fiery breath of the Desert Wyrm as a form of entertainment.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_dragon_slave_N: Dragon Slave can hit units up to 1225 units away.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_light_strike_a: Summons a column of flames that damages and stuns enemies.
Lina's essence allows her to focus the sun's energies, causing air to combust at will.
Light Strike Array will destroy trees in its area of effect.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_fiery_soul_Des: Grants bonus attack and movement speed each time Lina hits an enemy with a spell. Stacks with itself. Lasts %fiery_soul_stack_duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_fiery_soul_sha: Lina's spells deal %shard_bonus_spell_damage% more damage for each Fiery Soul Charge.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_fiery_soul_Lor: Dancing flames embody Lina's playful nature, bringing out her true blazing self.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_fiery_soul_Not: Duration refreshes each time an opponent is hit with a spell.
Using items does not trigger Fiery Soul.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_laguna_blade_D: Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_laguna_blade_L: The air around Lina becomes so intensely torrid that it scorches a foe that comes too close with white-hot lightning.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_laguna_blade_N: Laguna Blade has a %damage_delay% delay before the damage is applied after the spell is cast, allowing certain abilities to avoid the damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_laguna_blade_s: Increases Laguna Blade's cast range by 250 and causes it to go the full cast length and hit all units along the way. Can be ground targeted. Additionally reduces Laguna Blade Mana Cost by 100
Changes Laguna Blade's damage type to Pure, and allows it to slice through spell immunity.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lina_fiery_soul_De: Attack Speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% and Movement Speed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lina_laguna_blade_: About to be blasted by elemental energy.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_arrow_Descri: Fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision, which stuns and damages the first enemy unit it strikes. The stun duration ranges from %arrow_min_stun% to %arrow_max_stun% seconds, with bonus damage up to %arrow_bonus_damage% added, based on the distance the arrow travels to its target. Instantly kills the first non-ancient creep it hits.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_arrow_scepte: Causes Sacred Arrow to release a Starstorm on enemies along the travel path of the primary arrow, releasing a second Starstorm that deals less damage to the impacted unit.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_arrow_Lore: Lunar energies make the Princess of the Moon's arrows more deadly than most.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_arrow_Note0: For every 150 distance the arrow travels, the stun duration upon impact increases by 0.5 seconds, and the bonus damage added increases by 14.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_arrow_Note1: Sacred Arrow can hit invisible units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_invis_Descri: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible and grants bonus movement speed. If a hero is revealed, invisibility will restore after the fade delay as long as Moonlight Shadow's duration has not expired.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_invis_Lore: Her tenure with Selemene allows Mirana to eclipse the ground, wrapping her allies in a cloak of shadows.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_invis_Note0: Units affected will not auto attack enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_invis_Note1: Spell Immune allies will be affected.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_leap_Descrip: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering herself with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts %leap_bonus_duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_leap_shard_d: Upon landing, launches a projectile along Sagan's leap path, dealing damage and slowing units affected.  Grants %shard_bonus_charges% bonus charge(s).
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_leap_Lore: None can fail to recognize Mirana's iconic white beast in the heat of battle.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_starfall_Des: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. The closest enemy unit to Mirana in a %starfall_secondary_radius% radius will be struck a second time for %secondary_starfall_damage_percent%%% of the damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_starfall_Lor: The Goddess breaks the strata to empower her Princess in the time of need.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_starfall_Not: Starstorm is not blocked by Linken's Sphere.
Starstorm will choose a new target for the second star if the first died before impact.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_mirana_leap_charge: Number of charges left on Leap.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_mirana_leap_buff_D: Movement speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, attack speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_mirana_starfall_sc: Starstorm can automatically cast when charged.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_stealer_rage_D: Launch into a maddened rage, becoming Spell Immune, and gaining increased movement speed.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_stealer_rage_L: The madness and brutality of N'aix makes him a vicious and unrelenting foe in combat.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_stealer_rage_N: Upon casting, many buffs and debuffs will be removed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_stealer_feast_: Lifestealer's attacks deal damage and provide heal for a percentage of his target's max health.
After escaping from his cell in Devarque, N'aix subsisted on flesh and bones of those unfortunate to cross his path.
The heal is independent of the damage.
Stacks additively with other sources of Lifesteal.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_stealer_ghoul_: Passively causes Lifestealer's attacks to significantly slow enemy movement speed for %duration% seconds. Grants you Attack Speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_stealer_open_w: Lifestealer rends an enemy unit, slowing the victim's movement speed and allowing all allies to regain health for a percentage of the damage they deal to that unit. All damage dealt will steal life, including damage from spells. The victim recovers movement speed over the duration. Deals 2% of the target's max health per attack on the target from real heroes. After receiving %damage_threshold% damage, the Open Wounds fester and spread to a non-infected random enemy within %spread_radius% radius.
Fresh wounds and the scent of blood often draw out the scavengers to finish the job.
Open Wounds slows over 8 different steps: 50% / 50% / 40% / 30% / 20% / 10% / 10% / 10%, with the slow decreasing one step per second.
Stacks additively with other sources of Lifesteal.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_stealer_infest: With this infestation, N'aix consumes the life blood of the host, restoring him back to full unholy power.

Lifestealer infests the body of a target unit, becoming undetectable, and healing for a portion of his max hitpoints every second while inside. He can then explode from the host body, dealing damage to nearby enemies. If the infested unit is an enemy creep or a neutral creep, he can take control of the unit's ability to move and attack. Does not work on enemy heroes.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
If the infested unit dies before Lifestealer consumes it, no health is gained.
Lifestealer gains experience while under the effects of Infest.
Creeps that are controlled while Infested share Lifestealer's movement speed.
Infest Level 2 and 3 can be used on Ancient creeps.
Increases cast range and reduces cooldown.  Infest may target enemy heroes for a short duration, disarming them and attacking them from the inside while increasing Lifestealer's regeneration rate.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_stealer_contro: Lifestealer seizes control of the host body's nervous system, allowing him to issue movement and attack orders from within.  Controlled units share Lifestealer's movement speed.  Cannot be used on heroes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_stealer_consum: Lifestealer eats the host body from the inside out, exploding from within.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_stealer_assimi: Lifestealer swallows an allied hero, allowing them to hide within him. Any healing Lifestealer receives is shared with the hero within. When an assimilated hero leaves Lifestealer, they erupt outward, damaging nearby enemies.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
How can Lifestealer resist the chance to sample an ally?
Ejects an Assimilated hero, damaging nearby enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_life_stealer_infes: You are infested by an enemy hero.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_life_stealer_rage_: Gained attack speed, spell immunity, and 100% resistant to magic damage type.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_life_stealer_assim: Hiding within Lifestealer. Any healing Lifestealer receives is shared.\n\nMoving, casting an ability, or clicking on this icon will cause you to erupt from Lifestealer and damage nearby enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_sprout_Descr: Sprouts a ring of trees around a unit, trapping it in place, and providing vision in a %vision_range% radius.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_sprout_shard: Causes the first two trees destroyed with Sprout to summon Greater Treants. Can only have two Greater Treants alive.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_sprout_Lore: Verdant overgrowth is a common ailment reported by Nature's Prophet's attackers.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_sprout_Note0: Sprout can be cast on any unit, or the ground.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_sprout_Note1: Trees created by Sprout have the same interactions with abilities as regular trees.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_sprout_abili: Shard: Greater Treants only spawn if you have drafted Nature's Call.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_teleportatio: Teleports to any point on the map.
The Prophet keeps his sentinel over the forest, protecting it when in need.
Mana and cooldown take effect when the cast is completed.  Nature's Prophet will not use any mana or waste the cooldown if the spell is interrupted while casting.
When the cast begins, an effect is created at the target location, which is visible to allies and enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_force_of_nat: Converts an area of trees into Treants under the command of Nature's Prophet.
Verodicia bestowed the Prophet with the ability to summon the Treant Guard, a mythical sentient army of the wild.
Nature's Call can only create as many treants as there are trees in the target area.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_wrath_of_nat: Damaging energy bounces around the map, striking enemies close to the cast point that are in vision. Each enemy hit beyond the first adds damage. Enemies that die under this spell grant you bonus damage for %kill_damage_duration% seconds.
Lowers cooldown to %scepter_cooldown%s. Entangles all enemies it hits. Duration scales from %scepter_min_entangle_duration%s up to %scepter_max_entangle_duration%s seconds at max bounce.
Nature's Prophet calls Verodicia's fury to strike down those who might ravage the wilderness.
Wrath of Nature will not hit units out of vision.
Can be cast through the minimap; the nearest valid target will be selected.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_greater_spro: Creates a larger circle of trees in a 300 AoE for %duration% seconds. Ensnares enemies inside for 2 seconds, dealing 150 damage per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_furion_wrathofnatu: Will spawn a treant if killed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_windrunner_focusfir: Windranger channels the wind to gain %bonus_attack_speed% additional attack speed against a single enemy unit or structure, though with a reduction to her attack damage.  Extra damage from secondary item effects is not reduced.
Lyralei's ability to bombard opponents with a flurry of arrows is unparalleled - even at the expense of accuracy.
Issuing a Hold Position command will pause Windranger's attacks.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_windrunner_powersho: Windranger charges her bow for up to %abilitychanneltime% second for a single powerful shot, which deals more damage the longer it is charged. The arrow damages enemies along its path. For each enemy that Powershot hits, its damage is reduced.
During her early years of training, Lyralei learned to fire powerful arrows that cleaved even trees to reach their targets.
Powershot will destroy trees in its area of effect.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_windrunner_shackles: Shackles the target to an enemy unit or tree in a line directly behind it.  If no unit or tree is present, the stun duration is reduced to %fail_stun_duration%.
Windranger's variety of bow skills includes an arrow with thick ropes attached to encumber any escaping target.
This spell can shackle two enemies together, stunning them both.
Can shackle the target to an enemy unit or tree at most %shackle_distance% behind the target.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_windrunner_windrun_: Increases movement speed and adds evasion from all physical attacks, while slowing movement of nearby enemies.
Windrun's enemy debuff has increased slow, blinds enemies, and is undispellable.
Lyralei enchants gusts of winds to fight incoming attacks.
Activating Windrun will evade incoming projectiles.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_windrunner_shackle: Bound by thick ropes from Windranger's ensnaring arrow.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_windrunner_windrun: Movement speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and evading all physical attacks
Gusts of wind around Windranger reduce your movement speed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%
Unseen but for the hindering gust in your wake.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_windrunner_focusfi: Constantly attacking with greatly increased attack speed and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_DAMAGEOUTGOING_PERCENTAGE%%% reduced damage
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_windrunner_gale_for: At last Lyralei has learned to call upon the might of her true birthright.

Summons a strong wind that pushes all enemies in the target area towards the target direction. Vector Targeted. Cast Range: %abilitycastrange% Mana Cost: %abilitymanacost% Cooldown: %abilitycooldown%s.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lion_impale_Descrip: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lion_impale_Lore: The Demon Witch exercises his demonic covenant, opening a fissure from hell.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lion_impale_Note0: The spikes move at %speed% units per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lion_voodoo_Descrip: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless beast, with all special abilities disabled.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lion_voodoo_Lore: Lion is compelled to share his transfiguration, twisting the essence of those who oppose him.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lion_voodoo_Note1: The target will have a base movement speed of %movespeed%, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lion_mana_drain_Des: CHANNELED - Absorbs the magical energies of a target enemy unit by taking mana from it every second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lion_mana_drain_sha: Causes Mana Drain to affect up to %shard_bonus_targets% additional enemies and gets +%shard_bonus_break_distance% additional break distance. Lion becomes Spell Immune while channeling.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lion_mana_drain_Lor: Lesser magi are nothing more than a source of magical restoration for the Demon Witch.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lion_mana_drain_Not: Instantly destroys illusions and prevents heroes from going invisible.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lion_finger_of_deat: Rips at an enemy unit, trying to turn it inside-out. Deals massive damage and grows stronger with each life it consumes.
Increases damage. Decreases cooldown. Finger of Death hits all units in a small area.
Lion's disfigured hand is also the source of his greatest power, capable of flooding victims with malefic force.
Finger of Death has a %damage_delay% delay before the damage is applied after the spell is cast, allowing certain abilities to avoid the damage.
Finger of Death only gains damage if the enemy hero dies within %grace_period% seconds of being affected by Finger of Death.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lion_voodoo_Descri: You are a frog.  You cannot attack or cast spells.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lion_finger_of_dea: About to be ripped apart by magical forces.
If killed, the hero will permanently increase Finger of Death's power.
Finger of Death gaining +%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% bonus damage.
Finger of Death gained +40 bonus damage per kill.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_vengefulspirit_magi: Fires a magic missile at an enemy unit, stunning and dealing damage.
Bounces once on an enemy, prioritizing heroes. Increases Cast Range by %shard_bonus_cast_range%.
A simple Skywrath technique, the magic missile is Shendel's primary tool for vengeance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_vengefulspirit_wave: Vengeful Spirit lets loose a wicked cry, weakening the armor of enemies and giving vision of the path ahead.
Shendel's haunting voice hints at her approaching vindication.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_vengefulspirit_comm: Vengeful Spirit's presence increases the damage of nearby friendly heroes.

Upon death, creates a strong illusion of Vengeful Spirit that deals and takes full damage and can cast all of her spells. Illusion has %scepter_illusion_ms_bonus_pct%%% movement speed bonus. If the illusion is alive when Vengeful Spirit respawn, she will take its place. XP earned by her illusion is given to her.
Although they may not share her undying passion for revenge, allies do draw on her fanaticism in combat.
Vengeance Illusion keeps providing the Vengeance Aura after Vengeful Spirit's death.
Strong Illusions are not instantly killed by spells.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_vengefulspirit_neth: Instantaneously swaps positions with a target Hero, friend or enemy.  Nether Swap interrupts channeling abilities on the target. Enemy Swapped units take %damage% damage Allied swapped units receive less damage for a short duration
Martyrdom is a small price to pay for vengeance.
Trees near Vengeful Spirit and the target will be destroyed when the spell is cast.
Channeling spells are interrupted by Nether Swap.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_witch_doctor_paraly: Launches a cask of paralyzing powder that ricochets between enemy units, stunning and damaging those it hits. Each bounce deals more damage than the previous one. Deals %creep_damage_pct%%% damage to creeps.
The Witch Doctor recycles the bones of fallen friends and foes, using the powder as part of his arsenal of charms and alchemy.
Targets can be hit multiple times, as long as another unit is struck in between the bounces.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_witch_doctor_voodoo: Witch Doctor focuses his magic to heal nearby allied units, costing Witch Doctor mana every second Voodoo Restoration is active.
Zharvakko's hocus pocus is not limited only to hexxing his opponents and is quite adept at curing ailments.
Healing is done in %heal_interval% second intervals.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_witch_doctor_maledi: Curses all enemy Heroes in a small area, causing them to take a set amount of damage each second, as well as bursts of damage every 4 seconds based on how much health they have lost since the curse began.
Certain voodoo magics can make an enemy regret engaging the Witch Doctor.
If an affected hero's health has increased above the amount they had when Maledict was cast, the burst damage will be 0.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_witch_doctor_death_: CHANNELED - Summons a deadly ward to attack enemy heroes within its attack range. Lasts a maximum of %abilitychanneltime% seconds.
Death Ward attacks have True Strike and bounce between nearby enemies.
Witch Doctor performs a ritualistic dance, one that haunts the dreams of those who live to recount it.
The Death Ward is invulnerable, and is only destroyed if Witch Doctor is interrupted or its duration expires.
The Death Ward can be controlled, and made to attack a specific target.
Death Ward attacks once every 0.22 seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_witch_doctor_voodoo: Turns Witch Doctor into a Death Ward briefly with reduced attack speed. He is hidden during this time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_voodoo_restoration: The Witch Doctor be healing you!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_maledict_Descripti: Cursed. Taking damage over time, and taking bonus damage every 4 seconds based on HP lost since the beginning of the curse.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_leshrac_split_earth: Splits the earth under enemies. Deals damage and stuns for a short duration.

Causes Split Earth to repeat in the same location %shard_max_count% additional times, with a %shard_secondary_delay% second delay between each one. Each time the radius increases by %shard_radius_increase%. Split Earth echo location is visible to both teams.
Twisting nature to his vile will, the shifting earth consumes those unlucky enough to cross Leshrac's path.
Split Earth will destroy trees in its area of effect.
There is a %delay% second delay before the effect is applied.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_leshrac_diabolic_ed: Saturates the area around Leshrac with magical explosions that deal pure damage to enemy units and structures.  The fewer units available to attack, the more damage those units will take. Lasts %abilityduration% seconds.
Chronoptic energy bursts from one plane to the other, evaporating anything it touches.
The explosions will continue even if Leshrac is killed.
Can damage buildings, Spell Immune units, and invisible units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_leshrac_lightning_s: Summons a lightning storm that blasts the target enemy unit, then strikes any nearby enemy units. Struck enemies are slowed.
The Tormented Soul's mastery of the elements is evident in the massive storms that strike down armies before him.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_leshrac_greater_lig: Causes Leshrac and all nearby enemies to turn ethereal, preventing them from attacking, slowing them, and making them take more magic damage. Increases Leshrac's speed rather than reducing it. Does not cause Leshrac to take amplified damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_leshrac_pulse_nova_: Creates waves of damaging energy around Leshrac, one per second, to damage nearby enemy units. Drains Leshrac's mana with each pulse.
If necessary, the Tormented Soul can manipulate space time itself, ravaging lesser beings.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_leshrac_pulse_nova: Inflicting Damage to nearby enemy units
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_leshrac_diabolic_e: Inflicting Damage to nearby enemy units
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_leshrac_decrepify_: Slowing movement by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and increasing spell damage by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_DECREPIFY_UNIQUE%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_juggernaut_blade_fu: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units. \n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
Increases movement speed during Blade Fury, and attacks random nearby enemy units with reduced damage.
Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.
You can use items during Blade Fury.
Juggernaut can still perform attacks while in Blade Fury. However, only units that are not affected by Blade Fury, such as wards or structures, will take damage from these attacks.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_juggernaut_healing_: Summons a Healing Ward which heals all nearby allied units, based on their max health.  The Healing Ward moves at %healing_ward_movespeed_tooltip% movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts %abilityduration% seconds.
Of the rituals learned at the Isle of Masks, tending wounds with a bit of voodoo magic has proven to be quite useful.
The Healing Ward can be controlled.
Multiple Healing Wards do not stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_juggernaut_blade_da: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal critical damage on each attack.
The last remnant of his heritage's commitment to bladework, Yurnero ensures that the style is remembered.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_juggernaut_omni_sla: Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy units, and then slashes the target and other nearby enemy units at an increased attack rate. Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.
'The fruits of discipline; with practice comes strength.'
You can use items during Omnislash.
Omnislash applies a basic dispel to Juggernaut on cast.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_juggernaut_swift_sl: Performs a short Omnislash for %duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_juggernaut_blade_f: Providing spell immunity and dealing damage every second
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_juggernaut_omnisla: Invulnerable. Attacking enemy units in an area.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_meat_hook_Des: Launches a bloody hook toward a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge, killing it if it's a non-ancient creep and dealing damage if it is an enemy otherwise.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_meat_hook_Lor: The Butcher's hook is a symbolic nightmare, its curved blade a frightening reminder of his slaughterous intent.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_meat_hook_Not: Interrupts channeling spells of the primary target if it's an enemy.
Meat Hook can go through trees, cliffs, buildings, ancient units and Roshan.
Meat Hook can drag friendly units, but they won't be damaged.
Meat Hook can hit and drag runes to Pudge, refunding the Hook's mana cost.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_rot_Descripti: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_rot_scepter_d: Increases Rot radius and damage, and causes it to reduce enemy health regen.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_rot_Lore: A foul odor precedes a toxic, choking gas, emanating from the Butcher's putrid, ever-swelling mass.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_rot_Note2: If Pudge is silenced, he can't deactivate Rot if it's activated.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_flesh_heap_De: Gives Pudge a guaranteed damage block against all types of attack. Passively grants bonus strength that increases each time Pudge kills an enemy Hero or it dies in his vicinity.  Flesh Heap is retroactive, meaning it can gain charges before it is skilled, which then become active.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_flesh_heap_Lo: The Butcher gives new meaning to the words 'meat shield.'
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_dismember_Des: CHANNELED - Pudge chows down on an enemy unit, disabling it and dealing damage over time. Pudge gets healed for the same amount he damages. Lasts longer on creeps.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_dismember_sha: Decreases cooldown, and allows targeting an ally with bonus cast range to swallow them and heal them for a percentage of their max health per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_dismember_Lor: 'When I'm through with these vermin, they'll be fit for a pie!'
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_dismember_Not: If a unit becomes invisible while Dismembered, it will still be under the effects of Dismember.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_swallow_Descr: Swallow an allied hero inside of you.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_eject_Descrip: Ejects the swallowed allied hero inside of you.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_pudge_rot_Descript: Causes damage to every fighter in a radius every second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_pudge_flesh_heap_D: Gives Pudge bonus strength that increases each time Pudge kills an enemy Hero or it dies in his vicinity.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_pudge_swallow_Desc: Swallowed an allied hero, healing them.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_pudge_swallow_hide: Swallowed by pudge and regenerating %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_PERCENTAGE%%% health per second. Issue a command to eject.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bane_enfeeble_Descr: Lowers the enemy's total attack damage, cast range, and regeneration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bane_enfeeble_Lore: Each tendril of fear that Atropos weaves increases the vulnerability of his victims to arcane and unknown arts.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bane_brain_sap_Desc: Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, healing Bane and dealing damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bane_brain_sap_Lore: Atropos finds no greater pleasure than to harvest the fear he creates.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bane_brain_sap_shar: Causes Brain Sap to become a %shard_radius% AoE spell. Secondary targets only heal for %shard_secondary_target_heal_pct%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bane_nightmare_abil: Hero that drafts Nightmare can continue to attack nightmared units. Bane can also attack even if he didn't draft this ability.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bane_nightmare_Desc: Puts the target enemy or friendly Hero to sleep. Sleeping units are awakened when damaged. If the target was directly attacked, the Nightmare passes to the attacking unit. Bane can attack nightmared targets freely. Enemy Units take Pure Damage Per Second while in Nightmare.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bane_nightmare_Lore: A stolen prowess from the goddess Nyctasha is to put his prey into forever sleep.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bane_nightmare_Note: In the first second of Nightmare, the unit is invulnerable.
Bane can wake himself from Nightmare.
On cast, replaced with Nightmare End: Ends all ongoing Nightmares on any affected units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bane_fiends_grip_De: CHANNELED - Grips an enemy unit, disabling it and causing heavy damage over time, while stealing mana every %fiend_grip_tick_interval% seconds based on the unit's maximum mana.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bane_fiends_grip_sc: Reduces Fiend's Grip cooldown by %bonus_AbilityCooldown%. Fiend's Grip now creates two uncontrollable illusions that are also channeling Fiend's Grip on the target. Illusions take %scepter_incoming_illusion_damage%%% incoming damage and immediately die if they are interrupted. Damage does not stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bane_fiends_grip_Lo: Victims of Atropos are frequently torn apart by vivid conjurations of their own nightmares.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bane_fiends_grip_No: Fiend's Grip will disable and drain mana from Spell Immune units, but not damage them.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_bane_enfeeble_effe: Attack damage reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_DAMAGEOUTGOING_PERCENTAGE%%%, cast range reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_CAST_RANGE_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, and regeneration reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEAL_AMPLIFY_PERCENTAGE_TARGET%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_bane_fiends_grip_D: Disabled and taking damage. Losing %fMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP%%% of max mana per %fMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earthshaker_fissure: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, creating an impassable ridge of stone while stunning and damaging enemy units along its line.
The Nishian totem splits the world to its core with tectonic force.
Creeps will wait for Fissure to disappear. They will not attempt to walk around it.
Fissure is not blocked by Linken's Sphere.
Reduces Fissure cooldown and allows Earthshaker to walk on it. When he casts any ability, an Aftershock is released along its path that stuns for a shortened duration.
Requires drafting Aftershock for Shard upgrade to work.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earthshaker_enchant: Enchant Totem becomes a ground target ability, causing Earthshaker to jump in the air and land at the target spot, casting Enchant Totem there.  Self-casting the ability will behave in the original form, without jumping. Grants Enchant Totem a cleaving attack.
Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage and have %bonus_attack_range% bonus attack range on the next attack.
Raigor's gorilla strength can destroy mountains.
Bonus damage is based on base damage and that given by primary attribute.
Self-cast with Scepter will make it behave in the non-Scepter form, without jumping.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earthshaker_aftersh: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.
The earth trembles beneath the mighty footsteps of Raigor.
Using items does not trigger Aftershock.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earthshaker_echo_sl: Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units.  Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units. Real heroes cause two echoes.
Tectonic plates crack, mountains fold, and foes are crushed by the Echo Slam.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_earthshaker_enchan: Next attack will deal %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_BASEDAMAGEOUTGOING_PERCENTAGE%%% increased damage
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sandking_burrowstri: Sand King burrows into the ground and tunnels forward, damaging and stunning enemy units above him as he resurfaces.
Adds Caustic Finale poison to heroes hit by Sand King's Burrowstrike and increases its cast range. Does not apply Caustic Finale to illusions.
Crixalis often lies in wait, burrowing under the surface to ambush his adversaries.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sandking_sand_storm: Sand King creates a fearsome sandstorm that damages enemy units while hiding him from vision.  The effect ends when Sand King leaves the area.
Some say Crixalis is a mirage; his carapace appearing then vanishing between the whirling sands of the Scintillant Waste.
Sand Storm can be used to dodge projectiles.
Sand King briefly becomes visible upon attacking or using spells while in Sand Storm. Sand King will become invisible again in %fade_delay% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sandking_caustic_fi: Sand King's attacks inject a venom that causes enemy units to move more slowly and to violently explode when it dies.
An injection from Crixalis makes one brittle and as dry as the arid wastes, subject to implosive demise.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sandking_epicenter_: After a cast point of %abilitycastpoint% seconds, Sand King sends a disturbance into the earth, causing it to shudder violently. All enemies caught within range will take damage and become slowed. Each subsequent pulse increases the radius of damage dealt.
Increases Epicenter Pulse damage, and every %shard_move_distance% units moved causes a small single Epicenter Pulse around Sand King.
Many an explorer was lost to the quicksands of the Scintillant Waste.
The pulses are centered on Sand King, not where he first casted the spell.
The pulses have gradually inreasing radius, ranging from 500 to 725.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_sandking_sand_stor: Turns you invisible and applies %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% damage every second to nearby units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_sand_king_caustic_: Injected with venom from Sand King's attacks. You will explode on death, dealing radius damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_sand_king_epicente: Sending a disturbance into the earth, deals damage and slows in a radius
Movement speed slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%. Attack speed slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_sandking_sand_stor: Movement speed slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, and outgoing attacks have a %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MISS_PERCENTAGE%%% chance to miss.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_shadowraz: Shadow Fiend razes the ground directly in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack.
Stack duration refreshes on stack gain.

Shadow Fiend razes the ground a short distance away from him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack.
Shadowraze has 3 charges and uses the mid-range Shadowraze.
Stack duration refreshes on stack gain.

Shadow Fiend razes the ground a longer distance away from him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack.
Stack duration refreshes on stack gain.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_necromast: Shadow Fiend steals the soul from units he kills, gaining bonus damage. On death, he releases 40% of them from bondage.
Shadow Fiend gains an extra soul per kill. Shadow Fiend can consume a soul per attack to deal critical damage and fear the target.  CD: %abilitycooldown%.
Harvested souls swirl in and out of the Abysm, empowering the Shadow Fiend to increase the size of his collection.
Denies and neutral creeps also provide bonus damage through Necromastery.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_dark_lord: Shadow Fiend's presence reduces the armor of nearby enemies.
Lowers nearby enemy magic resistance by 14%%.
Even being near Nevermore eats away at one's soul.
Stacks fully with other armor reduction abilities and aura.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_requiem_D:
Shadow Fiend gathers his captured souls to release them as lines of demonic energy. Units near Shadow Fiend when the souls are released can be damaged by several lines of energy. Any unit damaged by Requiem of Souls will be feared and have its movement speed and magic resistance reduced for %requiem_slow_duration% seconds for each line hit up to a maximum of %requiem_slow_duration_max%. Lines of energy are created for every soul captured through Necromastery.

Requiem of Souls is automatically cast whenever Shadow Fiend dies, regardless of its cooldown.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_requiem_s: Causes Requiem of Souls to return back to Shadow Fiend. The wave back to Shadow Fiend deals less damage, but heals Shadow Fiend for all the damage it dealt.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_requiem_L: The captured souls of those past slain are released to ravage their former allies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_requiem_N: One line is generated from Shadow Fiend for every %requiem_soul_conversion% souls in his possession, for a maximum of 18 lines (23 lines with Scepter).
The movement reductions from Requiem of Souls go through spell immunity.
Fear and movement slow do not apply when if the Requiem was released on death.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_nevermore_necromas: Stored souls granting an additional %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PREATTACK_BONUS_DAMAGE% bonus damage.
Shadow Fiend can consume 1 souls per attack to deal a 190% damage crit. Enemy kills grant an extra soul. CD: 3s.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_nevermore_presence: Shadow Fiend's presence reduces your armor by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_nevermore_requiem_: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, damage reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_BASEDAMAGEOUTGOING_PERCENTAGE%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_nevermore_shadowra: Receiving %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% bonus damage from each Shadowraze attack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sven_storm_bolt_Des: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units in a small area around the target.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sven_storm_bolt_sce: Increases cast range and transports Sven along the Storm Hammer. Storm Hammer also applies a basic dispel on the target.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sven_storm_bolt_Lor: The Rogue Knight's iron gauntlet, taken from the school of his father, strikes his foes to their core.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sven_great_cleave_D: Sven strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with his attack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sven_great_cleave_L: The Vigil Knights still seek to reclaim the stolen Outcast Blade from Sven, a weapon capable of cutting wide swaths through lesser warriors.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sven_great_cleave_N: Cleave damage goes through spell immunity.
The cleave damages a circular area in front of Sven.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sven_warcry_shard_d: Warcry is now undispellable and passively grants armor to all allies near Sven.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sven_warcry_Descrip: Sven's Warcry heartens his allied heroes for battle, increasing their armor and movement speed. Lasts %duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sven_warcry_Lore: Calling a few lines from the Vigil Codex fortifies Sven's obedience to his rogue code. So poetic!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sven_gods_strength_: Sven channels his rogue strength, granting bonus damage for %abilityduration% seconds.
With the strength that shattered the Sacred Helm, the Rogue Knight stands unopposed in melee combat.
The bonus damage is based on base damage and the primary attribute of Sven.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_sven_warcry_Descri: Armor increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS%. Movement speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_assassin_st: Throws a dagger slowing the enemy unit's movement speed, dealing %base_damage%+%attack_factor_tooltip%%% of Phantom Assassin's attack damage as physical damage and applying attack effects from items and abilities.
If an attack effect is chance-based, the chance of its application will be the same as its chance to occur.
Spell-immune enemies are not affected by Stifling Dagger's slow.
The first skill learned by the Sisters of the Veil often signals an incoming hit.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_assassin_ph: Teleports to a unit, friendly or enemy, and grants bonus attack speed while attacking if it's an enemy unit.
Mortred's silken veil is the last thing her unfortunate target sees.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_assassin_bl: Phantom Assassin focuses inward, increasing her ability to evade enemy attacks. Can be activated to blur her body, causing her to be impossible to see until near enemy heroes.\n\nStacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
Causes Blur to have instant cast time and applies a dispel. Any time Phantom Assassin gets a hero kill, her abilities are refreshed. Reduces cooldown and increases Vanish Buffer.
With Scepter, only non-ultimate spells will refresh.
Increases your movement speed by 40% while in Blur's active.
Meditation allows a Veiled Sister to carefully anticipate her opponents in combat.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_assassin_co: Phantom Assassin refines her combat abilities, gaining a chance of delivering a devastating critical strike to enemy units. Stifling Dagger shares the same critical strike chance.
A divine strike, Mortred honors her opponent by choosing them for death.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_assassin_fa: Phantom Assassin releases sharp blades around her, dealing a percentage of each victim's max health on impact and applying Break.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_phantom_assassin_b: Blurring out to disappear from the enemy's sight.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skeleton_king_hellf: Wraith King sears an enemy unit with spectral fire, dealing damage and stunning, then dealing damage over time and slowing the target.
Ostarion calls on his damned lineage, laying waste to his opponents.
If Wraith King has summoned skeletons, casting Wraithfire Blast on a target will order all of the skeletons to attack that target.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skeleton_king_vampi: Restore health based on the damage Wraith King deals when attacking enemy units. Can be cast to summon skeletons with Vampiric Spirit. For every two kills Wraith King or any unit he controls accrue on enemy units, Vampiric Aura adds a skeleton charge. Skeletons respawn once when killed.
Wraith King's blade drains his enemy's essence to feed his aura.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skeleton_king_morta: Summoned skeletons will automatically attack any unit targeted by Wraithfire Blast.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skeleton_king_vampi: Stacks additively with other sources of Lifesteal.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skeleton_king_morta: Wraith King passively deals bonus damage on an attack with a cooldown.
One blow to crush a foe.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skeleton_king_reinc: Wraith King's form regroups after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle.  Upon death, enemy units in a %slow_radius% radius will be slowed.
Causes Reincarnation to have no mana cost and spawn %shard_skeleton_count% skeletons to attack each nearby enemy hero when Reincarnation is triggered.
If a nearby allied hero is slain, they will be transformed into a wraith and have their death delayed and gain bonus attack and movement speed.
Conspirators against the Wraith King wonder why he never stays dead.
Wraith King won't revive if he doesn't have enough mana.
If Wraith King has an Aegis and Reincarnation off cooldown, Reincarnation will trigger first.
Revives with full HP and Mana.
Credit for allies whose death was delayed will go to whoever struck the original killing blow.
Wraith Delay affects Wraith King's actual deaths, not Reincarnate deaths.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_skeleton_king_hell: Movement speed slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and taking damage over time
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_skeleton_king_rein: Affected by Wraith King's Reincarnation. Move speed slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
If slain, will become a wraith for %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% seconds before dying.
Became a wraith to delay death, but will die shortly.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_drow_ranger_frost_a: Adds a freezing effect to Drow's attacks, slowing enemy movement and dealing bonus damage.  Slow lasts %abilityduration% seconds.

Frost Arrows now apply a Hypothermia stack to enemies, increasing damage from Frost Arrows and reducing their regeneration per stack. If an enemy dies with Hypothermia stacks, they burst and deal damage per stack and slow in an area around it.
Ice-encased arrows pierce the silence, chilling their victims to the core.
The slow duration is refreshed on successive casts.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_drow_ranger_multish: Channeling. Drow releases a flurry of arrows in continuous salvos, hitting enemies for extra damage and applying longer duration Frost Arrows. Lasts up to %abilitychanneltime% seconds.
In the ranger's youth, learning to fire multiple arrows at once was considered a distracting frivolity. In the war of the Ancients, such technique has become strange necessity.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_drow_ranger_silence: Stops all enemy units in a target area from casting spells.
Traxex is rather fond of the tranquility of physical combat, calling on her Drow heritage to end the incantations of opposing magi.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_drow_ranger_wave_of: Releases a wave that silences and knocks back enemy units. Knockback distance is relative to how close they are to Drow. Drow Gains Movement Speed for the same duration.
Traxex is rather fond of the tranquility of physical combat, calling on her Drow heritage to end the incantations of opposing magi.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_drow_ranger_truesho: Adds bonus damage to the physical attack of allied, ranged Hero units based on a percentage of Drow's agility.  Affects creeps for 30 seconds when cast.
Traxex' time spent alone in the forests of her Drow home has allowed her to teach other archers how to improve their bow skills.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_drow_ranger_marksma: Drow's experiences in battle grant her a chance to launch arrows with incredible accuracy and effectiveness. Pierces through the enemy's defenses, ignoring their base armor. Grants Drow and nearby ranged heroes with bonus agility based on Drow's current agility. This ability is disabled if there is an enemy hero within %disable_range% range.
Causes Drow Ranger's attacks to splinter on the target, hitting nearby units with normal attacks that deal reduced damage.
The Drow Ranger is the epitome of archery prowess.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_drowranger_wave_of: Silenced by Drow Ranger. Miss chance increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MISS_PERCENTAGE%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_drow_ranger_frost_: Healing, lifesteal, spell lifesteal, and health regeneration reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HP_REGEN_AMPLIFY_PERCENTAGE%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_morphling_waveform_: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path.  Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.
A torrential flood takes enemies by force.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_morphling_adaptive_: Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, dealing base damage plus additional damage based on Morphling's agility times a multiplier.  If Morphling's agility is 50% higher than strength, the maximum agility multiplier is used. \n\n Also puts Adaptive Strike (Strength) on a %shared_cooldown% second cooldown.
Causes Adaptive Strike to have +1 Multishot and increases the stun duration by 1 second. Multishot prioritizes heroes.
The Morphling calls upon his elements to crush his opponents with waves.

Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, stunning and knocking back the target based on Morphling's strength. If his strength is 50% higher than his agility, the maximum stun/knockback is dealt. \n\n Also puts Adaptive Strike (Agility) on a %shared_cooldown% second cooldown.
The Morphling calls upon his elements to crush his opponents with waves.
Causes Adaptive Strike to have +1 Multishot and increases the stun duration by 1 second. Multishot prioritizes heroes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_morphling_morph_agi: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Strength and pouring them into Agility. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.  Passively grants bonus Agility.
Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.
Attribute Shift can't convert stats from items.
Leveling up Agility Gain will also level up Strength Gain.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_morphling_morph_str: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Agility and pouring them into Strength. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.  Passively grants bonus Strength.
Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.
Attribute Shift can't convert stats from items.
Leveling up Strength Gain will also level up Agility Gain.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_morphling_replicate: Morphling changes his form to match the targeted enemy, gaining their basic abilities. Can be toggled for the duration of the ability.

Morphling steals stats from the replicated hero. If the replicated hero's primary attribute is Strength it will also steal Status Resistance, if it's Agility, it will steal Attack Speed and if it's Intelligence, it will steal Spell Amplification. Additionally reduces Morph Cooldown by %scepter_cooldown_reduction% seconds.
Staring into Morphling produces a reflection that mimics the beholder.
You can't target yourself with Morph.
Morph won't copy Shard/Scepter abilities unless Morphling owns the respective item.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_morphling_morph_rep: Toggles Morphling's form between his own and the replicated enemy.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_morphling_hybrid_De: Morphling creates a hybrid replication of a target allied hero, which can cast all of that hero's current, non-ultimate abilities. Enemies are able to see which unit is a hybrid.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_morphling_morph_st: Gaining strength at the cost of agility
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_morphling_morph_ag: Gaining agility at the cost of strength
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_morphling_replicat: Timer for clones created by Morphling's abilities
Indicates when Morphling will transform back into his native form.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeker_bloodra: Drives Bloodseeker into a bloodthirsty rage which causes him to attack faster and deal more spell damage at the cost of a percentage of his health per second. Provides half attack speed to allied heroes.
Strygwyr shares his animalistic thirst for bloodshed.
Bloodrage attacks now deal %shard_max_health_dmg_pct%%% of the target’s max health as pure damage and heals Bloodseeker for that amount. Only works for Bloodseeker.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeker_blood_b: Bloodseeker baptizes an area in sacred blood. After %delay_plus_castpoint_tooltip% seconds the ritual completes, causing any enemies caught in the area to take damage and become silenced.
The Flayed Twins are ever willing to aid those who spill blood upon the field of battle.
Total time is a %delay% second delay plus a %abilitycastpoint% second cast time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeker_thirst_: Bloodseeker is invigorated by the wounds of his enemies, restoring some life when he kills a unit. Restores for half values when denying, or if an ally kills a nearby enemy hero. Also gains bonus movement speed when an enemy hero's health falls below %min_bonus_pct%%%, with the bonuses increasing as their health falls further. If an enemy hero's health falls below %invis_threshold_pct%%%, he will also gain vision and True Sight of that hero. Bonuses stack per hero. Unlocks max movement speed for Bloodseeker.
Strygwyr becomes frenzied when blood is spilled.
Max movement speed and attack speed bonuses occur when an enemy's health is at or below %max_bonus_pct%%%.
Effects linger for %linger_duration% seconds if a target dies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeker_rupture: Causes an enemy unit's skin to rupture, dealing initial damage based on its current health. If the unit moves, it takes damage based on the distance moved.  The damage is dealt through spell immunity.
When the Bloodseeker hunts you, injuries become fatalities.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeker_blood_m: Bloodseeker sprays his blood continuously in the area around him, damaging himself to damage and slow his enemies. While active, Thirst's healing is increased. Cannot be turned off while on cooldown.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_bloodseeker_blood_: Spraying blood to damage and slow nearby enemies. Thirst healing increased.
Slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% by the blood of Bloodseeker.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_bloodseeker_bloodr: Increases attack speed and spell amplification at the cost of damage over time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_bloodseeker_blood_: Regenerate HP when you kill a target
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_bloodseeker_thirst: You sense an injured enemy. Movement speed and attack speed increased.
Bloodseeker senses your injuries, and knows exactly where you are.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_bloodseeker_ruptur: Deals a percentage of the distance you move as damage
You may cast Rupture whenever there is a charge available.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_axe_berserkers_call: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.
Berserker's Call applies Battle Hunger to affected units and reduces Berserker's Call cooldown.
Must draft Battle Hunger for Scepter upgrade to work.
Mogul Khan's warcry taunts opponents into engaging in an unconquerable battle with the Axe.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_axe_battle_hunger_D: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. The damage is increased by a factor of Axe's armor. The enemy is also slowed as long as he's facing away from Axe.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_axe_battle_hunger_N: Destroying buildings will also remove the debuff.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_axe_battle_hunger_L: Ordinary heroes cannot withstand Mogul Khan's rage for battle, such that it injures them until it is satisfied.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_axe_battle_hunger_s: Battle Hunger also reduces enemy armor and grants Axe armor per affected target.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_axe_counter_helix_D: When attacked, Axe has a chance to perform a helix counter attack, dealing pure damage to all nearby enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_axe_counter_helix_s: Counter Helix now applies a stacking debuff to enemies hit by it that causes them to deal less total attack damage to Axe. Increases Counter Helix chance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_axe_counter_helix_N: Counter Helix triggers when the attack hits.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_axe_counter_helix_L: Axe is the only reinforcement this army needs.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_axe_culling_blade_D: Axe spots a weakness and strikes, dealing pure damage. When an enemy hero is killed with Culling Blade, its cooldown is reset, Axe gains bonus armor permanently and all nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_axe_culling_blade_N: Culling Blade death cannot be prevented with other abilities like Shallow Grave.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_axe_culling_blade_L: Mogul Khan is the embodiment of battle and fury, launching into a gruesome fatality against those who dare engage the Axe in combat.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_axe_culling_blade_: %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS% Armor harvested by Axe's Culling Blade.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_axe_berserkers_cal: You are forced to attack Axe
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_axe_battle_hunger_: Dealing %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% damage per second, reducing movement speed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_axe_culling_blade_: Axe releases a war cry, giving all nearby allies %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% bonus movement and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% bonus attack speed
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_lancer_spir: Sends a magical spirit lance to a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while summoning an illusory phantom to attack the unit.
Spirit Lance bounces once on an enemy, prioritizing Heroes. Increases Spirit Lance illusion damage.
Azwraith's proficiency at spearing his family's meal of fish is proving quite useful in the battlefield.
Nearby illusions will mimic the cast animation.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_lancer_dopp: Phantom Lancer briefly vanishes from the battlefield. After %delay% second, Phantom Lancer and any of his nearby illusions reappear at a random position within the targeted location, along with two additional doppelgangers. Extends duration of all illusions. The two added doppelgangers have different properties: one takes normal damage and deals none, while the other takes %illusion_2_damage_in_pct%%% bonus damage and deals %illusion_2_damage_out_pct%%% less damage.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
Dread Magus Vorn's death imbued the Phantom Lancer with the ability to bend and fracture all spectrums of light.
This ability can be used to dodge projectiles, and dispel debuffs.
Trees near a reappearing unit will be destroyed.
Phantom Lancer and his allies can see which illusion is the 100% damage illusion.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_lancer_phan: When targetting an enemy for an attack, Phantom Lancer quickly charges into range, gaining a temporary agility boost. Phantom Lancer's illusions also have this ability.
Azwraith knows that on the field of battle, speed can mean everything.
If the attack order is cancelled, the movement speed bonus is lost.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_lancer_juxt: Phantom Lancer has a chance to fracture his presence on an attack, creating an illusion of himself. Illusions also have a chance to fracture further. Illusions created from Phantom Lancer last for %illusion_duration% seconds, while illusions created from other illusions last %illusion_from_illusion_duration% seconds.
Increases Max Illusions and adds Juxtapose active ability. Destroys Phantom Lancer's other Juxtapose illusions and quickly creates the max illusions with bonus duration.
Each of Azwraith's lance attacks feels like two from a normal warrior; or three; or four...
Illusions created by Juxtapose will attack the target that the ability was triggered upon.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_razor_plasma_field_: Releases a wave of energetic plasma that grows in power as it expands, but also zaps on contraction, slowing and dealing damage to enemy units caught in its path. Damage and slow increases with distance from Razor. The Plasma Field hits each unit twice, once each direction.
The Lightning Revenant rules the Underscape with plasmatic power.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_razor_static_link_D: Creates a charged link between Razor and an enemy Hero, stealing damage from the target and giving it to Razor. Allows Razor to attack while moving with the link active.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_razor_static_link_L: Razor's polarity channels electricity into his being, draining the power of his opposition.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_razor_static_link_N: The link is broken when either unit dies or the distance between them becomes %drain_range_buffer% units greater than Static Link's cast range.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_razor_unstable_curr: Causes Storm Surge to have a chance when attacked, and always when targeted with a spell, to release forked lightning that strikes the target and other nearby enemies, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.
Merely approaching the Lightning Revenant is rewarded with shock therapy.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_razor_eye_of_the_st: A powerful lightning storm strikes out at enemy units with the lowest health, dealing damage and reducing their armor.
Causes Eye of the Storm to strike two different units instead of one and can damage structures. When striking buildings, it will only target towers, barracks, and the Ancient.
Each blast targets the lowest health enemy unit within range.
Eye of the Storm will prioritize striking static linked heroes.
Successive casts of Eye of the Storm will stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_razor_eye_of_the_s: Damaging and reducing armor to the target with each lightning strike.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_storm_spirit_electr: Grants Storm Spirit and allied heroes within %radius% AoE of him %charges% Overload charges. Provides 40 Attack Speed. Lasts up to %duration% seconds or until the charges are depleted.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_storm_spirit_static: Creates an explosively charged image of Storm Spirit that lasts %abilityduration% seconds and will detonate and deal damage if an enemy unit comes near it.
Raijin Thunderkeg's duality allows him to admire himself in shocking fashion.
Remnants take %static_remnant_delay% second to materialize after the spell is cast.
Remnants grant unobstructed vision for their duration.
The explosion actually hits units in a %static_remnant_damage_radius% radius, but will only be triggered in %static_remnant_radius%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_storm_spirit_electr: A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location.
Electric Vortex affects all enemies within a radius around Storm Spirit.
Raijin's thunderous, boisterous energy often draws others into an electrifying situation.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_storm_spirit_overlo: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on Storm's next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.

Can be activated to grant Storm Spirit and nearby allied heroes %shard_activation_charges% Overload charges. Provides bonus Attack Speed. Lasts up to %shard_activation_duration% seconds or until the charges are depleted.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_storm_spirit_ball_l: Storm Spirit becomes volatile electricity, charging across the battlefield until he depletes his mana or reaches his target. The activation mana cost is %ball_lightning_initial_mana_base%+%ball_lightning_initial_mana_percentage%%% of his total mana pool, and the cost per 100 units traveled is %ball_lightning_travel_cost_base%+%ball_lightning_travel_cost_percent%%% of his total mana pool.  Damage is expressed in damage per 100 units traveled.
Abilities and items can be used while traveling.
Storm Spirit is invulnerable during Ball Lightning.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_storm_spirit_elect: Being pulled by Storm Spirit's Vortex
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_storm_spirit_overl: Gain charges by casting a spell
Affected by Storm Spirit's Overload. Move speed slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_storm_spirit_elect: Gaining %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% attack speed and empowering attacks with electrical energy.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_crystal_maiden_crys: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.
The air temperature around Rylai drops rapidly, chilling all around her to the core.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_crystal_maiden_fros: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage over time. Lasts %creep_duration% seconds on creeps level 6 or lower.
Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_crystal_maiden_bril: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map; this bonus is increased for Crystal Maiden. Whenever Crystal Maiden casts a spell, restores some mana to all friendly units within %radius% radius.
Cold temperatures promote the essence of magic, causing Rylai's presence to allow spell usage in abundance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_crystal_maiden_free: CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with 100 random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage. Grants bonus armor while channeling. Lasts %abilitychanneltime% seconds.

Allows you to move, cast and attack during Freezing Field. Can still be interrupted by enemies. You move %shard_self_movement_speed_slow_pct%%% slower during this. Increases total number of explosions by %shard_bonus_explosion%%%.
Once the place of her exile, Icewrack has become an anchor for Rylai's frigid onslaught.
The slow is applied on all enemies in the radius, even if they aren't hit by an explosion (lasts %slow_duration% second).
Applies Frostbite to any unit that has been standing in the Freezing Field for over %frostbite_delay%s.
Frostbite must be drafted for Aghanim's Scepter upgrade to work.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_crystal_maiden_let_: Creates an icy path towards the targeted direction, allowing you to move faster and path freely. Enemies walking over this path will move slower.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_crystal_maiden_cry: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_crystal_maiden_fro: Cannot move or attack. Taking %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% damage every %fMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_crystal_maiden_fre: Movement speed slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_torrent_Desc: Summons a rising torrent that, after a short delay, hurls enemy units into the sky, stunning, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_torrent_Lore: An ancestral rush of water explodes from the center of the world, called upon by the Admiral.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_torrent_Note: The initial bubble effect is only visible to allies and provides vision in fog of war.
Units tossed in the air will be stunned and still able to be attacked.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_torrent_abil: Scepter: Access Torrent Storm by toggling auto-cast on Torrent.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_torrent_stor: Releases a visible Torrent in a random area around Kunkka once every %torrent_interval% for %torrent_duration% seconds. Spawns within %torrent_max_distance% range of him.
A hundred leagues of dry land couldn't keep these seas at bay.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_tidebringer_: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.
A lost Claddish soul inhabits Kunkka's trusty Tidebringer, empowering it to destroy demons of the Cataract.
Cleave damage goes through spell immunity.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_x_marks_the_: Targets a friendly or enemy Hero, marks their position with an X, and returns them to it after several seconds.  Kunkka can trigger the return at any time during the duration. Lasts twice as long on allied heroes.
The Admiral's set of arcane abilities includes some that can be used for battle as well as entertainment.
If the target becomes Spell Immune after the cast, the target will not return to the X after the duration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_return_Descr: Returns the marked hero to the X.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_ghostship_De: Summons a ghostly ship that sails through the battle before smashing apart, damaging and stunning all enemies caught near the wreckage. Allied heroes touched by the Ghostship are given a swig of The Admiral's Rum, receiving bonus movement speed and a delayed reaction to incoming damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_ghostship_Lo: The final ship of the Claddish Navy is nothing but a phantom, but it is all too real to the enemies of the Admiral.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_ghostship_No: Damage dealt after Rum wears off is non-lethal and can never kill a hero.
Actual area of effect of ship's collision is larger than the boat itself.
The boat has a movement speed of %ghostship_speed%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_tidal_wave_D: Releases a Tidal Wave that spawns behind Kunkka. Deals damage and drags enemies along it for the duration. Enemies cannot attack while being dragged.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_kunkka_tidebringer: Physical damage increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PREATTACK_BONUS_DAMAGE% with a cleaving attack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_kunkka_torrent_Des: Stunned by a massive blast of water.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_kunkka_ghost_ship_: You're drunk! Movement speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, temporary numbness to incoming damage.
Sobering up. Gradually feeling the rest of the damage taken while under the effects of The Admiral's Rum.
You are loaded on Kunkka's Ghost Ship!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_kunkka_x_marks_the: You will be returned to the location of the X
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_warlock_fatal_bonds: Binds several enemy units together, causing a percentage of the damage dealt to one of them to be felt by the others.
An ancient incantation that links the vital energies of multiple lifeforms into one collective body.
The shared damage type is the same as the type of damage inflicted.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_warlock_shadow_word: Warlock whispers an incantation, healing a friendly unit or damaging an enemy unit over time.
Turns Shadow Word into a %shard_aoe% AoE Spell. Grants %shard_movement_speed_pct%%% movement speed bonus to allies and slows enemies by %shard_movement_speed_pct%%.
Demnok's arcane arts have a myriad of uses, allowing them to be powerful friendly enchantments or damaging curses.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_warlock_upheaval_De: CHANNELED - A powerful slowing current that grows stronger as it's channelled. Lasts up to %abilitychanneltime% seconds.  Enemies are slowed for %duration% seconds after leaving the area or the spell ends.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_warlock_upheaval_Lo: Demnok manipulates space-time, impairing entire armies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_warlock_upheaval_No: The slow increase is based on length of the channel, not the duration an enemy was standing in the area.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_warlock_rain_of_cha: Summons a Golem from the depths, stunning enemies for one second. The Golem lives %golem_duration% seconds, takes reduced damage from spells, has Permanent Immolation and Flaming Fists on attack.
Calls %number_of_golems_scepter% Golems with reduced stats and bounty.
Demnok unleashes the captive spirit in his Dreadwood staff, causing destruction in enemy ranks.
Spell Immune units will be stunned.
This ability destroys trees in its area of effect.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_warlock_golem_flami: Deals extra damage to nearby units when attacking.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_warlock_golem_perma: Burns the Golem's nearby enemy units, with damage per second.
