Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_warlock_fatal_bond: Distributing %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP%%% of all damage to linked units
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_warlock_shadow_wor: Taking periodic damage if an enemy, and periodic heal if a friend.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_warlock_golem_perm: Taking damage while near the golem
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_arc_lightning_: Hurls a bolt of lightning that leaps through nearby enemy units.
Arc Lightning is Zeus' favorite spell to use against puny mortals.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_lightning_bolt: Calls down a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy unit, causing damage and a mini-stun. When cast, Lightning Bolt briefly provides unobstructed vision and True Sight around the target in a %sight_radius_night% radius. Can be cast on the ground, affecting the closest enemy hero in %spread_aoe% range.
A shocking punishment for rebellious heathen.
You can interrupt channeling spells and items with this ability.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_static_field_D: Zeus shocks any enemy that he attacks or is hit by his abilities, causing damage equal to %damage_health_pct%%% of their current health.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_static_field_L: The air crackles with static when the Thundergod walks the world.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_static_field_a: Static Field is associated to this ability and doesn't affect abilities other than Zeus'.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_thundergods_wr: Strikes all enemy heroes with a bolt of lightning, no matter where they may be.  Thundergod's Wrath also provides True Sight around each hero struck.  If an enemy hero is invisible, it takes no damage, but the True Sight is still created at that hero's location.
The Lord of Heaven smites all who oppose him, near or far.
Nimbus requires Lightning Bolt to be drafted for damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_cloud_Descript: Creates a storm cloud anywhere on the map that automatically casts Lightning Bolt on nearby enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_cloud_Note0: Grants %cloud_bounty_tooltip% gold if destroyed by an enemy hero.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_cloud_Note1: Affects the closest enemy unit with strikes from Zeus's current level of Lightning Bolt.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_cloud_Note2: Towers and creeps do half damage to the Nimbus.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_cloud_lore: Where the thunder god's ire grows, storm clouds quickly gather.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_heavenly_jump_: Zeus performs a Heavenly Jump shocking the closest visible nearby enemy (prioritizing heroes), dealing damage, reducing their movement, attack speed and increasing their cast time. If Zeus was moving forward, he will jump towards that direction. Zeus gets 900 unobstructed vision around him for 3 seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_zuus_static_field_: Whenever Zeus attacks or hits an enemy with an ability they are shocked for a percent of their current HP.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_avalanche_Desc: Bombards an area with rocks, continously doing small intervals of damage and stun to enemy units. Avalanche does %toss_multiplier%x damage to units being tossed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_avalanche_Lore: Inanimate rock becomes animate when called by the Stone Giant.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_craggy_exterio: Enemies that attack Tiny have a %stun_chance%%% chance of being stunned for %stun_duration% second and taking %damage% damage. Affects enemies within 400 range of him. Procs after an attack impacts, and does not affect spell immune enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_toss_Descripti: Grabs the nearest unit in a %grab_radius% radius around Tiny, ally or enemy, and launches it at the target unit or rune to deal damage where they land.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_toss_Lore: Tiny's gargantuan stature allows him to catapult even the sturdiest of warriors.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_toss_Note0: You can toss allies, but they don't take damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_toss_Note1: Toss deals 33% of its damage to buildings.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_tiny_toss_charge_c: Number of charges left on Toss.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_tree_grab_lore: Sticks and stones break all the bones, with structures sure to follow.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_tree_grab_Desc: Grabs a tree to whack enemies on the head for a limited number of attacks. Grants bonus attack range. Attacks deal more damage and fully splash on units along the way. The tree can be thrown, to deal your attack to a unit at a distance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_tree_grab_shar: Causes Tree Grab to have no charge limit.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_tree_grab_abil: Scepter: Access Tree Volley by toggling auto-cast on Tree Grab.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_tree_grab_Note: The cooldown begins when the tree is thrown.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_toss_tree_Desc: Throws the tree at the target unit, proccing your attack on it and splashing damage around the target.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_toss_tree_Lore: Even enemies can share in Tiny's arbor ardor.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_grow_Descripti: Tiny gains craggy mass, increasing his attack damage, and armor, and toss power while slowing his attack speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_grow_Lore: Watching a hill become a mountain is awe-inspiring - especially if the mountain begins laying waste to adversaries.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_tree_channel_D: Tiny channels to throw random trees within range towards the targeted area. Deals Tiny's attack damage to enemies in that area with each tree thrown.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_tree_channel_L: Sticks thrown from stones are like to shatter many bones.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_tiny_tree_grab_Des: Attacks deal increased and splash damage, range increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACK_RANGE_BONUS%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_tiny_tosstree_slow: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% from tree trauma.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_illusory_orb_D: Puck launches a magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_illusory_orb_a: For Ability Draft only, Illusory Orb ability swaps with Ethereal Jaunt while the orb is in flight.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_illusory_orb_L: The playful Faerie Dragon delights in confusing others, vanishing and reappearing where unexpected.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_illusory_orb_N: The Illusory Orb grants unobstructed vision around its location while it travels.
Jaunting to the Orb will disjoint projectiles.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_waning_rift_De: Puck teleports to the target location and releases a burst of faerie dust that deals damage and silences enemy units nearby.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_waning_rift_sc: Waning Rift now has %scepter_radius% radius and range and knocks enemies back %scepter_pushback% distance over %scepter_pushback_duration% seconds (non-interrupting). Reveals invisible enemy units and wards in the area for %scepter_vision_duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_waning_rift_Lo: With a mischievous grin, Puck spreads its enchanted powder which disrupts magical flow.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_phase_shift_De: CHANNELED - Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_phase_shift_sh: Puck attacks all enemies within its attack range + %shard_attack_range_bonus% every time it phase shifts.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_phase_shift_Lo: With a quip and flash, Puck returns to the alien dimension from whence it came.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_phase_shift_No: Puck retains collision size while under the effects of Phase Shift.
Issuing any action will cancel Phase Shift.
Puck is invulnerable during Phase Shift.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_dream_coil_Des: Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, damaging and leashing them.  If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, stunning and dealing additional damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_dream_coil_Lor: The Faerie Dragon sows confusion by forcing its enemies to vividly dream about their own mortality.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_ethereal_jaunt: Teleports Puck to a flying Illusory Orb.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_poison_touch: Releases a cone of poison that strikes multiple enemy units. Deals damage over time and slows the targets. Anytime the targets get attacked by Dazzle, the debuff duration is refreshed and slow is increased.
Causes Poison Touch to hex affected targets for %shard_hex_duration% seconds.
One of the few Dezun rites used for offensive purposes, the paralytic enchantment often proves useful.
The damage is not reduced by damage block abilities.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_shallow_grav: An ally blessed with Shallow Grave, no matter how close to death, cannot die while under its protection. Healing on that ally is also amplified for the duration based on the hero's HP.
Only a seasoned acolyte of the Shadow can properly perform the rite of preventing death.
HP cannot go below 1 while under the effects of Shallow Grave, but Axe's Culling Blade will still kill the hero.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_shadow_wave_: Sends out a bolt of power that arcs between allies, healing them while damaging any enemy units standing nearby.  Dazzle is always healed by Shadow Wave.
While it is a simplistic and routine rite among Shadow Priests, the Shadow Wave is also the most critical for success.
If enemies are near multiple allied units affected by Shadow Wave, they will take multiple instances of damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_weave_Descri: Applies a buff that increases the armor of allied heroes while decreasing the armor of enemy heroes in the target area over time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_weave_Lore: His ethereal journey into the Nothl realm has allowed Dazzle to mend together the powers of light and dark, creating shifting waves of enchantments.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_weave_Note0: Places a buff on units, so entering or leaving the area after the cast has no effect.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_bad_juju_Des: Whenever a Unit is affected by Dazzle's spells they temporarily gain/lose armor.\n  Can be activated to heal/deal physical damage to units based on the amount of charges they have.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_bad_juju_Lor: Each invocation of the Nothl realm helps it further permeate the surroundings of our own.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_good_juju_De: Whenever Dazzle Casts a Spell, all other abilities currently on cooldown have their cooldowns reduced.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_good_juju_sc: Good Juju reduces all item Cooldowns by %item_cooldown_reduction%%% and becomes an active ability that can be cast on allied units to refresh all item cooldowns.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_good_juju_Lo: Each invocation of the Nothl realm helps it further permeate the surroundings of our own.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_lucky_charm_: Passively reduces Dazzle's item cooldowns. Can be cast on an ally to reset all of their items' cooldowns
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_dazzle_poison_touc: Taking damage over time with movement speed modified by %-dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_dazzle_shallow_gra: Protected by Voodoo! You cannot be killed while under this effect!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rattletrap_battery_: Discharges high-powered shrapnel at random nearby enemy units, dealing minor magical damage and ministun. Deals double damage to creeps
Some of Rattletrap's contraptions don't quite work correctly, so detonating them proves useful as an offensive maneuver.
Remains active if Clockwerk is disabled.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rattletrap_power_co: Forms a barrier of energized cogs around Clockwerk, trapping any units that are near.  Enemies outside the trap that touch a cog are knocked back, losing health and mana. Once a cog has delivered a shock, it will power down.  Cogs can be destroyed by enemy attacks, but Clockwerk can destroy them with just one.
One of Clockwerk's inventions of which he is most proud is the power cog - though it is sometimes despised by his allies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rattletrap_rocket_f: Fires a global range flare that explodes over a given area, damaging enemies and providing vision for %duration% seconds.
What started as a festive display has become a useful scouting and bombardment tool.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rattletrap_hookshot: Fires a grappling device rapidly at the target location.  If the hook hits a unit, Clockwerk launches himself into the target, stunning and dealing damage.  Any enemies Clockwerk collides with along the way are damaged and stunned.
A somewhat unwieldy device, the Hookshot sends the otherwise clunky Clockwerk armor flying through the air.
Hookshot will latch and take Clockwerk to allies, but not damage or disable them.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rattletrap_overcloc: Resets Clockwerk's ability cooldowns and grants him bonus movement and attack speed for a duration. Clockwerk becomes stunned after the duration runs out.
Rattletrap understands the limitations of his armor. Just as he understands the risks of pushing past them in times of need.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rattletrap_jetpack_: Clockwerk activates a jetpack, gaining flying movement, flying vision, and bonus movement speed. Clockwerk has a severely-limited turn rate during this time and cannot attack. Jetpack is cancelled upon casting Hookshot.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_rattletrap_battery: Doing periodic damage to nearby units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_rattletrap_overclo:
Movement speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, attack speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.

Will become stunned after duration runs out.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_rattletrap_cog_imm: Spell immune while inside Power Cogs.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_frost_nova_Des: Blasts the target enemy unit with damaging frost, dealing area damage and slowing movement and attack rates for %abilityduration% seconds.  The primary target receives both base and area damage and extra attack speed slow.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_frost_nova_Lor: Frost-mage Ethreain has not forgotten even the simplest of ice manipulation.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_dark_sorcery_D: Grants you bonus attack speed for a limited number of attacks, draining a percentage of mana for each hit. Costs a percentage of current health to cast. Lasts up to %duration% seconds or when the attack count is consumed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_sinister_gaze_: CHANNELED - Hypnotizes an enemy unit, causing it to move towards a point between the two of you and drains a percentage of its current mana.
If Scepter is acquired, casting other channeled abilities or abilities that take your hero out of the world will stop Sinister Gaze.
Sinister Gaze becomes an Area of Effect ability, affecting units within a radius of %aoe_scepter% in the target area. Sinister Gaze allows Lich to cast other abilities while channeling it.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_frost_aura_Des: Allied Aura. Causes all nearby ally attacks to slow enemy movement speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_frost_armor_De: Creates a shield around the target friendly unit or building, which adds armor and slows attacking units. Lasts %abilityduration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_frost_armor_Lo: Originally crafted during his ambush for self-defense, the Lich is capable of enchanting others with a formidable defense of frost magic.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_frost_armor_No: If autocast is activated, Lich will cast this spell on nearby allies who are attacked.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_frost_shield_D: Applies a magical frost shield around the target, reducing damage from attacks against it. While the shield is active, ice magic will affect nearby enemy units every %interval% seconds, dealing minor damage and slowing them.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_frost_shield_L: First conceived of to protect him in his mortal years, the frost magic that Ethreain weaves around himself has only grown colder with time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_frost_shield_N: Spell-immune enemies are not affected by the damage or slow.
Frost Shield can be cast on buildings.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_chain_frost_De: Releases an orb of frost that bounces between nearby enemy units up to %jumps% times, slowing and damaging each time it hits. Each bounce increases the damage for the subsequent bounces.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_chain_frost_Lo: Almost universally considered the ultimate in frost magic, Ethreain's orb of frozen death strikes fear into those who dare stand against him.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_chain_frost_No: Chain Frost has a movement speed of %projectile_speed%.
Chain Frost doesn't bounce to Zombies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_ice_spire_Desc:
Creates an Ice Spire at the target spot, slowing enemies around it. Has 800 health.

Chain Frost can bounce to the Spire if there are no other enemies in range.

Lich can cast Frost Shield on the Spire.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lich_frostnova_slo: Movement speed slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, attack speed slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lich_chainfrost_sl: Movement speed slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, attack speed slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lich_frostarmor_sl: Movement speed slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, attack speed slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lich_frost_armor_D: Adds %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS% armor and slows attacking units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lich_attack_slow_d: Movement speed slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, attack speed slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lich_sinister_gaze: You are helpless against Lich's Sinister Gaze!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tidehunter_gush_Des: Summons a gush of water to damage an enemy unit, reducing their movement speed and armor.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tidehunter_gush_Lor: During his championship of the Sunken Isles, Leviathan gained mastery over the open sea.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tidehunter_gush_sce: Gush becomes a ground targeted wave ability that affects enemy units in a line.  Decreases cooldown.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tidehunter_kraken_s:
Thickens Tidehunter's hide to passively block a portion of any incoming physical attack damage. The hide also removes negative status effects if the damage taken crosses a threshold.

Does not stack with items that provide Damage Block.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
Claddish navymen tell tales of a mighty sea-faring beast that suffered spear and sword but continued to lay waste to the fleet.
Only damage from player owned sources is counted towards debuff removal.
The counter will reset if no player owned damage is taken for %damage_reset_interval% seconds.
Kraken Shell removes most debuffs, even if they are generally not purgable.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tidehunter_anchor_s: Tidehunter swings his mighty anchor to attack and deal bonus damage to nearby enemies and reduce their attack damage.
Anchor Smash now affects buildings and has increased damage and reduced cooldown.
Stolen from one of Admiral Kunkka's flagships, Leviathan's heavy anchor proves useful as a melee weapon.
Anchor Smash works on all Ancient creeps except for Roshan.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tidehunter_ravage_D: Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in all directions, damaging and stunning all nearby enemy units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tidehunter_ravage_L: Calling to the abyssal god Maelrawn has resulted in entire armadas being lost at sea.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tidehunter_ravage_N: Ravage waves move outwards at a speed of %speed%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_tidehunter_gush_De: Slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, and armor reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_shaman_ether: Creates a cone of ethereal energy that strikes multiple enemy units.
Originally used to open shows with the travelling con-man, Rhasta's lightning display shocks adversaries in more ways than one.
Can hit secondary targets up to 1000 distance away.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_shaman_voodo: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless creature, disabling their attacks and abilities.
Rhasta often ended performances by turning himself into a chicken - now, the humiliation is shared.
The target will have a base movement speed of %movespeed%, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_shaman_shack: CHANNELED - Magically binds an enemy unit so that it cannot move or attack, absorbing their life energy over time.
Shackles creates %shard_ward_count% Serpent Wards attacking the target. Increases Shackles cast range by %shard_bonus_cast_range%. Serpent wards lasts %shard_ward_duration% seconds.
A self-defense incantation, Rhasta developed shackles after his master was slain in the Bleeding Hills.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_shaman_mass_: Summons %ward_count% Serpent Wards to attack enemy units and structures. The Wards are immune to magic.
Causes Serpent Wards to have split shot, attacking two units for full damage. Increases attack range of Serpent Wards.
Snake charming was a big part of the Shadow Shaman's act; now Rhasta can empower the snakes to do his bidding.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_shaman_serpe: Creates a line of %count% Serpent Wards.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_shadow_shaman_vood: You are a chicken. Cannot attack or cast spells.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_riki_smoke_screen_D: Throws down a smoke bomb, silencing enemies, and causing them to miss attacks.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_riki_smoke_screen_L: Since his escape during the night of his betrayal, Riki has valued the use of a simple smoke screen to confuse his opponents.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_riki_smoke_screen_N: Can be cast during Tricks of the Trade.
Doesn't prevent the use of active items.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_riki_backstab_Descr: Riki fades into the shadows, becoming invisible. Every time Riki strikes his enemy from behind, he deals bonus damage based on his Agility. When Riki attacks, he becomes visible.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_riki_backstab_Note0: Illusions of Riki will play Backstab animations, but not deal any bonus damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_riki_backstab_Note1: Bonus damage from Backstab can't be evaded.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_riki_permanent_invi: Riki fades into the shadows, becoming invisible. When Riki attacks, he becomes visible. Grants bonus movement speed
Riki won't auto attack enemies while invisible.
Illusions of Riki will play Backstab animations, but not deal any bonus damage.
Bonus damage from Backstab can't be evaded.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_riki_poison_dart_De: Fires a dart at the target enemy, putting them to sleep.  The target will wake up at the end of the duration or if they take too much damage. Upon waking up, the target takes damage and is slowed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_riki_blink_strike_D: Teleports behind the target unit, momentarily slowing them and striking for bonus damage if it is an enemy.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_riki_blink_strike_L: The Stealth Assassin's agile movement makes him impossible to escape.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_riki_blink_strike_N: Riki's first attack after Blink Strike will be a backstab.
Blink Strike's damage is dealt before the next attack.
You can Blink Strike to allies, but no damage is dealt.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_riki_tricks_of_the_: Riki phases out of the world while striking random enemy units from behind in an area around him.
Increases cast range, number of attacks and allows you to target an allied hero, hiding inside them for the duration.  Each attack hits an additional target.
The Stealth Assassin is not afraid to fight dirty, and specializes in attacking his opponents from behind.
Moving while phased out will cancel the ability.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_riki_smoke_screen_: Silenced. Vision Reduced. Missing %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MISS_PERCENTAGE%%% of attacks. Move Speed slowed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_riki_blink_strike_: You may cast Blink Strike whenever there is a charge available.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_riki_dart_Descript: Knocked out by Riki's sleeping dart.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_riki_poison_dart_d: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% from grogginess.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enigma_malefice_Des: Focuses Enigma's power on a target, causing it to take damage and become repeatedly stunned for multiple instances.  An instance strikes every %tick_rate% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enigma_malefice_Lor: Strange gravities pull at the core of those who would oppose you, holding them in place.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enigma_demonic_conv: Transforms a creep into three fragments of Enigma himself.  These eidolons are all under Enigma's control, and repeated successful attacks cause them to multiply.  When this happens, the eidolons have their health restored.
Enigma is capable of drawing aspects of himself from other dimensions - the result is a trio of dark eidolons that hunt the corporeal plane.
Converted enemy units will give gold bounty and experience.
Converted allied units will be denied.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enigma_midnight_pul: Steeps an area in dark resonance, damaging enemy units based on their current HP.
A section of the world slowly descends into the void.
This ability destroys trees in its area.
Multiple instances of Midnight Pulse do not stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enigma_black_hole_D: CHANNELED - Summons a vortex that sucks in nearby enemy units.  Enemies affected by Black Hole cannot move, attack, or cast spells.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enigma_black_hole_s: Black Hole does a non-interrupting pull towards it in a %shard_radius% AoE. Pulls at a rate of %shard_drag_speed%.
Black Hole deals additional damage equivalent to %scepter_pct_damage%%% of the unit's Max Health per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enigma_black_hole_L: The ground trembles as Enigma channels his ultimate vortex of destruction, a singularity with the power to end worlds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_enigma_malefice_De: Does %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% damage and stuns for %fMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% seconds every %fMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_demonic_conversion: This entity is under control of Enigma.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_enigma_black_hole_: Taking damage per second, stunned, and being pulled towards the event horizon.
Being pulled towards the event horizon.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tinker_laser_Descri: Fires an intense energy beam, dealing damage to the target and all enemy units around it. The main target is blinded, causing them to miss all physical attacks.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tinker_laser_scepte: Upgrades Tinker's Laser into a Shrink Ray, granting +%scepter_bonus_cast_range% cast range and reducing the main target's size, current health, and maximum health by %scepter_reduction_pct%%% (stacking) if it's a hero. The laser bounces once on the farthest target up to %scepter_bounce_radius% range from the primary one, prioritizing heroes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tinker_laser_Lore: Boush perfected this rock cutting laser in his subterranean laboratory, never considering its combat utility.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tinker_shrink_ray_D: Reduces the enemy target size and lowers their max health by 20%% for %duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tinker_heat_seeking: Launches rockets at the nearest visible heroes within %radius% range.
The last contraption Boush was able to save was a retrofitted rocket launcher with a homing mechanism.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tinker_warp_grenade: Throws a flare towards an enemy, dealing damage, teleporting them away and reducing their Cast and Attack Range for %debuff_duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tinker_march_of_the: Enlists an army of robotic minions to destroy enemy units in an area around Tinker.
Even though the laboratory has since been sealed off, the ability to radio in robotic drones is still in working order.
Robots spawn at a rate of %machines_per_sec% per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tinker_rearm_abilit: For abilities with charges, a single charge of the ability will be added everytime Rearm is cast.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tinker_rearm_Descri: CHANNELED - Resets the cooldown on most of Tinker's items and abilities.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tinker_rearm_Lore: A new battery here, another set of rockets there, Boush continually improves on existing technology.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tinker_rearm_Note0: Rearm works on all items except Aeon Disk, Arcane Boots, Black King Bar, Hand of Midas, Helm of the Dominator, Linken's Sphere, Meteor Hammer, Pipe of Insight, Tome of Knowledge, Refresher Orb, and any neutral items.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tinker_defense_matr: Targets an allied unit, applying a barrier to them that blocks some damage and provides Status Resistance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tinker_keen_telepor: As Boush likes to say, 'There is nothing the arcane can accomplish that the curious mind cannot reproduce given time. And proper funding, of course.'
After channeling for %abilitychanneltime%s teleport to a target friendly structure. Level 2 allows teleporting to friendly units and Level 3 to friendly heroes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_tinker_defense_mat: Absorbs incoming damage and provides %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_STATUS_RESISTANCE_STACKING%%% status resistance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_tinker_warp_grenad: Cast range reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_CAST_RANGE_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack range reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACK_RANGE_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% due to warp disorientation.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sniper_shrapnel_Des: Consumes a charge to launch a ball of shrapnel that showers the target area in explosive pellets. Enemies are subject to damage and slowed movement. Reveals the targeted area. Shrapnel charges restore every %abilitychargerestoretime% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sniper_shrapnel_Lor: Kardel's modular rifle also fires incendiary rounds, useful for assaulting entrenched locations.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sniper_shrapnel_Not: Damage is dealt 11 times, immediately at spell effect then every second.
Provides vision in the targeted area.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sniper_headshot_Des: Sniper increases his accuracy, giving him a chance to deal extra damage and knock back his enemies. Headshots  briefly slow enemy movement and attack speed slowed by %slow%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sniper_headshot_Lor: Taking potshots at steepstalkers in his childhood has been thoroughly refined into perfect leads on enemy combatants.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sniper_take_aim_Des: Extends the attack range of Sniper's rifle. Can be activated to provide %headshot_chance%%% Headshot chance for 3 seconds. Slows you by %slow%%% for the duration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sniper_take_aim_Lor: Kardel always takes it upon himself to stay as far from harm as he can while still performing his role - taking perfect aim.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sniper_assassinate_: Sniper locks onto a target enemy unit and, after a short aiming duration, fires a devastating shot that deals damage at long range and mini-stuns the target.
Causes Assassinate to fire quicker and disable the enemy target.
In order to fulfill the prophecy and return to his home town, Kardel must make another shot as perfect as the one on the day of his ancient test.
Crosshair effect is only visible to allies.
Interrupts channeling spells, including on Spell Immune units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sniper_concussive_g: Launches a grenade at the target area, dealing damage to enemies and knocking them and Sniper himself back.  Enemies affected have their movement slowed after the knockback.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_sniper_shrapnel_ch: You may cast Shrapnel whenever there is a charge available.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_sniper_assassinate: Sniper's taking aim at your head!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necrolyte_death_pul: Necrophos releases a wave of death around him, dealing damage to enemy units and healing allied units.
Poor souls who succumb to Rotund'jere's plagues are recycled for future use.
Shard: Access Death Seeker by toggling auto-cast on Death Pulse.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necrolyte_heartstop: Necrophos stills the hearts of his opponents, causing nearby enemy units to lose a percentage of their max health over time. Passively provides regen for %regen_duration% seconds for each unit Necrophos kills.
Increases Heartstopper Aura damage while Ghost Shroud is active.
Those who come within a short distance of Necrophos can feel pestilence and plague in the air.
Damage won't disable items like Blink Dagger.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necrolyte_sadist_De: Necrophos slips into the realm that separates the living from the dead. Unable to attack or be attacked, he emits an aura that slows enemies around him. He takes additional magic damage in this form, but his restorative powers are amplified.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necrolyte_sadist_ab: Ghost Shroud is removed as soon as you cast any magic immune spells (Bladefury, Rage, etc.)
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necrolyte_sadist_Lo: Rotund'jere uses the souls of his victims as bridge from life to afterlife.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necrolyte_reapers_s: Stuns the target enemy hero, then deals damage based on how much life it is missing. If Necrophos kills an enemy this way, he'll permanently gain Health and Mana Regen. Any kill under this effect is credited to Necrophos.
The amount of death and suffering in the air increases the power of Necrophos's plague magic.
Damage is dealt at the end of the stun.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necrolyte_death_see: Spawns a fast moving large Death Pulse towards the target enemy or ally, causing the target to become ethereal. Reduces enemy magic resistance. Spreads towards nearby enemies and allies after impact.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_necrolyte_death_pu: Regening %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% health and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MANA_REGEN_CONSTANT% mana a second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_necrolyte_sadist_a: Slowing nearby enemies and amplifying your healing while taking increased magic damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_necrolyte_heartsto: Losing a percentage of health every second while near Necrophos.
Temporarily gaining %fMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% health regen and %fMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MANA_REGEN_CONSTANT% mana regen per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_necrolyte_reapers_: Frozen in the face of the Reaper.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_necrophos_death_se: Taking %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_DECREPIFY_UNIQUE%%% increased magic damage and cannot attack or be attacked.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_necrolyte_reapers_: Permanently granting %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% HP regen and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MANA_REGEN_CONSTANT% mana regen from kills.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slardar_sprint_Desc: Slardar slithers ahead, moving significantly faster and passing through units. Slardar gains movement speed bonus while in the river.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slardar_sprint_scep: Provides additional HP Regen, Armor and Status Resistance while in a puddle or in the river.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slardar_sprint_Lore: As Slardar has made the transition from the Deeps, it has been necessary to use his powerful tail for sprinting instead of swimming.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slardar_sprint_Note: Activating this skill doesn't interrupt channeling abilities.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slardar_slithereen_: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy units.  After the stun, the affected units are slowed.
Whenever Slardar casts Slithereen Crush, he creates a puddle of water that is considered a river for movement and bonuses.
Increases Slithereen Crush radius, and causes it to apply Corrosive Haze for a short time to units affected.
A swift crush of might and water breaks even the toughest of defenses.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slardar_bash_Descri: After %attack_count% attacks, your next attack will bash the target. Deals double damage against creeps.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slardar_bash_Lore: Thieves of the wealth of the Deep Ones meet the brutality of the Slithereen Guard in melee combat.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slardar_bash_Note0: Does not stack with Skull Basher.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slardar_bash_abilit: In Ability Draft, does stack with Skull Basher.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slardar_amplify_dam: Reduces enemy armor to amplify physical damage and provides True Sight and vision of the targeted unit, revealing invisibility. The enemy unit leaves a trail of water behind it for 8 seconds.
Even the strongest armor counts for little when left to the brine of the sea.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_slardar_sprint_riv: Increases movement speed in the river
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_slardar_amplify_da: Armor reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS%.\nProvides True Sight to Slardar.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_slithereen_crush_D: Affected by Slardar's Slithereen Crush. Move speed slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_slardar_bash_activ: Applies a bash every four attacks.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaster_wild_ax: Beastmaster sends his axes flying and calls them home again, slicing through enemy units and trees along their path.  Each axe can hit an enemy once, and amplifies subsequent damage from Beastmaster and his units.
While learning to maneuver in nature alone, the Beastmaster also mastered the use of a pair of tomahawks, adept at cutting down trees as well as adversaries.
Causes Wild Axes to have no cooldown and can be used again once they come back.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaster_call_of: Beastmaster calls forth a Boar to aid in the battlefield.
After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.
Beastmaster sends an invisible Hawk to scout an area.
Also grants Call of the Wild Boar. Accessible by toggling auto-cast.
Reduces Hawk cooldown by %bonus_AbilityCooldown% and Hawks gain Dive Bomb.
After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaster_hawk_di: Reveals itself for %abilitycastpoint% second, and then flies towards the target enemy, dealing damage and stunning it, killing the hawk.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaster_inner_b: Untaps the inner fury of nearby allies, passively increasing their attack speed.
Beastmaster's ability to incite the innate strength of animals was seen in the mauling of the king of Slom.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaster_primal_: Beastmaster lets loose a deafening roar that stuns, and shoves open a path to its target. All units in the path of the roar are damaged, while units shoved aside by the roar have their movement and attack speed slowed. Additionally, Beastmaster and his units gain %movement_speed%%% movement speed for 3 seconds.
Causes anyone that attacks a Primal Roar target to deal 1.3x Critical Strike.
The Beastmaster has learned to channel his primal instincts into an animalistic roar, causing devastation in the ranks of enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaster_hawk_in: If motionless for some time, the hawk becomes invisible.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaster_boar_po: Inflicts a poison that slows attack and movement speeds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaster_greater: Inflicts a poison that slows attack and movement speeds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_beastmaster_axe_st: Taking amplified damage from Beastmaster and his units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_beastmaster_primal: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_beastmaster_hawk_i: Hawk is not visible to enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_beastmaster_boar_p: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_venomancer_area_poi: Creates a %radius% AoE pool of poison at the target location, dealing another instance of Poison Nova damage and slows by 20%%. If an enemy dies in the area, a Plague Ward is spawned.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_venomancer_venomous: Launches a ball of venom in a line, poisoning enemy units so that they take both initial damage and damage over time, as well as suffering slowed movement.  Venomous Gale deals damage every 3 seconds over its duration.
Increases travel range, and when Venomous Gale impacts enemy Heroes, it creates Plague Wards around them.
A concoction of various stings, poisons, and toxins gathered from the jungles of Jidi Isle, victims surviving it are rare.
Venomous Gale can be lethal. Units afflicted by Venomous Gale can be denied when their HP drops below 25%.
Duration damage is dealt every %tick_interval% seconds.
Slow starts at %movement_slow%%%, and decreases as time passes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_venomancer_poison_s: Adds poison damage to Venomancer's normal attacks and slowing movement speed.
The paralytic sting of the creature which caused his transformation now belongs to the Venomancer.
Poison Sting damage can be lethal.
Damage from Poison Sting does not interrupt healing from items, nor does it activate the cooldown on Blink Dagger.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_venomancer_plague_w: Summons a plague ward to attack enemy units and structures. The ward is immune to magic. Wards gain the Poison Sting level from Venomancer, dealing 50% of the full damage.
A mixture of his old herbalist talents and newfound toxic mastery creates a living embodiment of plague.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_venomancer_poison_n: A spreading ring of poison that does damage over time to enemy units around Venomancer.  Poison Nova cannot deal lethal damage; targets will be left with at least 1 health.
In the Acid Jungles, creatures releasing noxious poison to their attackers is common; Venomancer spreads this plague beyond the Jidi Isle.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_venomancer_poison_: Slowing by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and ticking for %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% damage.
Slowing by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and ticking for %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% damage.
Slowing by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and ticking for %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_faceless_void_time_: Rushes to a target location while backtracking any damage taken the last %backtrack_duration% seconds.
Applies a Time Lock to all units at the landing destination.
Darkterror tears a hole in time, passing through Claszureme, and appearing back in an instant.
Faceless Void is invulnerable while using Time Walk.
Available for 1.5 seconds after landing Time Walk. If used in this period, you will reverse your time walk back to your previous cast location. Does not affect health or proc scepter hits.
Increases Time Walk cast range by %shard_bonus_range%.

Faceless Void traps all nearby enemies in a time dilation field for %duration% seconds, extending their cooldowns and slowing their movement and attack speed by %slow%%% for each cooldown extended. Deals damage per second for each cooldown.
For those facing off against Darkterror, each moment seems to stretch into eternity.
Adds the chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time while attacking it a second time.
The strike of the Faceless Void lands with dimension shifting force.
Does not stack with Skull Basher.
In Ability Draft, does stack with Skull Basher.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_faceless_void_chron: Creates a blister in spacetime, trapping all units caught in its sphere of influence and causes you to move very quickly inside it.  Only Faceless Void and any units he controls are unaffected.  Invisible enemies in the sphere will be revealed.
When a rift opens to Claszureme, all poor souls caught within will likely never return.
Pauses all units and buildings, friendly or enemy, except those owned by Faceless Void.
Faceless Void is never affected by Chronospheres with any owner.
Faceless Void can move freely within the Chronosphere without drafting Chronosphere and regardless of team.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_faceless_void_time: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
You have been locked in time by Faceless Void!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_faceless_void_chro: Trapped in spacetime. Unable to move or act.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_death_prophet_carri: Sends a swarm of winged beasts to savage enemy units in front of Death Prophet.
Krobelus' many trips to the grave gather a flock of the damned.
Can hit units up to 1110 range away.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_death_prophet_silen: Fires a projectile that prevents enemy units in a target area from casting spells.
Peering into the veil of her opponent's demise, Krobelus sees a silent future.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_death_prophet_spiri: Creates a spirit link between Death Prophet and an enemy unit, draining health from the enemy.

Increases Spirit Siphon charges by %shard_bonus_charges% and causes enemies to be feared for %shard_fear_duration% seconds if they are siphoned for %shard_consecutive_siphon_duration% seconds consecutively.
Cannot cast multiple on same target.
Krobelus willingly shows others the path she alone cannot follow.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_death_prophet_exorc: Unleashes evil spirits to drain the life of nearby enemy units and structures. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed in proportion to the damage dealt. Deals 50% damage to buildings. Lasts %abilityduration% seconds.

Whenever an enemy is affected by Death Prophet's spells or when she attacks an enemy, a ghost will fly out, slow and hit the enemy for an increased bonus of its usual damage then return to her with life.
Over time, the banshee remnants of her previous lives return to haunt the present.
Radius represents the area in which the spirits will acquire targets around Death Prophet.
Spirit damage isn't reduced by damage block abilities.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_death_prophet_spir: You may cast Spirit Siphon whenever there is a charge available.
Armor increased from siphoning an enemy.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pugna_nether_blast_: An exploding pulse deals damage to enemies and structures in the area.  Deals half damage to structures.
The Arts of Oblivion include a deafening blast of emerald flames from the Nether Reaches.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pugna_decrepify_Des: A powerful banishing spell that slows a unit and renders it unable to attack or be attacked. Afflicted units take extra magic damage. Can be cast while channeling.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pugna_decrepify_Lor: A now-mastered relic from his childhood, Pugna delights in banishing others into the Nether Realm, whether for good, evil, or simple enjoyment.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pugna_decrepify_Not: Only magical and pure damage can affect a unit under the effects of Decrepify.
Can be used on your Nether Ward.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pugna_nether_ward_D: Pugna places a Nether Ward at the target location. The ward will fire at any enemy hero who casts a spell dealing base damage plus the damage multiplier of the mana spent by the enemy hero. Heroes within its radius deal reduced damage from their spells.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pugna_nether_ward_L: While at the lamasery for the Arts of Oblivion, Pugna learned to dominate his classmates with a simple ward charged with Nether magic.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pugna_nether_ward_N: Nether Ward deals damage before the actual spell is cast, so if the caster dies the spell will have no effect.
Illusions and creeps deal 25% damage to Nether Ward.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pugna_life_drain_De: CHANNELED - When cast on an enemy, Pugna drains health from the target enemy unit to heal himself and granting vision over the target. If Pugna has full HP, and the enemy target is a Hero, Life Drain will restore mana instead.\n\nWhen cast on an ally, Pugna will drain his own health into his ally.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pugna_life_drain_sh: Life Drain can target your Nether Ward, causing life drain to refract to all enemy heroes within %abilitycastrange% units of the ward for %shard_damage_pct_from_ward%%% of its normal value. The effect is interrupted if the ward is destroyed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pugna_life_drain_Lo: Pugna has truly become more powerful than even the grandmaster of Oblivion.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pugna_life_drain_No: Health gained depends on the actual damage dealt.
Illusions are destroyed on the first tick of damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_pugna_decrepify_De: Slowing movement by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and increasing spell damage by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_DECREPIFY_UNIQUE%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_templar_assassin_re: Manipulating her psionic veil, Lanaya bends nature's law to her will.
Templar Assassin becomes highly elusive, avoiding damage and gaining a bonus to her damage.  The damage and avoidance effects are separate, and have a limited number of instances.
Damage as HP Removal bypasses Refraction (it won't reduce the charges).
Only instances of %damage_threshold% or more damage will trigger Refraction.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_templar_assassin_me: Lanaya is as elusive as her covenant with the Hidden Temple.

Templar Assassin conceals herself, becoming invisible as long as she remains still.  If Meld's invisibility is broken by attacking an enemy, Lanaya will deal bonus damage to the enemy and reduce their armor for %abilityduration% seconds.
Meld is broken by any action other than staying in position.
Meld's armor reduction does not work against towers.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_templar_assassin_ps: Her blades pierce the skin as much as the mind, furthering her understanding of the mystery that is reality.

Templar Assassin's psi blades slice through the attacked unit, splitting and damaging enemy units directly behind it, while gaining bonus attack range. For each unit it damages, the spill damage is reduced by a percentage.
Attack effects like Bash will only be applied to the main target.
Calling upon the reach of the Hidden Temple, none escape the eye of the Templar.

Templar Assassin places mystical traps that invisibly monitor enemy movement. When sprung at her command, they exert a slowing influence of %movement_speed_min%%% in the area. Traps charge up to slow %movement_speed_max%%% after %trap_max_charge_duration% seconds. Deals bonus damage when fully charged.
Increases max trap count and trap vision range.  When activated, traps now silence affected enemies.
They have invisibility that fades in over %trap_fade_time% seconds, spell immunity, and 100 HP.
Traps have 400/400 vision range and don't prevent neutral camps from spawning.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_templar_assassin_tr: Springs the nearest trap, slowing nearby enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_templar_assassin_se: Springs the trap, slowing nearby enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_templar_assassin_tr: Allows Templar Assassin to teleport to any Psionic Trap after channeling for %abilitychanneltime% seconds, detonating it upon arrival. Channeling Psionic Projection does not break Meld.
In reward for her service, Lanaya has been granted access to secrets that unlock new techniques for her psionic gifts.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_templar_assassin_t: Movement speed decreased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% up to %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_viper_poison_attack: Intensifies Viper's venom, adding an effect to his normal attack that applies a stacking movement speed slow and magic resistance deduction while dealing damage over time. Stacks up to %max_stacks% times.
Increases max stacks, and causes Poison Attack to lower armor per stack and to affect buildings for reduced damage.
The Netherdrake's inborn toxic breath quickly drains the vitality of its afflicted.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_viper_nethertoxin_D: Viper releases a Nethertoxin at the targeted area. Units in that area take an increasing damage over time based on how long they remain in it. Disables passives of affected units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_viper_nethertoxin_L: Poison from the Nether Reaches turns wounds into fatalities, and fatigue into death.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_viper_corrosive_ski: Viper exudes an infectious toxin that damages and slows the attack speed of any enemy that damages it in a %max_range_tooltip% radius. The acid exudate also increases Viper's resistance to magic.
It is not unusual for sword and shield alike to corrode in the very hands of those who attack the Netherdrake.
Stacks multiplicatively with other magic damage resistance sources.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_viper_viper_strike_: Viper slows the targeted enemy unit's movement and attack speed while also dealing poison damage over time.  The slowing effect reduces over the duration of the poison.
Once used to slay his sadistic summoner, the most powerful of Netherdrake infections spreads through the veins of those foolish enough to cross Viper.
Decreases mana cost and cooldown. Increases cast range.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_viper_poison_attac: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, magic resitance reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_BONUS%%%. Taking damage over time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_viper_viper_strike: Movement speed reduced by %fMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, attack speed reduced by %fMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_viper_nethertoxin_: Passive abilities disabled, and taking increasing damage over time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_lucent_beam_De: Calls a beam of lunar energy down upon an enemy, damaging and briefly stunning them.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_lucent_beam_sh: Lucent Beam has a reduced mana cost and may be ground targeted. The beam will strike the closest unit within the area of the targeted location, and an attack will also be launched on a random target in the area.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_lucent_beam_Lo: Selemene smites those who encroach upon the Nightsilver Woods.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_moon_glaive_De: Empowers Luna's glaives, causing her attacks to bounce between enemy units. Deals less damage with each bounce.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_moon_glaive_Lo: Carefully sharpened, Luna's boomerang-like weapon cuts a wide swath through enemy numbers.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_moon_glaive_No: Moon Glaives do not proc any attack modifier except Critical Strikes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_moon_glaive_ab: Moon Glaives work on all melee heroes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_lunar_blessing: The Goddess of the Moon smiles upon her kin.
Increases the attack damage for Luna and nearby allied heroes. Luna is also blessed with increased vision range at night.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_lunar_grace_Lo: The Goddess of the Moon smiles upon her kin.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_lunar_grace_De: Dispels negative buffs and grants you bonus attack speed. Has an increased effect during the night.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_eclipse_Lore: In times of great need, Selemene herself descends into the world, blocking out the light and hope of the opposed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_eclipse_Descri: Showers random nearby enemies with strikes from Luna's current level of Lucent Beam. These beams do not stun their targets, and there is a maximum number of times that a single target can be struck. Also turns day into night for %night_duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_eclipse_scepte: Allows Luna to cast Eclipse on an allied unit or herself and have its effects follow them, or cast it on an area. Also increases total beams and duration, removes the limit on beams per unit, and makes the beams appear twice as fast.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_eclipse_Note0: Eclipse doesn't work if Luna doesn't have any points in Lucent Beam.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_eclipse_Note1: Beams will stop if Luna is killed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_eclipse_Note3: There is a %beam_interval% seconds gap between beams, %beam_interval_scepter% seconds with scepter.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_eclipse_abilit: Must draft Lucent Beam as well to work.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_luna_eclipse_Descr: Striking nearby targets with Lucent Beam.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dragon_knight_breat: Unleashes a breath of fire in front of Dragon Knight that burns enemies and reduces the damage their attacks deal.
Knight Davion's breath has become that of the mighty Eldwurm Slyrak, remembered for burning numerous other knights to a crisp.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dragon_knight_drago: Dragon Knight smites an enemy unit in melee range with his shield, stunning it while dealing minor damage.  When in Elder Dragon Form, the cast range increases to %dragon_cast_range%.
Davion's combination of dragon talents and knightly skills makes him a vicious opponent in melee combat.
The life blood of the Dragon improves health regeneration and strengthens armor.
Slyrak's blood still courses through Davion's veins, giving him twice the vitality of an ordinary knight.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dragon_knight_elder:
Dragon Knight takes the form of one of three powerful elder dragons, increasing his speed, and Dragon Tail's range, while granting him new powers.
<font color="#9acd32">LEVEL 1 Green Dragon</font> - Corrosive Breath: attacks deal %corrosive_breath_damage% poison damage per second for %corrosive_breath_duration% seconds. Works on structures.
<font color="#ff0000">LEVEL 2 Red Dragon</font> - Splash Attack: attacks damage all enemy units in a %splash_radius% radius for %splash_damage_percent%%% damage, with Corrosive Breath added to the targets.
<font color="#87ceeb">LEVEL 3 Blue Dragon</font> - Frost Breath: slows movement speed by %frost_bonus_movement_speed%%% and attack speed by %frost_bonus_attack_speed% of enemy units in Splash Attack range for %frost_duration% seconds, with Corrosive Breath added to the targets.
Grants Elder Dragon Form the Fireball ability.

Increases the level of Dragon Knight's ultimate. Adds a 4th level, Black Dragon. Black Dragon has bonus Corrosive Damage, Splash Damage and Slow amount, 25% increased Magic Resistance and free pathing.
The dormant dragon power springs forth from within Davion, combining the powers of a legendary knight with a legendary Eldwurm.
Corrosive Breath poison damage is lethal.
Cooldowns of items that are different for ranged and melee units will be based on which form Dragon Knight was in when the item was used.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dragon_knight_fireb: Ignites an area, dealing damage over time that lingers on enemies in it. Has reduced cast range when melee.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_dragon_knight_corr: Applies damage over time on attack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_dragon_knight_spla: Splashes attack damage to nearby units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_dragon_knight_fros: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_seer_vacuum_De: Dark Seer creates a vacuum over the target area that sucks in enemy units, disrupting them and dealing damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_seer_vacuum_Lo: Ish'Kafel modifies the center of gravity to a place of his choosing.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_seer_vacuum_No: Pulls units over %duration% seconds before dealing damage.
Trees near the center of the vacuum will be destroyed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_seer_ion_shell: Surrounds the target unit with a bristling shield that damages enemy units in an area around it.
Causes Ion Shell to have %max_charges% Charges, increases duration by %scepter_bonus_duration% seconds and provides +%scepter_bonus_health% Health.
The Dark Seer slices holes into the 'Land Behind the Wall,' causing prismatic energy to seep forth.
Deals small amounts of damage in %tick_interval% second intervals.
Doesn't damage the target it is cast on.
If cast on a unit that already has Ion Shell, the new Shell replaces the old one.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_seer_surge_Des: Charges a target friendly unit with power, giving it a brief burst of movement speed and removes unit collisions. Allows the unit to reach maximum movement speed and cannot be slowed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_seer_surge_Lor: Ish'Kafel once used his speed of mind to navigate the maze between the walls.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_seer_surge_Not: Units with Surge cannot be slowed unless the Surge effect is removed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_seer_wall_of_r: Raises a wall of warping light that slows and creates replicas of any enemy hero who crosses it. Enemy replicas serve at the Dark Seer's will. Replicas last until they are destroyed, or until the wall's duration ends.
The Dark Seer, while unable to return to his natural realm, can channel part of the prismatic wall with powerful strength of mind, sowing confusion amongst enemy ranks.
Doesn't create illusions from other illusions.
There cannot be more than one illusion per player per wall.
Wall of Replica will not slow spell-immune enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_seer_normal_pu: Passive cooldown attack. Causes Dark Seer's next attack on a hero to have True Strike, knock an illusion out of the victim, damaging and stunning them based on how far Dark Seer has moved in the past %recent_duration% seconds. Max power is reached after %max_distance% distance moved.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_strafe_Descr: Clinkz channels and shoots multiple piercing arrows in the target direction that hit all enemy units dealing a percentage of Clinkz' attack damage and applying attack modifiers.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_strafe_Lore: It's hard to say whether the blur around the Bone Fletcher is from his flaming heart or his speed with the quiver.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_strafe_Note0: Bonus Attack Range increases the length of Burning Barrage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_searing_arro: Imbues Clinkz's arrows with fire for extra damage.
Clinkz simply lights his arrows from his flaming essence for quite the destructive effect.
Searing Arrows deal damage to structures.
The damage is directly added to Clinkz' attack damage, as physical damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_wind_walk_De: Clinkz moves invisibly through units until the moment he attacks or uses items.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_wind_walk_sh: Leaving Skeleton Walk creates %shard_skeleton_count% Burning Army Skeletons.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_wind_walk_Lo: With a burst of fire and puff of smoke, the Bone Fletcher was nowhere to be seen.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_death_pact_D: Clinkz consumes the target enemy unit or friendly unit, gaining max health and damage based on its current health. Does not take Clinkz out of Skeleton Walk.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_death_pact_a: Searing Arrows must also be drafted for Burning Army archers to have the extra damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_death_pact_L: Sutherex' bond of life and death has become a part of Clinkz, and his old bones are refreshed with repetition of the pact on lesser beings.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_death_pact_N: If the target is an enemy, Clinkz will gain the correct experience and gold.
Increases Clinkz' current and max HP.
When the duration ends, max HP returns to normal, but current HP stays the same.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_burning_army: Clinkz summons an army of fiery ranged skeleton archers. Archers are immobile and die with 2 attacks from a hero. Skeletons deal a percentage of Clinkz' damage, use his current Searing Arrows ability and attack only heroes. Attack range is equal to Clinkz's attack range.
Existing on the brink of life and death, Clinkz has learned to temporarily bridge the gap between the two.
Searing Arrows must be drafted for skeleton archers to have the extra damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_clinkz_wind_walk_D: Invisible, and movement speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%.  Can move through units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_clinkz_death_pact_: Max health increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_EXTRA_HEALTH_BONUS% and bonus damage increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PREATTACK_BONUS_DAMAGE%.
Permanently increased damage gained from killing heroes during Death Pact
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enchantress_untouch: Enchantress beguiles her enemies, slowing their attacks when she is attacked.
After attacking Aiushtha, most opponents are overwhelmed with guilt having attacked such a natural beauty.
All units who directly attack Enchantress will get slowed.
The slow is applied on the attacking unit when the attack starts, not when damage is applied.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enchantress_enchant: Enchantress charms an enemy. If the enemy is a hero, they are slowed. If the enemy is a creep, she brings it under her control, increasing its attack damage and max health. Only one creep can be controlled at a time.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
A true steward of the forest, Aiushtha befriends all within it - from lowly trolls to powerful centaurs.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enchantress_natures: A cloud of wisps heals Enchantress and any friendly units nearby. Lasts %abilityduration% seconds.
Adds %shard_permanent_wisp_count% permanent Nature's Attendants that follow Enchantress around.
Whimsical spirits of the woods possess a healing power that is quite subtle, but gains strength in numbers.
Units with full HP will not be selected for the heal.
Can heal units with spell immunity.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enchantress_impetus: Places an enchantment on each attack while activated, causing it to deal additional damage based on how far away the target is.  The farther the target, the greater the damage dealt. Deals double damage to creeps and illusions.
While Aiushtha favors peaceful means, she is capable of a magical onslaught from a distance, her spears gaining energy from the natural life around her.
The damage is capped at %distance_cap% distance.
Distance to target is measured when the projectile hits.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enchantress_bunny_h: Leaps backward, dodges incoming projectiles, and launches an Impetus attack on the %attack_targets% furthest enemy units within Enchantress' attack range + %bonus_attack_range%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_omniknight_purifica: Instantly heals a friendly unit and damages all nearby enemy units.
Priests of the Omniscience are adept at removing impurities from fellow warriors.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_omniknight_repel_De: Creates a divine barrier around an ally which grants them increased Status Resistance, Strength and Health Regeneration.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_omniknight_repel_Lo: When faced with the pit of sacrifice, Purist's resilience to magic was tested and affirmed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_omniknight_pacify_D: Causes affected enemies to deal less spell damage for a duration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_omniknight_pacify_L: When faced with the pit of sacrifice, Purist's resilience to magic was tested and affirmed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_omniknight_degen_au: Greatly degenerates the movement capabilities of enemy units that stray too near.
Does not affect Spell Immune units.
The holy embodiment of Purist Thunderwrath is enough to weaken those of lesser faith.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_omniknight_martyr_D: Applies a strong dispel on an ally and grants both them and Omniknight bonus Strength and HP Regen based on the amount of Debuffs dispelled.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_omniknight_martyr_L: The All Seeing One casts down his protection over those that Purist calls friend.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_omniknight_guardian: Omniknight calls upon a Guardian Angel that grants allies immunity from physical damage.
The All Seeing One casts down his protection over those that Purist calls friend.
Increases duration, provides Status Resist, radius becomes global and affects buildings.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_omniknight_hammer_o: Omniknight fires his hammer to a target to deal pure damage based on a percentage of his base damage and slows the target.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_omniknight_repel_D: Status resistance increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_STATUS_RESISTANCE_STACKING%%% , Strength increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_STATS_STRENGTH_BONUS%, Health Regen increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_huskar_inner_vitali: Unlocks the regenerative power of a friendly unit, with healing based upon its primary attribute. If the target is below 35%, it will heal faster.  Lasts %abilityduration% seconds.
While Huskar has little use for magic, this minor enchantment was learned from the Dazzle and the Dezun priests, to be used in times of great injury.
The HP percentage is checked every second and the regeneration adjusted accordingly.
Can be cast on Spell Immune units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_huskar_inner_fire_D: In a fiery rage, knocks all nearby enemies away from you to a fixed distance, dealing damage and disarming them.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_huskar_inner_fire_s: Lowers Inner Fire cooldown and causes it to apply a movement speed slow and heal Huskar for a percentage of the damage dealt to enemies. Can be cast while disabled.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_huskar_inner_fire_L: Not even Huskar's own flesh can contain the unending expansion of his life force.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_huskar_burning_spea: Huskar sets his spears aflame, dealing damage over time with his regular attack.  Multiple attacks will stack additional damage.  Each attack drains some of Huskar's health.
The Sacred Warrior ignites his weaponry after marking it with his own blood - causing far greater pain than he himself feels.
Burning Spear stacks additively when used multiple times on one target.  There is no cap.
Huskar cannot kill himself with this skill.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_huskar_berserkers_b: Huskar's injuries feed his power, giving increased attack speed, magic resistance and health regen based on missing health. Health regen is a percentage of your strength.
After losing his birthright, Huskar gained a lethality in physical combat that is only heightened as his own blood is spilled.
Bonuses are provided linearly, no bonus at Full HP and full bonus at strictly less than %hp_threshold_max%%% HP.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_huskar_life_break_D: Huskar draws upon his health to break an enemy's life, leaping at a targe to shatter a percentage of that hero's current health, and slowing them.  While leaping, Huskar is Spell Immune.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_huskar_life_break_s: Forces the enemy target to attack Huskar and increases cast range.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_huskar_life_break_L: No matter the danger, Huskar thrusts himself into melees that only he can survive.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_huskar_life_break_N: If Huskar is disabled during the charge or the target moves more than 1400 units in 0.015 seconds, the charge stops.
Slow works on Spell Immune units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_huskar_burning_spe: YOU ARE ON FIRE! Taking periodic damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_huskar_berserkers_: Attack Speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% and Magic Damage Resistance by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_BONUS%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_night_stalker_void_: Creates a damaging void that slows an enemy unit and deals damage. At night, Void also mini-stuns, interrupting channeling abilities, and the slowing effect lasts longer.
Void becomes an area of effect ability. Increases the mini-stun duration.
Balanar creates a vortex of infinite night, tearing opponents violently into the eternal darkness that once was.
Void does not ministun enemies during the day.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_night_stalker_cripp: Night Stalker horrifies all nearby enemies, causing them to become silenced while near him.  The effect lasts longer at night.
A vision of the twisted maw of Balanar etches itself into the minds of the poor souls unlucky enough to cross his path.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_night_stalker_hunte: Night Stalker is in his element at night, attacking and moving with great swiftness.
Hunter in the Night may be cast on a creep, instantly killing it and restoring some of Night Stalker's maximum health and mana. Cannot target ancients during the daytime. Cooldown: 20
The hunting prowess of Balanar improves as the night beckons.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_night_stalker_darkn: Night Stalker smothers the sun and summons instant darkness, so that he might use his powers at their fullest. Night Stalker gains flight and bonus damage during this time. Has unobstructed vision.
It is a humbling sight to see when the mightiest of warriors become afraid of the dark.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_night_stalker_void: Slows move speed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_night_stalker_dark: Temporarily turns day into night, granting flight, bonus damage and unobstructed vision.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_nightstalker_darkn: Causes you to have reduced vision.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_broodmother_spawn_s: Broodmother injects her young into an enemy unit, dealing damage. The spiderlings will hatch if the target is killed while under this influence.
Black Arachnia continues to raise her young, even amidst the field of combat.  The brood quickly learns how to support their mother.
If the target is killed within %buff_duration% seconds of being hit with this skill, the Spiderlings will spawn.
Units killed by Spiderlings will then give birth to Spiderites, smaller and less powerful versions of the Spiderlings.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_broodmother_sticky_: The slightest tremor of her web is all Arachnia needs to find her prey.

Broodmother may create up to %count% invisible web lines touching any existing web. Enemy Heroes that cross the web line will spring the trap, becoming rooted, revealed in fog, and take damage over time.  Multiple Heroes can trip on the same line until it's destroyed after being initially triggered.  Broodmother's team is alerted via the minimap when an enemy has triggered the snare.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_broodmother_spin_we: Spins a large web that grants Broodmother a passive movement speed increase, and boosts regeneration while in its vicinity, as well as giving free movement. Spin Web charges restore every %abilitychargerestoretime% seconds, with a max of %AbilityCharges% charges. Spin Web can be cast from anywhere as long as the new web touches an existing web. Webs never expire, and can be manually destroyed. When the maximum limit of webs is exceeded, the oldest web disappears. The movement bonus is proportional to the unit's HP
Weaving a bed of silken fibers, Arachnia's web both protects her and her offspring, as well as giving advancing opponents a sense of foreboding.
Increases movement speed, and increases Spin Web max count
Grants full movement speed bonus at 100% HP, 0% movement speed bonus at 1HP
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_broodmother_silken_: Slows the target enemy, causes them to miss and deals impact damage. Units that attack the target deal bonus magic damage.
Silken Bola becomes an area of effect spell and increases miss chance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_broodmother_incapac: Broodmother's venom cripples enemy units, causing her attacks to slow and giving the affected unit a chance to miss its attacks.
Paralytic toxins come from Black Arachnia's fangs, causing a slow and painful death to those who intrude on her webs.
The miss chance stacks with evasion and terrain dodge chance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_broodmother_insatia: A violent lust for vital fluids increases Broodmother's attack damage and gives her a vampiric attack.
While most of her prey is wrapped in silken cocoons and saved for her young, the Broodmother herself has a taste for wandering heroes.
Fully stacks with other sources of lifesteal.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_broodmother_spawn_s: Applies debuff on attack. If debuffed unit dies, a spiderite will spawn.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_broodmother_spawn_: If killed, will spawn a number of Spiderlings.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_broodmother_spin_w: Increasing health regen by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% and movement speed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%.
You may cast Spin Web whenever there is a charge available.
Slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% for taking damage while in a web
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_broodmother_incapa: Miss chance increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MISS_PERCENTAGE%%% and movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_broodmother_spawn_: If killed, will spawn a Spiderite.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_broodmother_poison: Ticking for %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% damage per second, slowing by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_broodmother_silken: Slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, taking bonus magic damage per enemy attack, and missing %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MISS_PERCENTAGE%%% of attacks.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bounty_hunter_shuri: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and mini-stunning the target.  The shuriken will bounce to any Tracked units who are within a %bounce_aoe% radius of each other.  Deals bonus damage to Tracked targets.
Increases cast range and applies Jinada on hit.
While the shuriken may be small, Gondar's precise aim can cause critical damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bounty_hunter_jinad: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, dealing bonus damage and stealing some unreliable gold.
Gondar's vast experience ensures he never walks away from a transaction empty-handed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bounty_hunter_wind_: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability.  If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will slow the target's movement speed.
