Shadow Walk has a reduced cooldown grants damage reduction while invisible.  Attacking to break invisibility will stun the target.
The court jesters present during King Goff's assassination can recount no other image than a dancing shadow.
Will not break most channeling of spells upon activation.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bounty_hunter_track: Tracks an enemy hero, granting True Sight of the target, and information on how much gold it is carrying. Bounty Hunter moves fast when near the tracked unit and deals critical strikes when attacking it. If the target dies, Bounty Hunter and nearby heroes collect a bonus bounty of gold. Casting Track does not take you out of invisibility.

Allows Track to be ground targeted, creating a Bear Trap. After 3 seconds, the trap becomes invisible and active. Walking over the trap applies Track. Traps have 400 vision. Max Traps: 8. Ground targeting with Track has bonus 1200 range.
Using his elevated senses of sight and smell, Gondar's hits have quite a good chance of success.
Bounty Hunter will get the bonus gold if the target dies while Track is active, regardless of how it died.
Track's effect is only visible to allies.
You can see the amount of gold the target is carrying by mousing over the debuff icon above the target's ability bar.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_bounty_hunter_jina: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_weaver_the_swarm_De: Weaver launches a swarm of %count% young Weavers that latch on any enemy unit in their path, attacking and reducing armor until it is killed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_weaver_the_swarm_Lo: Skitskurr opens a gap in the space time fabric, allowing young Weavers to slip through and aid him in combat.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_weaver_the_swarm_No: When a beetle latches on a target, it will remain there until it is killed or the duration expires.
Beetles are Spell Immune, but can be killed in %destroy_attacks% attacks from a unit. Heroes deal double damage to beetles.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_weaver_the_swarm_sh: Reduces cooldown by %shard_cooldown_reduction% seconds, and causes The Swarm to latch onto and reveal invisible units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_weaver_shukuchi_Des: Weaver shifts out of visibility, gaining max movement speed --doing harm to any enemies it passes through.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_weaver_shukuchi_Lor: As the Weavers worked in the fabric of creation, small wormholes allowed them to slip through time to better work their craft.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_weaver_shukuchi_Not: Can only damage the same unit once per cast.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_weaver_geminate_att: Allows Weaver to dispatch two attacks at once.
Skitskurr's relationship with time is somewhat variable, causing his actions to be witnessed - and felt - more than once.
Additional attacks leave Weaver %delay% seconds after the previous one, and have no range limit.
Geminate Attack will also hit units within %shard_beetle_search_range% range of the original target that have The Swarm beetles attached to them.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_weaver_time_lapse_D: Weaver warps backward to whatever position it was in five seconds earlier--regaining the HP and mana from that time. No effect on cooldown, gold or experience.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_weaver_time_lapse_L: If Skitskurr does not deem the current reality of the world to fit his desires, he simply crawls back in time to right what was wronged.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_weaver_time_lapse_N: Removes most negative buffs from Weaver.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_weaver_time_lapse_s: Time Lapse may target allied Heroes with %abilitycastrange% cast range.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_weaver_shukuchi_De: Invisible and doing damage to units passed through.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_jakiro_dual_breath_: An icy blast followed by a wave of fire launches out in a path in front of Jakiro. The ice slows enemies, while the fire delivers damage over time.
Pyrexae dragons have tremendously dangerous breath for each branch of the species; combining them is unimaginable.
Can hit units up to 1025 range away.
Has a %fire_delay% second interval between each breath.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_jakiro_ice_path_Des: Creates a path of ice that stuns and damages enemies that touch it.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_jakiro_ice_path_Lor: Jakiro's cunning right head calls upon its frozen heritage, glazing the earth with blistering cold.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_jakiro_ice_path_Not: It takes %path_delay% seconds for the path to reach its full extent.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_jakiro_liquid_fire_: Jakiro burns his enemies in an area of effect with fire added to his attack, while slowing their attacks. Deals 75% damage to buildings.
The left maw of Jakiro opens, laying waste to any in its path.
Works on both units and buildings.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_jakiro_liquid_ice_D: Jakiro adds a frost effect to his attack, stunning enemies. Enemies hit are slowed and receive a percent their max health per second plus a base amount as damage every %tick_rate% second for %duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_jakiro_macropyre_De: Jakiro exhales a wide line of lasting flames, which deals damage per second to any enemy units caught in the fire.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_jakiro_macropyre_sc: Increases Macropyre distance by +%scepter_bonus_range% range, duration by +%scepter_bonus_duration% seconds and causes it to become Pure damage and pierce Spell Immunity.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_jakiro_macropyre_Lo: Ice and fire combine to rip the battlefield to shreds with extreme temperatures.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_jakiro_macropyre_No: Units hit by Macropyre will continue to be affected after they leave the area for %linger_duration% additional seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_jakiro_ice_path_st: Being frozen by Jakiro's Ice Path
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_jakiro_liquid_fire: Taking damage and being slowed by Jakiro's Liquid Fire
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_jakiro_liquid_ice_: Move speed decreased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and taking %fMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP%%% of maximum health in damage per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_jakiro_dual_breath: Affected by Jakiro's Dual Breath. Move speed slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Taking damage from Jakiro's Dual Breath
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_jakiro_macropyre_b: Affected by Jakiro's Macropyre and being damaged every second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_batrider_sticky_nap: Drenches an area in sticky oil, amplifying damage from Batrider's attacks and abilities and slowing the movement speed and turn rate of enemies in the area.  Additional casts of Sticky Napalm continue to increase damage, up to %max_stacks% stacks.
It's not uncommon to hear the Rider cackle while he increases the flammability of his opponents.
All damage from Batrider gets amplified, except for Radiance, Orb of Venom, Urn of Shadows, and Spirit Vessel.
Sticky napalm does not require turning to cast.
Sticky napalm deals %creep_damage_pct%%% damage to creeps.
Flaming Lasso no longer disarms you. Your attacks have a %shard_napalm_on_attack_chance_pct%%% chance to apply a stack of Sticky Napalm.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_batrider_flamebreak: Hurls an explosive cocktail that explodes when it reaches the target location, knocking back, and dealing damage over time to enemies in the area.
Causes Flamebreak to have two charges and apply a Sticky Napalm charge on impact.
A molotov cocktail is the weapon of choice for Batrider.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_batrider_firefly_De: Batrider takes to the skies, laying down a trail of flames from the air.  The fire damages any enemies it touches, and destroys trees below Batrider. Batrider has bonus day/night vision while Firefly is active.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_batrider_firefly_Lo: When an enemy escapes into the Yama Raskav Jungle, most would cut through the brush to find the fugitive.  Batrider just chooses to destroy the jungle along with his foes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_batrider_firefly_No: During this the Batrider can fly above units, trees and impassable terrain.
If duration ends when above impassable terrain, the Batrider can get stuck.
The trail persists through Batrider's death.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_batrider_flaming_la: Lassoes an enemy and drags them in Batrider's wake. Dragged units cannot move, attack, or use abilities.  Teleporting or blinking will break the lasso.
Flaming Lasso grabs both its target, as well as the target's nearest allied hero within %grab_radius_scepter% units. The secondary target is tethered to the first.
Few dare to ask to ride on the bat, as Batrider gives them free of charge.
Killing the target or the Batrider will break the lasso before its expiration.
If Batrider moves more than 425 units in 0.05 seconds the lasso breaks.
Batrider cannot attack while using Flaming Lasso.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_batrider_sticky_na: Increasing napalm-caster's damage by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP%.\nSlowing turn rate by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TURN_RATE_PERCENTAGE%%%.\nSlowing movement speed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_batrider_firefly_D: Flying and laying down fiery destruction in your wake.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_batrider_flaming_l: Cannot attack while Lasso is active.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_penitence_Desc: Forces an enemy unit to move slower and for allies to attack it more quickly.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_penitence_Lore: Although Chen's brand of animal enthrallment isn't quite strong enough to control the minds of enemy heroes, it still tests their resolve in combat.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_divine_favor_D: Passively provides an aura that grants increased health regeneration and armor.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_divine_favor_L: Chen's zeal is infectious, blessing his allies with vitality and compelling them to his side.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_test_of_faith_: Deals random damage to test an enemy unit's faith. Heals a random amount to allied units. Always applies the maximum effect when cast on yourself.
Knights of the Fold possess a fanatical form of magic that is considered quite unwieldy by most other users of arcane arts.

Teleports an allied unit back to the base.  Creeps are teleported instantly, while Heroes have a delay before teleporting. If cast on Chen, all units controlled by Chen through Holy Persuasion will be teleported to him after a delay.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_holy_persuasio: Chen takes control of an enemy or neutral creep. If the persuaded creep's base health is naturally below the health minimum, its base health will be raised to the health minimum. Converted creeps will have increased movement speed and bonus damage. \n\nCan be cast on converted creeps to teleport them to Chen. If cast on Chen, all units controlled by Chen will be teleported to him. Taking damage will dispel the buff.
Allows Holy Persuasion to target Ancient Creeps. Can control up to 1/2/3 Ancient Creeps based on Hand of God's level.
Max number of Ancient Creeps controlable equal to level of ultimate.
Although they may not be knights, Chen incorporates beasts into the Fold in the same way he himself was converted.
Persuading a new creep above max unit count causes the oldest persuaded creep to die.
Can target Ancient Creeps when Chen has Aghanim's Shard.
The health of creeps already under Chen's control does not update to the new level upon leveling Holy Persuasion further.
Fully restores the creep's mana upon converting.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_hand_of_god_sc: Applies a Strong Dispel to all allies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_hand_of_god_De: Heals all allied heroes on the map as well as all units under Chen's control. A large heal is applied at first and a slow heal over time is applied for %hot_duration% afterwards.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_hand_of_god_Lo: Using the mental link with his thralls, Chen calls down restoration and well-being to those who share his fanaticism.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_hand_of_god_No: Can heal invulnerable and hidden/banished allies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_chen_penitence_Des: Reducing movement speed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and increasing speed of incoming attacks.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_chen_divine_favor_: Gaining %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% health regen, and increasing armor by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_spectral_da: Spectre flings a dagger to draw a Shadow Path, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed of any enemies along the trail. Units hit by the dagger also trail a Shadow Path. While treading the path, Spectre phases through otherwise impassable terrain.
Mercurial's dagger eclipses the physical plane in shadow, a state in which mortals cower, but spectres thrive.
There is a %dagger_grace_period% second grace period after leaving the path where no collision is preserved.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_desolate_De: Deals bonus damage whenever Spectre attacks an enemy that does not have any allied units within a %radius% radius around them.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_desolate_Lo: Often times, warriors find themselves alone with a vision of Mercurial - the fated question is if it is the true Spectre.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_desolate_No: Damage is dealt before Spectre's attack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_dispersion_: Every %shard_dagger_damage% damage absorbed will trigger a Spectral Dagger to be launched at the last player-controlled attacker, occuring a max of once every %shard_dagger_cooldown% seconds.
Damage done to Spectre is reflected on her enemies, leaving her unharmed. The effect lessens with distance.
Haunt must also be drafted for Shard upgrade to work.
A daunting task lies before enemies of Mercurial - killing a shadow with blade and magic.
The reflected damage is not dealt to Spectre.
Damage is reflected before reductions, and is returned as the same damage type.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_haunt_Descr: Creates a spectral nemesis to attack each enemy hero. At any moment during the duration, Spectre can use Reality to exchange places of a given haunt.\n\nHaunt illusions are uncontrollable, take extra damage, and deal less damage than Spectre herself.  They ignore terrain.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_haunt_Lore: At the height of combat, Mercurial's physical manifestation shatters, and the shadowy pieces haunt those who still cling to life.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_reality_Des: Spectre exchanges places with a chosen Haunt.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_reality_Lor: The scattered shadows unite into the one true Spectre.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_haunt_singl: Allows Spectre to perform a single target unit Haunt. Casts a Spectral Dagger on the target.
With great focus of will, Mercurial can sometimes limit the extent of her division.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_spectre_spectral_d: Hit by dagger, creating shadow path
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_doom_bringer_devour: Consumes an enemy or neutral creep, acquiring any special abilities that it possessed and gaining armor temporarily while it digests the creep. If autocast is deactivated, Doom will not acquire the creep's abilities. Duration is equal to the cooldown.
Allows Devour to be cast on enemy heroes, reducing their maximum health by 15%  for the duration of the devour and provides Doom with a passive basic ability they have.
Devour will only acquire the passive abilities that the creep possessed. If Rearm is drafted and cast, this ability's cooldown will not be reset.
Lucifer's appetite and greed are never sated.
Gives Doom the original bounty of the creep, along with the bonus gold.
If you devour a creep without abilities, you'll keep the abilities you had previously.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_doom_bringer_scorch: Carpets the nearby earth in flames which damage enemies, while also granting him increased movement speed.
The Fallen One spreads destruction in his wake, sparing none from the flame which sustains him.
Scorched Earth follows Doom, centered on his location.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_doom_bringer_infern: Doom swings his burning sword, igniting the enemy. Stuns for %ministun_duration% seconds and applies a %burn_duration% second burn that deals a base damage plus a percentage of the target's Max HP as damage per second.
Infernal Blade stun duration is increased. If the enemy's level is a multiple of 3, or above level 24, they will be stunned for a longer duration and take bonus damage.
Lucifer shares the fire branding bestowed upon him at the time of his exile.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_doom_bringer_doom_D: Inflicts a curse that dispels an enemy Hero and prevents an them from casting spells or using items, while taking damage over time.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_doom_bringer_doom_s: Increases Doom duration and applies Break.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_doom_bringer_doom_L: When a name is tolled from the bell of Vashundol, doom is sure to follow.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_doom_bringer_doom_N: Units afflicted by Doom can be denied when their HP drops below 25%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_doom_bringer_empty1: This slot will be replaced with abilities acquired using Devour.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_doom_bringer_empty2: This slot will be replaced with abilities acquired using Devour.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_empty1_Descr: This slot will be replaced with abilities acquired using Death Pact.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_doom_bringer_devou: Still digesting that delicious creep and enjoying bonus armor.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_doom_bringer_scorc: Damaging over time, increasing Doom's movement speed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%.
Damaging enemies over time, increasing Doom's movement speed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_doom_bringer_doom_: Silenced, cannot use items, and being burned for %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% damage per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ancient_apparition_: Places a frozen hex on an enemy unit that deals damage over time, but can be dispelled by moving away from the initial cast point.  If the enemy unit doesn't move outside of the given range, it will be stunned and frozen in place after 4 seconds.
Kaldr's presence draws those around him into a frozen void, threatening to lock them in an icy prison for eternity.
Creates a vortex of icy energy that slows and increases magic damage done to enemies in its range.
Causes Ice Vortex to deal damage over time and slow enemy attack speed in the area.
Frozen, caustic winds are at the whim of Kaldr, chilling the field of battle.
Provides vision in a small area where it is placed.
Enhances Ancient Apparition's attack with increased range, heavy magic damage, and movement slow.
The Ancient Apparition's eternal knowledge brings a frigid enchantment to his attacks.
Removes cooldown and reduces manacost by %bonus_AbilityManaCost%%%.

Launches a tracer toward any location on the battlefield, which must be triggered again to mark the area to be blasted by a damaging explosion of hail. The further the tracer travels, the larger the explosion will be. Enemies caught in the explosion, or who touch the icy ball of hail as it travels, are Frostbitten, taking damage and prevented from regenerating or healing. If a Frostbitten unit's health drops below a certain percentage, they will instantly shatter.
Ice storms from ages past flow through Kaldr's frosty limbs, crashing into the world and turning its inhabitants into monuments to his eternal power.
Upon cast, this ability is replaced by Release, used to stop the tracer on the target area.
The area of effect is %radius_min% + %radius_grow%*TimeTraveled, capped at %radius_max%.  The freeze area along the path is %path_radius%.
Kill will be granted to the source of the damage that triggers the shatter.
The shatter effect doesn't work on illusions.
The HP Freeze prevents most kinds of healing, including the fountain, except Sunder, Time Lapse and Supernova.
Releases the ice blast to explode at the tracer's current location.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cold_feet_Descript: Taking periodic damage, if you don't move you will be frozen in place
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ice_vortex_Descrip: Slowed, will take additional damage from magic
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_chilling_touch_Des: Attacks deal additional magic damage and cause enemies to be slowed briefly.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ice_blast_Descript: Taking damage over time and cannot heal or regenerate health.  Will instantly shatter if health drops too low.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ursa_earthshock_Des: Ursa leaps forward %hop_distance% units and slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and slow all enemy units in a nearby area for %abilityduration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ursa_earthshock_sha: Earthshock applies a %shard_enrage_duration% second Enrage on Ursa when cast.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ursa_earthshock_Lor: The very steps of a male ursine shake the ground as well as the resolve of opposing warriors.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ursa_overpower_Lore: For a behemoth of his size, Ursa is deceptively nimble.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ursa_overpower_Desc: Using his skill in combat, Ursa gains increased attack speed for a number of subsequent attacks.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ursa_overpower_Note: Overpower isn't removed by Black King Bar.
Missing an attack still consumes a charge of Overpower.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ursa_fury_swipes_Lo: In nature, the wounded rarely survive the attacks of hungry predators.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ursa_fury_swipes_De: Ursa's claws dig deeper wounds in the enemy, causing consecutive attacks to the same enemy to deal more damage.  If the same target is not attacked after %bonus_reset_time% seconds, the bonus damage is lost.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ursa_enrage_Lore: Ulfsaar succumbs to his ancient spirit, becoming the most ferocious creature on the battlefield.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ursa_enrage_Descrip: Ursa goes into a frenzy, providing damage reduction and status resistance. Removes any existing debuffs.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ursa_enrage_scepter: Reduces cooldown and allows Ursa to use Enrage while disabled.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ursa_fury_swipes_d: Taking an extra %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% damage from Ursa's attacks
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_fountain_fury_swip: Taking increasingly more damage from the fountain each time you are attacked
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gyrocopter_rocket_b: Launches a salvo of rockets at nearby enemy units in a radius around the Gyrocopter.  Lasts %abilityduration% seconds.
Aurel's new craft has an increased payload for rockets, enhancing their rapid-fire capabilities.
Rocket Barrage can't hit units Gyrocopter has no vision over.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gyrocopter_homing_m: Fires a homing missile to seek the targeted enemy unit. The missile gains speed over time, dealing damage and stunning when it impacts the target. Enemy units can destroy the missile before it reaches its target.

Homing Missiles now constantly fires the current level of Rocket Barrage in a %shard_radius% area of effect after %shard_delay% second of being cast. This Rocket Barrage prioritizes the Homing Missile target.
The biggest missile Aurel could possibly attach to his craft, The Bomb™ has carefully calculated aerodynamics and explosives for maximum impact.
Towers do half damage to the missile.
The crosshair effect is visible to allies only.
The missile will follow and hit invisible units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gyrocopter_flak_can: Gyrocopter's attacks hit all enemy units in an area around it for a limited number of attacks.  Only the main target of attacks will receive attack bonuses such as Critical Strike.  Lasts %abilityduration% seconds or until the attacks are used.
Adds a Side Gunner that at random attacks enemy units near Gyrocopter. Prioritizes furthest unit away within its range.
This newly revamped Gyrocopter has attached enough armaments to assault in a 360 degree radius.
Attack range for the primary attack is unchanged.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gyrocopter_call_dow: Call down an aerial missile strike on enemy units in a target area. After %missile_delay_tooltip% seconds, two missiles arrive in succession, with %missile_delay_tooltip% seconds between them.
The visual indicator is visible to allies only.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spirit_breaker_char: Barathrum erupts from the darkness with unwieldy force.

Spirit Breaker fixes his sight on an enemy unit and starts charging through all objects.  All enemy units passed through and the targeted unit will be hit by a Greater Bash.  If the targeted unit dies, Spirit Breaker will change his target to the nearest enemy unit to that location.
Spirit Breaker passes through trees, cliffs, and units.
The charge indicator is visible only to allies.
Spirit Breaker gains shared vision of the target.
Reduces Charge of Darkness cooldown, cast point and makes it pierce magic immunity.
No other units will be hit by Greater Bash if it's not drafted as well. Target of Charge of Darkness will be stunned on impact even without Greater Bash.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spirit_breaker_bull: Spirit Breaker gains movement speed and status resistance to ram through enemies. Can be used while charging.
Barathrum warps the fabric of reality around him, lessening its influence on his physical form.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spirit_breaker_empo: Aspiring heroes gain speed and power from simply observing the Spirit Breaker's dominance on the battle field.

Causes Spirit Breaker to gain power with higher movement speed. His presence increases the movement speed of nearby allied units. Can be cast to improve the movement speed bonus for %duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spirit_breaker_grea: The signature strike of Barathrum's ghostly ball and chain.
Gives a chance to stun and knockback an enemy unit on an attack. Deals a percentage of movement speed as damage. Deals 1.5x damage to creeps.
Does not stack with Skull Basher.
In Ability Draft, does stack with Skull Basher.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spirit_breaker_neth: Barathrum temporarily returns to the realm from where he came, bringing with him the retribution of both worlds.

Spirit Breaker slips into the nether realm, reappearing next to his hapless victim. Upon reappearing, a Greater Bash of the current level occurs and deals bonus damage. Knocks back for double the normal distance.
Causes Nether Strike to grant spell immunity, and deal extra damage and apply Break.
Spirit Breaker appears behind the target to deliver the bash.
Greater Bash must be drafted for stun.  Bonus damage still applies without Greater Bash.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_spirit_breaker_bul: Gaining %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% movement speed and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_STATUS_RESISTANCE_STACKING%%% status resistance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alchemist_acid_spra: Sprays high-pressure acid across a target area. Enemy units who step across the contaminated terrain take damage per second and have their armor reduced.
Using traditional Alchemy from the Darkbrew family, Razzil concocts an acid that dissolves even the toughest metals.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alchemist_unstable_: Throw it before it blows up!
A silver lining to the failure of turning a mountain into gold, this volatile solution has destructive potential.

Alchemist brews up an unstable concoction that he can throw at an enemy hero, to stun and deal damage in an area around the explosion. The longer the concoction brews, the more damage it deals and the longer the stun. Alchemist is faster while charging the concoction. After %brew_time% seconds, the brew reaches its maximum damage and stun time. However, after %brew_explosion% seconds, the concoction will explode on Alchemist himself if not thrown.
While brewing, this ability is replaced by Unstable Concoction Throw.  Alchemist can move and act normally while brewing.
A timer above Alchemist's head will indicate the remaining brew time. This timer is visible to enemies.
You can deny yourself with this skill.
Unstable Concoction cannot be disjointed and once thrown Unstable Concoction stops brewing.
Unstable Concoction explosion damages heroes and creeps.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alchemist_goblins_g: Chemical Rage Aghanim's Scepter has been moved to Greevil's Greed for Ability Draft. Use Aghanim's Scepter on an allied hero to grant them all Aghanim's Scepter upgrades. When you have a Scepter of your own, you will gain bonus damage and spell amplification for each gifted Scepter.

Alchemist synthesizes additional gold from his enemies and bounty runes. With each kill, Alchemist earns base bonus gold and extra bonus gold. If Alchemist kills another unit which yields gold within the next %duration% seconds, an additional instance of Extra Bonus Gold is added to the total. Additionally, causes bounty runes to yield more gold.
While it is not a mountain, Razzil has mastered the conversion of smaller compounds to line his pockets.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alchemist_chemical_: Alchemist causes his Ogre to enter a chemically induced rage, reducing base attack cooldown and increasing movement speed and health regeneration.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

Alchemist melts down Aghanim's Scepter to grant an allied hero all Aghanim's Scepter upgrades. When you have a Scepter of your own, you will gain bonus damage and spell amplification for each gifted Scepter.
Chemical Rage Aghanim's Scepter has been moved to Greevil's Greed for Ability Draft. Getting Aghanim's Scepter for Chemical Rage does not grant any bonuses.
The brew Razzil gave to the Ogre during their prison bust has become a useful potion in the midst of combat.
Has a %transformation_time% second transformation time, which can be used to dodge projectiles and stuns.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alchemist_berserk_p: Alchemist throws a potion at an ally, applying a basic dispel and giving them attack speed, movement speed and HP regen.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_alchemist_acid_spr: Taking periodic damage, armor reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_alchemist_goblins_: Grants bonus gold when you kill units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_alchemist_chemical: Reducing attack time to %fMODIFIER_PROPERTY_BASE_ATTACK_TIME_CONSTANT%, increasing health regeneration by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT%, increasing movement speed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_ultimate_scep: Permanently granted Aghanim's Scepter hero upgrade.
Permanently granted Aghanim's Scepter hero upgrade and Aghanim stat bonuses.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_alchemist_scepter_: Gaining %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PREATTACK_BONUS_DAMAGE% bonus attack damage and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_SPELL_AMPLIFY_PERCENTAGE%%% bonus spell amplification from Aghanim scepters granted to allies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_alchemist_berserk_: Grants bonus attack speed and health regen.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_quas_Descri: Allows manipulation of ice elements. Passively grants +2 Strength per level. Each <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font> instance provides increased health regeneration.\n
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_quas_shard_: Quas provides +10% Spell Lifesteal per instance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_quas_Note0: Invoker can only have 3 of any instance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_wex_Descrip: Allows manipulation of storm elements. Passively grants +2 Agility per level. Each <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font> instance provides increased attack speed and movement speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_wex_shard_d: Wex provides +100 Cast Range per instance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_wex_Note0: Invoker can only have 3 of any instance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_exort_Descr: Allows manipulation of fire elements. Passively grants +2 Intelligence per level. Each <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font> instance provides increased attack damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_exort_shard: Exort provides +5% Spell Amplification per instance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_exort_Note0: Invoker can only have 3 of any instance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_empty1_Desc: Casting Invoke will replace this slot with one of ten unique spells based on Invoker's currently active <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>, <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>, and <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font> buffs.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_empty2_Desc: Casting Invoke will replace this slot with one of ten unique spells based on Invoker's currently active <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>, <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>, and <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font> buffs.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_invoke_Desc:
Combines the properties of the elements currently being manipulated to create a new spell for Invoker to use. Invoke cooldown is reduced by %cooldown_reduction_per_orb% seconds for each orb level.

Click the help button to see the list of possible spells.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_invoke_Lore: So begins a new age of knowledge.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_invoke_Note: The arrangement of instances does not matter.
Invoke will not cost mana or go on cooldown if the only effect is to swap the positions of existing spells.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_cold_snap_D: Invoker draws the heat from an enemy, chilling them to their very core for a duration based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>. The enemy will take damage and be briefly frozen. Further damage taken in this state will freeze the enemy again, dealing bonus damage. The enemy can only be frozen so often, but the freeze cooldown decreases based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_cold_snap_N: The freeze stun only triggers on damage greater than %damage_trigger% after reductions.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_ghost_walk_: Invoker manipulates the ice and electrical energies around him, rendering his body invisible. The elemental imbalance created as a consequence slows nearby enemies based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>, and slows Invoker as well based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>.
The slow effect does not work on Spell Immune enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_tornado_Des: Unleashes a fast moving tornado that picks up enemy units in its path, suspending them helplessly in the air shortly before allowing them to plummet to their doom. Travels further based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>. Holds enemies in the air for a duration based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>. Deals base damage plus added damage based on levels in <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_tornado_Not: Units are invulnerable while affected by Tornado, and the damage is dealt when landing.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_emp_Descrip: Invoker builds up a charge of electromagnetic energy at a targeted location which automatically detonates after %delay% seconds. The detonation covers an area, draining mana based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>. Deals damage for each point of mana drained.  If EMP drains mana from an enemy hero, Invoker gains 50% of the mana drained.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_emp_Note0: Will not affect cycloned units (Tornado or Eul's Scepter of Divinity).
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_alacrity_De: Invoker infuses an ally with an immense surge of energy, increasing their attack speed based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font> and their damage based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_chaos_meteo: Invoker pulls a flaming meteor from space onto the targeted location. Upon landing, the meteor rolls forward, constantly dealing damage based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>, and rolling further based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>. Units hit by the meteor will also be set on fire for a short time, receiving additional damage based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>.
Causes %meteor_count% extra Chaos Meteors to land alongside the primary cast at slight angles. Reduces cooldown by %AbilityCooldown% seconds.
Deals main damage to enemy units under meteor every %damage_interval% seconds and burns enemies for smaller damage over %burn_duration% seconds.
The meteor moves at a speed of %travel_speed%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_sun_strike_: Sends a catastrophic ray of fierce energy from the sun at any targeted location, incinerating all enemies standing beneath it once it reaches the earth. Deals damage based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>, however this damage is spread evenly over all enemies hit.

Creates a Cataclysm when Sun Strike is double tapped. Puts it on a %cataclysm_cooldown% second cooldown. Creates %cataclysm_count% visible Sun Strikes within %cataclysm_min_range%-%cataclysm_max_range% range of each enemy hero. Additionally Increases the level of Quas, Wex and Exort by 1.
Gives vision of the target area before the strike.
Invoker gains experience with kills made from Sun Strike, even if made from outside of experience range.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_forge_spiri: Invoker forges a spirit embodying the strength of fire and fortitude of ice. Damage and armor are based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font> while attack range, health, and duration are based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>. The elemental's scorching attack is capable of melting the armor of enemy heroes. Spawns two spirits when Quas and Exort are at least level 4.
Casting this ability will replace currently summoned Forged Spirits.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_forged_spirit_melti: Melts away the armor of heroes hit by the spirit's attack. Each successive hit increases the amount of armor melted.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_ice_wall_De: Generates a wall of solid ice directly in front of Invoker for a duration based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>. The bitter cold emanating from it greatly slows nearby enemies based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font> and deals damage each second based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_ice_wall_sh: Allows Ice Wall to be a Vector Target ability with 1100 cast range. Increases wall length by 320.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_ice_wall_No: The slow will still affect Spell Immune enemies if their spell immunity was created after being affected by Ice Wall.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_deafening_b: Invoker unleashes a mighty sonic wave in front of him, dealing damage to any enemy unit it collides with based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>. The sheer impact from the blast is enough to knock those enemy units back for a duration based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>, then disarm their attacks for a duration based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_invoker_quas_insta: Health regeneration increased by %fMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_invoker_wex_instan: Movement speed increased by %fMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_invoker_cold_snap_: When damaged, will take additional damage and will be frozen briefly.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_invoker_ghost_walk: Invisible, movement speed changed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, and slowing nearby enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_invoker_tornado_De: Swept up in a tornado. Invulnerable but cannot act. Will take damage upon landing.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_invoker_alacrity_D: Attack speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% and damage increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PREATTACK_BONUS_DAMAGE%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_invoker_ice_wall_s: Slowed by the wall of ice.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_invoker_deafening_: Reeling back from the deafening blast.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_cold_snap_a: Invoker draws the heat from an enemy, chilling them to their very core for a duration. The enemy will take damage and be briefly frozen. Further damage taken in this state will freeze the enemy again, dealing bonus damage. The enemy can only be frozen so often, but the freeze cooldown decreases as the level goes up.
The freeze stun only triggers on damage greater than %damage_trigger% after reductions.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_ghost_walk_: Invoker manipulates the ice and electrical energies around him, rendering his body invisible. The elemental imbalance created as a consequence slows nearby enemies, and slows Invoker as well based on the level.
The slow effect does not work on Spell Immune enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_tornado_ad_: Unleashes a fast moving tornado that picks up enemy units in its path, suspending them helplessly in the air shortly before allowing them to plummet to their doom. Travels further based on the level and holds enemies in the air for a duration.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
Units are invulnerable while affected by Tornado, and the damage is dealt when landing.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_emp_ad_Desc: Invoker builds up a charge of electromagnetic energy at a targeted location which automatically detonates after %delay% seconds. The detonation covers an area, draining mana. Deals damage for each point of mana drained.  If EMP drains mana from an enemy hero, Invoker gains 50% of the mana drained.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_emp_ad_Note: Will not affect cycloned units (Tornado or Eul's Scepter of Divinity).
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_alacrity_ad: Invoker infuses an ally with an immense surge of energy, increasing their attack speed and their damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_chaos_meteo: Causes %meteor_count% extra Chaos Meteors to land alongside the primary cast at slight angles. Reduces cooldown by %shard_cooldown_reduction% seconds.

Invoker pulls a flaming meteor from space onto the targeted location. Upon landing, the meteor rolls forward, constantly dealing damage and rolling further based on the level. Units hit by the meteor will also be set on fire for a short time.
Deals main damage to enemy units under meteor every %damage_interval% seconds and burns enemies for smaller damage over %burn_duration% seconds.
The meteor moves at a speed of %travel_speed%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_sun_strike_: Sends a catastrophic ray of fierce energy from the sun at any targeted location, incinerating all enemies standing beneath it once it reaches the earth. Damage is spread evenly over all enemies hit.
Gives vision of the target area before the strike.
Invoker gains experience with kills made from Sun Strike, even if made from outside of experience range.

Adds Cataclysm. Launched when Sun Strike is double tapped. Puts it on a %cataclysm_cooldown% second cooldown. Creates %cataclysm_count% visible Sun Strikes within %cataclysm_min_range%-%cataclysm_max_range% range of each enemy hero.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_forge_spiri: Invoker forges a spirit embodying the strength of fire and fortitude of ice. The elemental's scorching attack is capable of melting the armor of enemy heroes.
Casting this ability will replace currently summoned Forged Spirits.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_ice_wall_ad: Generates a wall of solid ice directly in front of Invoker for a duration. The bitter cold emanating from it greatly slows nearby enemies and deals damage each second.
The slow will still affect Spell Immune enemies if their spell immunity was created after being affected by Ice Wall.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_deafening_b: Invoker unleashes a mighty sonic wave in front of him, dealing damage to any enemy unit it collides with. The sheer impact from the blast is enough to knock those enemy units back for a duration then disarm their attacks for a duration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_silencer_curse_of_t: Nortrom's lack of incantations is less of a problem for him than it is for his adversaries.

Curses the target area, causing enemy heroes to take damage and slowing their movement speed. Silenced enemies take %penalty_multiplier%x slow and damage. Anytime affected enemies cast a spell, the duration is increased. The cooldown is paused as long as the target is silenced.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_silencer_glaives_of: Although lacking in traditional incantations, Nortrom's pedigree of the Aeol Drias gives him uncanny wisdom, which he applies to physical combat.
Silencer enchants his glaives with his wisdom, dealing additional damage based on his Intelligence. Silencer temporarily steals his target's Intelligence with each hit.

Causes Glaives to bounce %shard_bounce_count% time towards the closest enemy unit, dealing %shard_attack_damage_pct%%% of Silencer's attack damage. Bounce range is %shard_range%. Additionally, it increases the Intelligence stolen per kill by %shard_permanent_int_steal_amount_bonus%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_silencer_last_word_: Nortrom ensures that spells uttered by his opponents will be their last.

Enchants a target, providing vision of them and causing them to be damaged and silenced if they cast a spell or if the enchantment timer expires. Deals extra damage based on the difference in intelligence between Silencer and the target.
Causes Last Word to become an AoE ability.
Channeling abilities will trigger this effect once the caster finishes its channel.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_silencer_global_sil: With a shock to the ground, all magic and sound pauses, and Nortrom fulfills his prophecy.
Silencer stops all sound, preventing enemy heroes and units on the map from casting spells.
This skill works on invisible and Spell Immune units, but gaining spell immunity will remove its effect.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_silencer_curse_of_: Taking damage and slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%. Duration increases when casting a spell.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_silencer_last_word: Will be damaged and silenced if the timer expires, or if they cast a spell.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_silencer_glaives_o: Silencer will permanently steal %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% Intelligence from any enemy hero he kills, and any enemy hero that dies within %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% range.
Intelligence stolen by Silencer from killing enemy heroes being near them as they die.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_silencer_int_steal: Silencer will permanently steal 2 Intelligence from any enemy hero he kills, and any enemy hero that dies within 925 range.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_obsidian_destroyer_: Adds extra pure damage to Outworld Destroyer's attacks, based on his remaining mana pool.
Harbinger's outworldly knowledge allows it to tap into the ebb and flow of all spiritual energy, infusing it into his being.
The damage is calculated after the mana cost is spent.
Places a target unit into an astral prison. The hidden unit is invulnerable and disabled. When the astral prison implodes, it deals damage to the target and steals a percentage of their max mana.
Grants charges to Astral Imprisonment, increases damage and applies the damage in an area.

Grants an additional +%shard_mana_capacity_steal%%% Mana Capacity steal to Astral Imprisonment. Also allows allies to move at %shard_movement_speed_pct%%% movement speed during Astral Imprisonment (they are visible, but untargettable and can't perform any other actions).
Locked away in the pocket between this world and the Outworld, victims realize their infantile knowledge and mortality.
Imprisoned units can still be hit by Sanity's Eclipse.
Max mana steal does not increase Outworld Destroyer's current mana values or directly reduce the victim's mana values.

Whenever nearby allied Heroes or Outworld Destroyer itself casts a spell, it gains a chance to restore a percentage of its mana pool.  Outworld Destroyer also passively gains a bonus to its base mana pool.  Several skills with no cooldown and toggled spells cannot trigger Essence Aura.
The crystals of the Outworld produce arcane power, and the Harbinger channels it into the world of mortals.
Other than Arcane Orb, most skills without cooldowns cannot trigger Essence Aura.
Passively grants you a chance to restore a percentage of your max mana each time you cast an ability.
Casting Astral Imprisonment on an ally will trigger Essence Aura on them and grant then %shard_bonus_mana% max mana for %shard_mana_duration% seconds.
The Outworld is awash in arcane energy, inclined to diffuse through any of Harbinger's rifts.
Unleashes a psychic blast that deals to enemies based on the difference between your mana and the target's mana. Sanity's Eclipse can hit units trapped by Astral Imprisonment.
When an Outworld crystal ruptures, cataclysmic energies are released, and the reverberations of this power are felt interdimensionally.
Does not damage creeps or neutral units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_obsidian_destroyer: After casting a spell, you have a chance to restore a percentage of your mana pool.
Locked away in an Astral Prison, cannot act or be acted upon.
You may cast Astral Imprisonment whenever there is a charge available.
All damage dealt slows enemy movement.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_summon_wolves: The very enchantment that twisted his being also summons canine familiars.
Summons two wolves to fight for Lycan.  Level 3-4 wolves have Permanent Invisibility, and level 4 wolves have Cripple.
Causes one of your creep waves to include one uncontrollable wolf that moves with the wave. Additionally, wolves spawned this way may Cripple towers.
Spirit Wolves have 70% magic damage resistance.
Using this spell will replace currently active Spirit Wolves.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_howl_Lore: Blood-curdling wolf cries signal to opponents that Banehallow is among them.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_howl_Descript: Strikes fear into enemies, reducing armor and attack damage to all enemies within %radius% range of Lycan and his wolves.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_feral_impulse: His animalistic symbiosis with canine kind gives Banehallow enhanced reflexes and hunting capabilities.
Increases the HP regeneration and damage of Lycan and all units under his control.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_shapeshift_Lo: Forever a slave to his lycanthropy, Banehallow has come to accept his curse, and embrace his own savagery.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_shapeshift_De: Lycan assumes his lupine form, granting him and his units critical strikes and added vision at night. During Shapeshift, Lycan and all units under his control move at increased speed, cannot be slowed and have a %crit_chance%%% chance to deal a critical strike doing %crit_multiplier%%% damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_shapeshift_No: Hex doesn't remove Lycan's movement speed.
Lycan has a smaller collision size in this state.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_shapeshift_ab: Ranged heroes will lose attack range during Shapeshift, though bonus range abilities can modify that (i.e. Arctic Burn)
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_summon_wolves: Gives %maim_chance%%% to cripple the target, causing %maim_damage% damage per second and lose %maim_attack_speed% Attack Speed for %maim_duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_wolf_bite_Des: Lycan bites an ally, granting them Shapeshift properties. Lycan and the bitten target gain %lifesteal_percent%%% Lifesteal and share the healing effect of Lifesteal with each other as long as they are within %lifesteal_range% range of each other.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_wolf_bite_Not: Wolf Bite cooldown matches the cooldown of the current level of Shapeshift.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lycan_howl_Descrip: Damage reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_BASEDAMAGEOUTGOING_PERCENTAGE%%%, Armor reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lycan_feral_impuls: Gaining %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% health regen and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_BASEDAMAGEOUTGOING_PERCENTAGE%%% bonus damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lycan_summon_wolve: Reducing attack speed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% and taking %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lycan_wolf_bite_li: Gaining Lifesteal when Lycan and the bitten hero are nearby.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid_spirit_b: Sylla's lifelong companion is symbiotic with his spirit and heart, coming to aid him in any time of need.

Summons a powerful Spirit Bear companion that can equip items.  If the bear moves 1100 distance away from the Lone Druid, it cannot attack.  Lone Druid suffers %backlash_damage%%% of his max health as backlash damage if the Spirit Bear dies. Spirit Bear does not benefit from attributes.\nSpirit Bear has the Return, Demolish and Entangling Claws abilities.
Allows Spirit Bear to attack at any range from Lone Druid, and to survive if Lone Druid dies.
Most spells interact with the Spirit Bear in the same way as they do with heroes.
Channels for %channel_tooltip% seconds and then teleports the Spirit Bear back to the Lone Druid.
Attacks have a chance to cause roots to burst from the ground, immobilizing the attacked enemy unit, and dealing damage per second.
Entangled units can't use Blink abilities, and are revealed if they are invisible.
Increases the power of the Spirit Bear, causing it to deal more damage to buildings and have additional spell resistance.
Spirit Bear absorbs %damage_share%%% of the damage dealt to Lone Druid.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid_rabid_Lo: Bears are not commonly seen as being agile creatures, but can actually move rather quickly, especially when enraged.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid_rabid_De: Increases the attack and movement speed of Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid_spirit_l: Links Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear, sharing a percentage of their armor with each other, increasing the attack speed of both and causing damage dealt by the Spirit Bear to heal Lone Druid.
Sylla is emboldened by the presence of his companion, his vitality replenished with each swipe of the Spirit Bear's claws.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid_entangli: Cause roots to burst from the ground, immobilizing the target enemy unit and causes them to take more damage from attacks. Enemies can still move and attack while entangled.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid_savage_r: Sylla studies and masters the arts of the lost Bear Clan, enhancing his attunement with the wild.
Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear roar fiercely causing nearby enemies to flee towards their base in terror. Their movement speed is increased by %bonus_speed%%%.
Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear roar fiercely causing nearby enemies to flee towards their base in terror. Their movement speed is increased by %bonus_speed%%%.
Applies a basic dispel and grants allies in an area around the caster bonus movement and attack speed. Replicates between Lone Druid and Spirit Bear regardless of castability on the other.
An entangled hero will not be able to move.
An entangled hero will not be able to move.
Cooldown is shared with Spirit Bear.
Cooldown is shared with Lone Druid.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid_true_for: The mighty bear is the king of the forest, possessing the throne through raw power.
Lone Druid learns to morph himself into a raging bear, losing his ranged advantage, but gaining increased bonus armor and health, and improved versions of Entangling Claws and Demolish.
Cooldowns of items that are different for ranged and melee units will be based on which form Lone Druid was in when the item was used.
Allows Spirit Bear to attack at any range from Lone Druid, and to survive if Lone Druid dies.
When Sylla cries in the forest, the reverberations are felt for a great distance.
Adds attack damage and armor to the Lone Druid as well as any nearby units under his control.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lone_druid_spirit_: Immobilized and taking damage over time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lone_druid_rabid_D: Gaining %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% attack speed and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% movement speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lone_druid_true_fo: Gaining %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PREATTACK_BONUS_DAMAGE% bonus damage and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS% bonus armor.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lone_druid_spirit_: If the Spirit Bear moves too far away from Lone Druid, it will not be able to attack unless Lone Druid carries Aghanim's Scepter.
A percentage of damage targeted at you is being taken by your Spirit Bear instead.
Granting %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% attack speed, and granting a percentage of damage dealt as health to your companion.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lone_druid_true_fo: Morphed into a raging bear, losing ranged advantage, but gaining %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_EXTRA_HEALTH_BONUS% bonus health, %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS% bonus armor, Entangling Roots and Demolish.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster_thunder_: A slam of Mangix' mighty keg starts the festivities.
Slams the ground, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed and attack rate of nearby enemy units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster_drunken_: The Order of the Oyo's solution to all problems - another round!
Drenches a target in alcohol, causing their movement speed to be reduced, and causing their attacks to have a chance to miss.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster_cinder_b: The Order of the Oyo's solution to all problems - another round!

Drenches himself and an area in alcohol, causing enemy units to move slower and ignited once they take any spell damage. Duration is increased by %extra_duration% seconds when enemies are ignited. While Brewmaster is Brewed Up, His Drunken Brawler Stances are stronger.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster_drunken_: When Mangix won his title as the Brewmaster of the Order of Oyo, he also claimed his place in the mastery of inebriation.

Brewmaster can switch stances based on the elements he controls gaining passive bonuses that improve against enemies affected by Cinder Brew.
<font color="#9acd32">Earth Brawler</font> - Grants %armor% armor and %magic_resist%%% Magic Resistance. Bonuses are %active_multiplier%x when Brewed Up.
<font color="#87ceeb">Storm Brawler</font> - Grants %dodge_chance%%% evasion and %bonus_move_speed%%% Bonus Move Speed. Bonuses are %active_multiplier%x when Brewed Up
<font color="#FF0000">Fire Brawler</font> Grants %crit_chance%%% chance to crit for %crit_multiplier%%% of your attack damage. Chance is %active_multiplier%x when Brewed Up.
Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.

Gains Void Brawler stance granting %bonus_status_resist%%% Status Resistance to Brewmaster and applies a %movespeed%%% Slow for %slow_duration%s on attack. Slow and Status Resistance are tripled when affected by Cinder Brew.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster_primal_s: It isn't clear whether Mangix is consciously aware of his potent bond with nature, as it often occurs in the midst of a drunken stupor.

Splits Brewmaster into elements, forming 3 specialized warriors, adept at survival, each with their own abilities. If any of them survive until the end of their summoned timer, the Brewmaster is reborn.
The Earth Element will carry all auras that the Brewmaster has, as well as True Sight.
The Fire Element has phased movement.
When the spell ends, Brewmaster will take the place of an element in this order, assuming they are alive: Earth, Storm, Fire.
Primal Split now creates a Void brewling with the Astral Pulse ability.
Primal Split has 2 charges and can be canceled at any time. Charge replenish time is equal to the normal cooldown.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster_earth_hu: Throws a boulder at a unit, doing damage and stunning it.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster_storm_di: Damages summoned units in an area and purges most buffs or debuffs.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster_storm_cy: Encloses a unit in a tornado, removing it from the battlefield.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster_storm_wi: Provides temporary invisibility.  Bonus movement speed and attack damage when invisible.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster_void_ast: Disarms and slows movement speed of nearby enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_brewmaster_thunder: Movement slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, attacks slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_brewmaster_drunken: Movement slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MISS_PERCENTAGE%%% chance to miss attacks.
Gaining bonus chance to crit and evade; movement speed changes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_brewmaster_cinder_: Slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%. Will ignite upon taking spell damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_brewmaster_brew_up: Drunken Brawler stances improved by a stiff drink.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_demon_disrup: Banishes the targeted unit from the battlefield for a short duration.  Upon returning, two illusions of the banished unit are created under Shadow Demon's control.
The pain of deception comes not while it happens, but when it is revealed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_demon_soul_c: Captures the soul of enemy units in an area, causing them to lose a percentage of their current health. Shadow Demon temporarily gains Spell Amplification for each hero's soul captured. When the debuff is removed, the units gain half of the lost health back. Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Soul Catcher.
Trying to resist the Shadow Demon's corruption is mostly a useless endeavor.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_demon_shadow: In Ability Draft, Shadow Poison Release works by toggling auto-cast off, either by right-clicking the ability, or using the alt-hotkey combo.  Auto-cast state will be on if there are any units with Shadow Poison applied.

Deals damage in a line, and afflicts enemy units with a poison effect. The poison deals 1/2/4/8/16 times the stack damage based on the number of stacks on the target, up to %max_multiply_stacks% stacks. Additional stacks cause %bonus_stack_damage% damage each.  This deferred damage is dealt when Shadow Poison's duration is expired, or the Release sub-ability is used.
The ever growing influence of the Shadow Demon can pollute the most valiant and pure of heroes.
Shadow Poison can affect units under Disruption.
Releases the poison to do damage on all affected enemies. Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Shadow Poison.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_demon_demoni: Purges the target enemy unit, removing positive buffs, and slowing the target for the duration.  The unit slowly regains its speed until the end of the duration, upon which damage is dealt.  Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Demonic Purge.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

Cooldown is removed, replaced with %max_charges% charges that replenish every %charge_restore_time_tooltip_scepter% seconds. Also causes Demonic Purge to break its target's passive abilities while active.
Once Shadow Demon no longer has any need for his collected cultist, he releases it from its subservience - and its life.
The slow starts at %max_slow%%% decreases over time to %min_slow%%%.
Positive buffs are continously removed from the target for the duration of the Purge.

Cleanses the target allied unit, removing negative buffs for the duration.  At the end of the duration, the unit is healed. Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Demonic Cleanse.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
Cooldown is removed, replaced with %max_charges% charges that replenish every %charge_restore_time_tooltip_scepter% seconds.
Negative buffs are continously removed from the target for the duration of the Cleanse.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_shadow_demon_soul_: Missing health. Half the lost health will return after the spell duration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_shadow_demon_purge: Slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%. Positive buffs are continously removed for the duration of Demonic Purge
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chaos_knight_chaos_: Throws a mysterious bolt of energy at the target unit. It stuns for a random duration and deals random damage.
Increases  the cast range of Chaos Bolt, and causes it to create a Phantasm illusion to attack the target.
Even Chaos Knight cannot predict this manifest of unholy energy.
The stun duration and damage values dealt are inversely related.
Nearby illusions will mimic the cast animation.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chaos_knight_realit: Teleports Chaos Knight, any images he has, and the target unit to a point along the line between him and the target. Reduces armor of the enemy unit for %duration% seconds.
Allows Reality Rift to be cast on any enemy hero that is within 1200 range of you or one of your illusions. Gathers all of your illusions and your hero and teleports them to the target enemy.
Armageddon rides between the planes, bringing Chaos Knight to his victim wherever he may hide.
Chaos Knight and the target unit are made to face each other, and Chaos Knight and his phantasms are issued an attack order against the target.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chaos_knight_chaos_: Chaos Knight and his illusions' attacks have a chance to deal a critical strike of varying strength, in addition to a lifesteal for percentage of the damage. Deals %creep_multiplier%x damage to creeps.
Chaos Knight's unwieldy power bludgeons those who stand before him, crushing the thickest of armors.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chaos_knight_phanta: Summons several phantasmal copies of the Chaos Knight from alternate dimensions. The phantasms are strong illusions that deal %outgoing_damage_tooltip%%% damage, but take %incoming_damage_tooltip%%% damage.\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
Creates an illusion of allied heroes. Creates an additional illusion for Chaos Knight as well.
Drawing on his battles fought across many worlds and many times, phantasms of the Chaos Knight rise up to quell all who oppose him.
Removes most negative buffs from Chaos Knight.
Chaos Knight is invulnerable for %invuln_duration% seconds when casting, allowing him to dodge stuns and damage.
Strong Illusions are not instantly killed by spells.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ogre_magi_fireblast: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target.
The Ogre Magi is easily amused, entertained for hours by playing with fire.
When Multicast, Fireblast hits the same target each time with a %multicast_delay% seconds interval.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ogre_magi_unrefined: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target. Its mana cost is %scepter_mana%%% of Ogre Magi's current mana.
The 'who-casts-spell-first' argument between himself is solved simply by both casting at once.
When Multicast, Unrefined Fireblast hits the same target each time with a %multicast_delay% seconds interval.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ogre_magi_ignite_De: Drenches the target and another random unit in volatile chemicals, causing it to burst into flames. The target is in immense pain, taking damage and moving more slowly.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ogre_magi_ignite_No: Multicast makes this spell have a chance to cast multiple times at random enemy units in a %ignite_multicast_aoe% area of effect.
Ignite hitting an already affected unit adds to the burn duration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ogre_magi_bloodlust: Incites a frenzy in a friendly unit, increasing its movement speed and attack speed. Gives bonus attacks speed if cast on Ogre himself. Can be cast on towers.
'Running's not as fun as hitting... Not one bit fun.'
When multicast, nearby allies will be selected randomly in an %multicast_bloodlust_aoe% area of effect to receive Bloodlust.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ogre_magi_multicast: Enables Ogre Magi to cast his abilities and items multiple times with each use.
Despite being largely incapacitated by his IQ, the Ogre Magi's success in battle is attributed to pure skill.
Only targeted abilities and items have a chance to be multicast.
Targeted abilities and items apply to additional enemies and neutrals in an AoE around Ogre. Fireblast and Unrefined Fireblast hit the same target multiple times.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ogre_magi_smash_Des: Creates a shield around the target ally, absorbing a percentage of the damage of next %attacks% attacks from enemy heroes. When damage is absorbed, a fireball is launched at the attacker.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ogre_magi_smash_Not: When multicast, nearby allies will be selected randomly in an %multicast_fireshield_aoe% area of effect to receive Fire Shield.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ogre_magi_smash_bu: Absorbing a percentage of damage and launching fireballs at the attacker.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ogre_magi_bloodlus: Movement speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ogre_magi_ignite_d: You are on fire! Taking periodic damage and slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ogre_magi_item_mul: Able to cast abilities and items multiple times with each use.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_treant_natures_guis: Provides Treant with Tree Walking whenever he hasn't taken damage for %cooldown_time% seconds. While active, Treant gains movement speed bonus and amplified healing and regeneration on himself.
Causes Treant to move faster and become invisible with Nature's Guise and root enemies upon attacking. Deals damage over time and roots for longer if the attack was near a tree.
The Protectors don't often come into vision; their natural state being nestled within their leafy brethren.
While affected by Nature's Guise, Treant can move unobstructed through other trees.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_treant_natures_gras: Creates vines towards the target location. Vines slow down and deal damage to enemies that walk through. Vines deal 50% more damage if they touch a tree. Does half damage to creeps.
The Protectors don't often come into vision; their natural state being nestled within their leafy brethren.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_treant_leech_seed_D: Treant plants a life-sapping seed in an enemy unit, draining its health, while simultaneously slowing it. The seed heals friendly units around it.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_treant_leech_seed_L: Rooftrellen nurtures the beings under his stewardship, sustained by the lifeforce of trespassers into his sacred ground.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_treant_living_armor: Infuses the target hero or structure with a protective coating which heals the target and provides bonus armor.
The roots and tendrils of the Treant Protectors are far-reaching, stimulating the growth and rejuvenation of all of nature.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_treant_overgrowth_D: Summons an overgrowth of vines and branches around Treant that deal damage to afflicted enemies and prevent them from moving, blinking, going invisible, or attacking.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_treant_overgrowth_L: Rooftrellen calls the ancestral spirit of nature, releasing its power through all of his kin.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_treant_overgrowth_N: Works on Spell Immune units, but if units gain spell immunity after the effect starts, they'll break free.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_treant_eyes_in_the_: Treant Protector enchants a tree, which grants him unobstructed vision in that location. If Overgrowth is cast, units within a radius of an enchanted tree will be entangled and damaged. Passively causes all trees to respawn much faster.
Being entangled by Overgrowth through enchanted trees from Eyes in the Forest does damage.
If the enemy has True Sight, they will be able to see which trees are enchanted.
One can never be too certain who, or what, might need protecting.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_treant_natures_gui: Invisible while next to trees.\nGaining %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% bonus movement speed.
Nature's Guise will be removed when not near a tree.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_treant_leech_seed_: Slowing and sapping life from a random nearby enemy unit..
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_meepo_earthbind_Des: Tosses a net at the target point, rooting down all enemy units in an area around it.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_meepo_earthbind_Lor: Catching dinner in the Riftshadow Ruins can be quite the task.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_meepo_earthbind_Not: Does not work on Spell Immune units or Roshan.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_meepo_poof_Descript: Drawing mystical energies from the earth, a Meepo can teleport to another Meepo or itself after channeling for %abilitycastpoint% seconds, dealing damage in both the departure and arrival locations.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_meepo_poof_abilityd: In AD, can poof to any friendly unit within 2000 range.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_meepo_poof_Lore: Sometimes breaking one of the Riftshadow Crystals can be just the trick for getting yourself out of a bind.  Or your other self.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_meepo_poof_Note0: Can be cast through the minimap.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_meepo_geostrike_Lor: Keeping your pack light and having few but versatile tools is the best bet for survival.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_meepo_ransack_Descr: Steals health from the enemy with each strike and heals all other Meepos for that amount.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_meepo_ransack_shard: Ransack now has a 30%% chance on hit to apply a Geostrike debuff, slowing enemies by 20%% and dealing 20 DPS for 4 seconds. Instances from multiple Meepos stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_meepo_ransack_Lore: So you gonna need that, or...?
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_meepo_divided_we_st: Divided we Stand can be cast as long as there's a Meepo within 300 radius of yourself. Causes that Meepo to fling you towards a target within a 900 AoE, dealing 100 damage and slowing their movement speed by 50%. Cooldown 18/16/14s Mana Cost: 75

Meepo summons an imperfect, semi-autonomous duplicate of himself, which can gain gold and experience as he does and shares his experience, attributes and abilities. However, the clones cannot wield any items but the boots that Meepo himself wears.  If any of the clones die, they all die. Divided We Stand grants all Meepos bonus Magic Resistance.
Clones can't use Arcane Boots, Guardian Greaves.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_meepo_petrify_Descr: Channels for 0.75 seconds and digs into the ground for 3.5 seconds, dispelling Meepo and causing him to be come invulnerable and untargetable for %duration%. Restores %hp_restore%%% of his max health over that duration. Can’t be cast while rooted.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_meepo_earthbind_De: Trapped in Meepo's net; cannot move or blink.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_meepo_geostrike_de: Slowed down and taking periodic damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_meepo_petrify_Desc: Invulnerable and untargetable, with bonus health regeneration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_meepo_fling_slow_D: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% due to impact from flying Meepos.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_visage_grave_chill_: Visage drains the movement and attack speed of the targeted unit, gaining it for itself and nearby familiars.
The warmth of the sun is never felt in the dark cold of the Narrow Maze.
The two buffs can be removed separately by purge.
The speed gained is independent of the speed lost on the target.
Familiars within %radius% range of Visage will also receive bonuses from Grave Chill.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_visage_soul_assumpt: Visage gathers charges of soul essence each time nearby heroes take more than %damage_limit% damage. When the essence is released, it deals base damage as well as damage for each gathered soul charge.
The collected souls of the dead reach out to bring another into their fold.
Charges are only gained for damage greater than %damage_min% and less than %damage_max% that is dealt by a player or Roshan.  Self-damage or Soul Assumption damage isn't counted.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_visage_gravekeepers: Visage generates a layered barrier that protects him from damage.  If he receives damage from a player, one layer is removed, and takes time to recover.
Grants Visage the ability to cast Stone Form. Restores up to %shard_hp_restoration_pct%%% of your health.
Visage's tough scales share equal properties of ghost and stone, making it nearly impervious to blade and magical assault.
Each time Visage receives damage greater than the Minimum Damage that was not self-inflicted and was from a player owned source, a layer is removed.
Familiars within %radius% range of Visage will receive the current damage reduction from Gravekeeper's Cloak.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_visage_summon_famil: Conjures two blind Familiars to fight for Visage.  Familiars possess the Stone Form ability, that allows them to turn into stone, stunning enemies upon landing.  While in Stone Form, Familiars are invulnerable, and rapidly regenerate their health.  Familiars grant high bounty when killed.
Guardians of the Narrow Maze, Necro'lic's Familiars stand watch over his domain.
Casting Summon Familiars will replace any existing Familiars.
Familiars within range of Visage will receive bonuses from Gravekeeper's Cloak and Grave Chill.

After a short delay, the Familiar turns into stone and smashes into the ground, stunning and damaging all targets in the area.  The Familiar becomes invulnerable, and will regain its health very rapidly.  After %stone_duration% seconds, the Familiar will automatically leave Stone Form.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_visage_stone_form_s: After a short delay, the nearest Familiar turns into stone and smashes into the ground, stunning and damaging all targets in the area.  The Familiar becomes invulnerable, and will regain its health very rapidly.  After %stone_duration% seconds, the Familiar will automatically leave Stone Form.
While Stone Form is not dispellable, the stun can be removed by strong dispels.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_visage_silent_as_th: Turns Visage and familiars invisible, granting Visage bonus movement speed and upgrading its movement type to flying. When Visage or its familiars leave invisibility they deal more damage for a short duration. Lasts %invis_duration% seconds. Invisibility ends when attacking or casting.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_visage_grave_chill: Movement speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
