Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_undying_decay_Descr: Undying steals strength from all enemy heroes in an area, dealing base damage as he claims the enemy's strength for himself. Deals %creep_damage_multiplier%x damage to creeps.

Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_undying_decay_Note0: The strength stolen stacks, but can't cause a hero to have strength below 1.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_undying_decay_Note1: The strength steal takes effect before the damage is dealt.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_undying_soul_rip_De: Undying rips health away from all nearby units and uses it to heal an ally, or damage an enemy. Soul Rip can also be used to heal Tombstone.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_undying_soul_rip_Lo: Even allies feel despair in Undying's presence.

Does not rip from invisible units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_undying_tombstone_D: Summons a tombstone at the target point.  Zombies will frequently spawn next to every enemy unit in the area around the Tombstone, and attack them.  Zombies have the Deathlust ability, which causes their attacks to slow the target, and if the target reaches below a certain amount of health, increases the attack and movement speed of the zombie.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_undying_tombstone_L: Dirge calls on his fallen brothers to fight for the Dead God.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_undying_tombstone_N: Tombstone is Spell Immune, but can be healed by Soul Rip.
Zombies and Tombstone are Spell Immune.
If their initial target dies or goes out of vision, the Zombie will die.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_undying_tombstone_z: Slows enemy units on attack.  If the attacked unit's health goes below the threshold, the zombie receives enhanced movement and attack speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_undying_flesh_golem: Reduces Flesh Golem Cooldown by %shard_cooldown_reduction% seconds and causes Undying to spawn one zombie on each attack while transformed.
Undying transforms into a horrifying flesh golem. Gains a percentage increase to strength and imbues attacks with a slow and damage amplification.
The flesh of the recently dead add to the power of Dirge's plague.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_undying_flesh_gole: Strength increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_STATS_STRENGTH_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%. Attacks slow enemies and deal bonus damage over time.

Movement slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and receiving increased damage from all sources.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_undying_tombstone_: Undying Zombie attacks slow their target.
Gaining %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% faster movement and attack speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rubick_telekinesis_: Rubick uses his telekinetic powers to lift the enemy into the air briefly and then hurls them back at the ground. The unit lands on the ground with such force that it stuns nearby enemies.

Allows you to target yourself or allies with Telekinesis. Throw range is %shard_max_land_distance_bonus_pct%%% longer and cooldown is reduced by %shard_cooldown_reduction_pct%%% when targeting allies. Throw delay reduced to %shard_teammate_throw_delay% seconds.
Even the Grandest Magus may use his powers for enjoyment.
While the target is in the air, Rubick may use a secondary ability to throw the enemy in a targeted direction.
When the unit lands, it isn't affected by the area of effect stun.
The farthest you can throw an enemy is 375.
Chooses the location the target will land when Telekinesis finishes.
Chooses the location you will land when Telekinesis finishes.

Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rubick_fade_bolt_Lo: Rubick's favorite spell for dispatching would-be assassins is a rather simple conjuration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rubick_null_field_D: Rubick's mastery of the arcane creates an aura that nullifies nearby enemy senses or increases his own. Can be toggled offensively or defensively to reduce enemy magic resistance or increase allied magic resistance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rubick_null_field_L: Not every magus can be a Grand Magus...

Not every magus can be a Grand Magus...
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rubick_spell_steal_: Rubick studies the trace magical essence of one enemy hero, learning the secrets of the last spell the hero cast. Rubick can use this spell as his own for several minutes or until he dies, and stolen spells last longer on enemies.
Increases the number of spells that can be stolen to 2. Increases cast range, and upgrades spells to their Scepter version.
...but even their lesser magics can be a source of much utility.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rubick_empty1_Descr: Spells acquired with Spell Steal will replace this slot.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rubick_empty2_Descr: Spells acquired with Spell Steal will replace this slot.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_rubick_null_field_: Rubick's affected allies gain %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_BONUS%%% Magic Damage Resistance. Rubick's affected enemies lose %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_BONUS%%% Magic Damage Resistance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_disruptor_thunder_s: Repeatedly strikes the targeted unit with lightning.  Each strike damages nearby enemy units in a small radius and slows enemy movement and attack speed by %slow_amount%%% for %slow_duration% seconds.  Provides vision of its target.

Causes each strike gives a short %shard_buff_duration% second buff to all allies within radius that provides +%shard_movement_speed_bonus%%% Movement Speed and +%shard_attack_speed_bonus% Attack Speed. Increases radius to %shard_radius%.
Disruptor's charged coils occasionally overload, and a singed armor plate or tuft of fur is the enemy's result.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_disruptor_glimpse_D: Teleports the target hero back to where it was 4 seconds ago.  Instantly kills illusions.

Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_disruptor_glimpse_N: The travel time is a function of the distance the target will travel.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_disruptor_kinetic_f: After a short formation time, creates a circular barrier of kinetic energy that enemies can't pass.
The stryder is immune to the gale-force winds that will consume its adversaries.
Spell Immune units can travel through the field.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_disruptor_static_st: Creates a damaging static storm that also silences all enemy units in the area for the duration.  The damage starts off weak, but increases in power over the duration.
A summer squall in Druud is a hardship that only an Oglodi can survive.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_disruptor_thunders: Move speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%. Attack speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nyx_assassin_impale: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
All zealot scarabs possess intimate knowledge of underground pathways, using them to their advantage.
The spikes move at %speed% units per second, over %length% range.
Impale cannot be blocked by Linken's Sphere.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nyx_assassin_mana_b: Destroys the target hero's mana equal to a multiplier of its Intelligence, and deals damage equal to the mana burned.
The tome in Ultimyr describes one scarab with the ability eat away at the mind of lesser beings.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nyx_assassin_spiked: When activated while above ground, Spiked Carapace reflects and negates damage dealt to Nyx Assassin (max once from each source), as well as stunning the source of the damage. Activating Spiked Carapace will not break Vendetta invisibility.\n\nWhile Burrowed, Spiked Carapace instantly stuns nearby enemies when cast.
While their carapace is relatively thin, it's guarded by a retractable field of razor-sharp spikes.
The damage is calculated after all reductions.
Spiked Carapace will only trigger on damage from other player controlled units.
The damage reflected will have the same damage type as it had when it was dealt to Nyx.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nyx_assassin_vendet: Vendetta now moves faster, and a successful Vendetta attack now reduces the target's Magic Resistance.
Allows Nyx Assassin to become invisible and gain a speed bonus.  If Nyx Assassin attacks to break the invisibility, massive bonus damage is dealt with the attack.
The scarab kills for the glory of his queen.
If a spell is used to break the invisibility, or the invisibility expires, the bonus damage is lost.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nyx_assassin_burrow: Nyx Assassin buries himself beneath the battlefield over a short duration. Once burrowed, Spiked Carapace instantly stuns nearby enemies when cast, the range of Mana Burn and Impale is increased, and Impale's cooldown is decreased. While burrowed, Nyx Assassin is stationary, unable to attack, and invisible. Nyx gains damage reduction from all damage sources.
Some castes of zealot scarab are known to create small burrows to lie in wait, ready to ambush their prey.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nyx_assassin_unburr: Some castes of zealot scarab are known to create small burrows to lie in wait, ready to ambush their prey.

Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_naga_siren_mirror_i: Creates multiple images of Naga Siren under her control.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
Slithice, while being strong in her own right, is notoriously hard to track down.
Naga Siren is invulnerable for %invuln_duration% seconds when casting, allowing her to dodge stuns and damage.
Upon casting, most effects are removed from Naga Siren.
Upon casting, existing Mirror Image illusions are destroyed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_naga_siren_ensnare_: Interrupts the target and traps them in place, preventing movement or blinking.
The only way to escape the onslaught of a Slithereen is to never oppose one in the first place.
Reduces cooldown and increases cast range.  Allows Ensnare to target Spell Immune or sleeping units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_naga_siren_rip_tide: Every %hits% attack from naga and her illusions, the Naga Siren and her images will hit all nearby units with a damaging wave of water that lowers armor for %duration% seconds.
A torrent from the Deep Ones crushes the defenses of the Siren's enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_naga_siren_song_of_: All enemies in range of the Naga Siren are put into a magical stasis where they cannot act or be attacked. Using Song of the Siren again will end the duration early.
Song of the Siren heals allies by %shard_heal_pct%%% of their Max HP per second for its duration.
Slithice's powerful voice enchants leagues of opponents, while calling her Slithereen kin in a time of need.
Units affected by Song of the Siren are invulnerable and cannot take damage from any source.
The area of the song follows Naga, so if she moves far enough away from affected units, they will wake up.
Release enemy units from your song so they can be targeted again.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_naga_siren_ensnare: Trapped in place, cannot move or blink.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_naga_siren_song_of: Getting healed by the soothing song of Naga Siren.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_keeper_of_the_light: Channels light energy, building power the longer it's channeled.  Once released, a wave is sent forth that deals damage and gives vision in its path.  The longer it is channeled, the more damage is dealt.
Causes Illuminate to heal for 40% of its damage during daytime.
Ezalor's hidden light reveals itself in marvelous fashion.
Gives increasing vision over the channeling time.
Weakens an enemy's magical essence, causing them to lose mana as they move.  If the enemy loses all of its mana, it will be stunned.
Ezalor disrupts Primordial harmony, draining magical energy from those with poor constitution.
If the target travels over 300 distance in less than 0.1 second (by using blink skills, for example), Mana Leak will not decrease its mana for that distance.
Weakens an enemy's magical resistance, and applies a slow that increases in strength the more the target moves.
Restores mana to the target unit and reduces cooldowns of all abilities currently on cooldown by a fixed amount.
In the same vein, Ezalor bestows his harmony among others.
Chakra Magic does not reduce the cooldown of Ultimate abilities
Summons Ignis Fatuus at the targeted area. Alternates on and off, drawing enemies closer with its mesmerising flicker.
Though he would not claim to 'know' them, Ezalor holds an uncanny influence over many powerful creatures always willing to come to his aid.
Ezalor temporarily turns his body luminescent, gaining bonus movement speed, cast range, grants the Blinding Light ability, and allows Illuminate to be channeled by a separate spirit and heal allies.
In a flash of light, Ezalor reveals his true nature.
After a short delay, teleports the targeted friendly hero to your location.  If the targeted friendly hero takes player based damage during this time, the ability is interrupted.

You can disable help to prevent Keeper from casting this spell on you.

Upon landing, units will destroy trees in a 150 radius.
The Primordial light turns the tides of battle in favor of Ezalor and his allies.

Channels light energy, building power the longer it's channeled.  Once released, a wave is sent forth that deals damage and gives vision in its path.  The longer it is channeled, the more damage is dealt.

Being teleported to Keeper of the Light's location.
The next spell cast will have its cooldown reduced.
Move speed slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and magic resistance reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_BONUS%%%.
Enemies within the radius are hypnotized by the flickering light and unable to act.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_tether_Descrip: Tethers Io to an allied unit, granting bonus movement speed to both. When Io restores health or mana, the tethered unit gains a larger portion of that amount. The tether breaks when the allied unit moves too far away, or Io cancels the tether.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_tether_shard_d: Tether stuns enemies touching it for 1.75 seconds and deals 150 damage. Does not affect the same unit more than once every 7 seconds. Increases movement speed bonus by 8%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_tether_Lore: The benevolent touch of Io brings strength from between the planes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_tether_Note0: If you try to tether a unit that is 700 distance or further away from Io, he will latch on and pull himself closer to the tethered unit (to a distance of 300).
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_tether_Note1: The tethered unit will heal faster and will heal even if Io is at full health.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_tether_Note2: Io's movement speed matches the tethered unit's.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_tether_break_D: Break the link to the tethered unit.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_spirits_Descri: Summon five particle spirits that dance in a circle around Io. If a particle collides with an enemy hero, it explodes, damaging all enemy units in an area around it.  Creeps take minor damage from touching a particle spirit, but do not cause them to explode.  When its duration ends, any remaining Spirits explode.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_spirits_Lore: Io twists the particles of the universe with its unimaginable capabilities.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_spirits_Note0: After summoning, Io can call the spirits in and out.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_spirits_scepte: Spirits now passively spawn around Io constantly every second up to the max. Spirits colliding with enemy Heroes slows them briefly.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_spirits_in_Des: Sends the spirits closer to you. Can be toggled on and off.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_spirits_out_De: Sends the spirits farther away from you. Can be toggled on and off.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_overcharge_Lor: Drawing on the energy of matter from all worlds, Io begins the unravelling of time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_overcharge_Des: Io gains bonus attack speed, spell amplification, and HP Regen based on max health.  If Io is Tethered to an ally, that unit also gains the bonuses.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_overcharge_sha: Increases Overcharge Spell Amplification, and Io gains Spell Lifesteal and can now share Spell Lifesteal with its tethered target.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_relocate_Lore: Io is the embodiment of the mystery of the universe.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_relocate_Descr: Teleports Io and any tethered ally to any location. After the spell expires Io and any tethered ally will return to their original location. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_relocate_Note0: Enemies receive a visual indicator in the world and on the minimap of the target location during the cast delay.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_relocate_Note1: If Io is disabled during the cast delay, Relocate is cancelled.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_relocate_Note2: If an allied hero is Tethered, that hero will teleported along with you. You can break the tether at any time to prevent that hero from teleporting with you.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_empty1_Descrip: Calls the spirits closer to you. Can be toggled on and off. Only available while Spirits is active.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_empty2_Descrip: Sends the spirits farther away from you. Can be toggled on and off. Only available while Spirits is active.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_wisp_tether_Descri: Movement speed matched to and giving regen to tethered target.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_wisp_tether_haste_: Movement speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and getting health and mana regen from Io.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_wisp_tether_slow_d: Movement speed decreased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed decreased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_wisp_overcharge_De: Attack speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%, and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% HP Regen.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_wisp_relocate_retu: About to return to previous location.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_wisp_tether_scepte: Receiving Aghanim's Scepter upgrade during Tether.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slark_dark_pact_Des: After a short delay, Slark sacrifices some of his life blood, purging most negative debuffs and dealing damage to enemy units around him and to himself.  Slark only takes %self_damage_pct%%% of the damage.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slark_dark_pact_Lor: Slithereen are capable of quickly regrowing appendages, in case of critical injury, to save their own lives.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slark_dark_pact_Not: %delay% seconds after cast, a series of %total_pulses% pulses separated by %pulse_interval% seconds deal the damage.
Each pulse also removes debuffs from Slark.
You can't kill yourself with this skill.
The pulses stop if Slark dies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slark_pounce_Descri: Slark leaps forward, grabbing the first hero he connects with dealing damage to it.  That unit is leashed, and can only move a limited distance away from Slark's landing position.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slark_pounce_Lore: Time in the Dark Reef made Slark a dangerous assassin; aggressive and fearless.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slark_pounce_Note0: On cast, Slark leaps forward at a speed of %pounce_speed%, stopping when he latches onto an enemy hero or has traveled %pounce_distance% distance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slark_pounce_Note1: Spell Immune units cannot be leashed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slark_pounce_Note2: Trees will be destroyed around Slark's landing location.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slark_essence_shift: Slark steals the life essence of enemy heroes with his attacks, draining each of their attributes and converting them to bonus Agility. If Slark kills an affected enemy hero, he permanently steals %stat_loss% Agility.
With each strike at his adversaries, Slark's knowledge of their weaknesses improves.
Essence Shifted stats are returned to normal on death. The stat return for Slark and for the affected hero are separate.
To permanently steal Agility, Slark doesn't need to land the killing blow, as long as the enemy hero is killed within 300 range of Slark while having the Essence Shift debuff.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slark_shadow_dance_: When used, Slark hides himself in a cloud of shadows, becoming immune to detection. Attacking, casting spells, and using items will not reveal Slark.  Passively, when not visible to the enemy team, Slark gains bonus movement speed and health regeneration.
The hidden Thirteenth is a slippery foe.
If Slark is damaged by a neutral unit, the passive movement and health regeneration bonuses are lost for %neutral_disable% seconds.
The passive movement and health regeneration bonuses have a %activation_delay% second activation and deactivation delay.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slark_fish_bait_Des: Reduce movement speed of an enemy by %movement_speed%%% for %slow_duration% seconds and provide true sight vision over them. If Slark pounces on the enemy during that time, he will be rewarded with %attack_speed% Attack Speed for the duration of the Leash.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slark_depth_shroud_: Creates a cloud at the target location. All allies inside the radius are hidden and affected by Shadow Dance. Cast Range: %abilitycastrange%. Cooldown: %abilitycooldown%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_slark_pounce_leash: Leashed to Slark, can only move a limited distance away.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_slark_shadow_dance: Gaining %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% bonus movement speed and regenerating %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_PERCENTAGE%%% of max HP per second.
Invisible within your cloud of smoke.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_medusa_split_shot_D: Medusa magically splits her shot into several arrows. These arrows deal a lower percent of her normal damage.\n\nThe extra targets will not receive other attack effects (such as critical strike).
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_medusa_split_shot_L: All who encounter the cursed Gorgon will feel her rage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_medusa_split_shot_N: Secondary targets will be the closest enemy units excluding the primary target.
If illusions of Medusa are created while Split Shot is active, they will also have this ability.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_medusa_mystic_snake: A mystic snake made of energy jumps from target to target dealing damage. After it reaches its last target, it returns to Medusa to replenish her with mana. The snake deals more damage per jump and returns %snake_mana_steal%%% mana based on the targets' total mana.
Causes Mystic Snake to turn enemies hit into stone. Stone duration increases with each bounce of the Mystic Snake.
The Gorgon's curse is her greatest strength.

Shard: Cold Blooded is hidden in the ability panel when Shard is aquired, but a buff icon will appear.

Stone Gaze must be drafted for Aghanim's Scepter upgrade to work.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_medusa_mana_shield_: Creates a shield that absorbs %absorption_pct%%% of incoming damage in exchange for Medusa's mana. Provides bonus mana capacity.
While Medusa was not gifted with eternal life upon birth, her curse bestowed her with impressive defensive powers.
Absorbs damage before any damage reduction takes place, meaning that armor will not reduce the amount of mana needed to absorb damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_medusa_stone_gaze_D: Any enemy units looking at Medusa will have their movement and attack speed slowed.  If %face_duration% seconds of total time is accumulated looking at Medusa while Stone Gaze is active, that unit will turn to stone.  Petrified units are stunned, and take bonus physical damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_medusa_stone_gaze_L: The beauty of Medusa is legendary.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_medusa_stone_gaze_N: Regardless of when a unit receives the Stone Gaze buff while the ability is active on Medusa, it will still receive the full debuff duration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_medusa_cold_blooded: When Medusa is targeted with a spell, a single-target Mystic Snake is sent back towards the enemy. Cooldown: %abilitycooldown%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_medusa_mystic_snak: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and turn rate reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TURN_RATE_PERCENTAGE%%%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_medusa_mana_shield: Some of the damage taken by Medusa is dealt to her mana pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_medusa_stone_gaze_: Movement speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%. Enemies that look at you will have their attack and movement speed reduced.
Speed reduced by 35%.  Turning to stone while looking at Medusa.
Turned to stone.  Stunned and taking %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_INCOMING_PHYSICAL_DAMAGE_PERCENTAGE%%% extra physical damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_medusa_cold_bloode: Sending Mystic Snakes toward enemies targeting you with single-target spells.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_troll_warlord_berse: While active, Troll Warlord swaps from using ranged to melee attacks. Melee attacks have a chance to ensnare, preventing the target from moving or using mobility spells. Berserker's Rage also grants additional movement speed, armor, and decreases base attack time.\n\nWhirling Axes has different functionality while Berserker's Rage is active.
Like his anger, Troll Warlord's supply of axes is infinite.
Cooldowns of items that are different for ranged and melee units will be based on which form Troll Warlord was in when the item was used.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_troll_warlord_whirl: Troll hurls a fistful of five axes in a cone shape over %axe_range% range, slowing and damaging enemy units.
Causes Whirling Axes (Ranged) to dispel enemies. Reduces cooldown and manacost.
Only axes fueled by hate whirl with such a deadly spin.
Troll hurls two axes around him in a close range area of effect, damaging enemy units and causing them to miss some attacks.
Causes Whirling Axes (Melee) to dispel Troll Warlord. Reduces cooldown and manacost.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_troll_warlord_fervo: With each continuous blow on the same target, Troll gains increased attack speed.  If Troll changes targets, the stacks drop to zero.
If at first you don't succeed, strike, strike again.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_troll_warlord_battl: Troll unleashes a powerful battle trance, that forces you to continuously attack the closest enemy unit within %range% range, prioritizing heroes. Damage does not kill you during this mode. Grants you bonus lifesteal, attack speed and movement speed. Applies a Basic Dispel.
Casting Battle Trance now gives Troll Warlord a global aura that gives allied heroes (including himself) +60 Attack Speed.
An adrenaline rush of pure hatred quickens your blades.
Troll can still use his abilities while affected by Battle Trance.
Troll can still be killed with Axe's Culling Blade.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_troll_warlord_rampa: Grants all allied Heroes globally a bonus based on whichever stance Troll Warlord is currently in. Ranged provides bonus Attack Speed and melee provides Status Resistance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_troll_warlord_batt: Granting %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% attack speed, %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% movement speed, and lifesteal. Troll cannot die during Battle Trance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_troll_warlord_whir: Blinded, have a %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MISS_PERCENTAGE%%% chance to miss.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_troll_warlord_ramp: Gaining %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% attack speed and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_STATUS_RESISTANCE_STACKING%%% status resistance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_troll_warlord_batt: Troll Warlord has you in his sights!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_troll_warlord_bers: You're ensnared by an enraged Troll!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_centaur_hoof_stomp_: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy units.
When the mighty hoof of the Warrunner touches soil, the tremors are felt far and wide.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_centaur_double_edge: Centaur strikes a mighty blow at melee range, damaging both himself and a small area around the target. Deals extra damage based on your strength. Centaur cannot die from Double Edge.
Causes Double Edge to slow enemy heroes and increase Centaur's strength per hero hit for a short time. Duration refreshes per stack, up to a max of %shard_max_stacks% stacks.
In the spurs of combat, Bradwarden's vicious strikes sometimes cause self-inflicted collateral damage.
Double Edge deals magic type damage to both the targets and himself.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_centaur_return_Desc: Centaur counters all attacks, dealing damage back to the attacker. Returns a fixed amount plus a percentage of your strength. Deals half damage to towers.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_centaur_return_Lore: Bradwarden has no need to parry his opponent's attacks; his armor-like hide does it for him.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_centaur_return_Note: Retaliate triggers when the attack hits.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_centaur_stampede_De: Centaur leads all allies into a vicious charge causing them to move through units at max speed and slow any enemy units they trample. Trampled enemies take damage based on Centaur Warrunner's strength. Each enemy can be trampled once.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_centaur_stampede_Lo: The great belt of Omexe, which labels Bradwarden as the greatest warrior of his kind, incites his fellow gladiators to follow him into barbarous combat.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_centaur_stampede_sc: Heroes affected by Stampede take reduced damage, and are able to run through obstructions, including trees and up cliffs. Enemies affected by Stampede are leashed. Increases duration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_centaur_stampede_D: Moving at max speed and slowing enemy units trampled.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_centaur_stampede_s: Unit is hit by stampede, it has reduced movement speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_centaur_return_cou: Activate to grant additional attack damage per stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_centaur_doubleedge: Increasing Centaur's strength and slowing enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_magnataur_shockwave: Magnus sends out a wave of force, damaging enemy units in a line, pulling them towards him and slowing them for a brief period.

Increases Shockwave's width and range.  The Shockwave line erupts after a short delay, dealing an additional percent of Shockwave's damage, slowing enemy movement speed and reducing their armor for a brief time. Armor and movement speed are slowly regained until the debuff expires.
Mt. Joerlak was a somewhat unstable mass, and Magnus has learned to channel its reverberations.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_magnataur_empower_D: Gives an allied unit bonus damage and cleave on attack. Magnus receives %self_multiplier%%% larger bonus.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_magnataur_empower_L: With a deep bellow, Magnus displays his true power.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_magnataur_empower_N: The bonus damage is based only on base damage and damage from primary attributes.
Cleave damage goes through spell immunity.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_magnataur_skewer_De: Magnus rushes forward, goring enemy units on his massive tusk. Heroes hit on the way will be dragged to the destination, then damaged and affected by slowed movement and attack speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_magnataur_skewer_Lo: Magnoceros horns are valuable in direct proportion to their danger to prospective merchants.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_magnataur_reverse_p: Magnus changes properties of matter, sucking all nearby enemies in front of him and stunning them with a powerful slam and dealing damage.
Magnus fights with the fury of the erupting Mt. Joerlak.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_magnataur_horn_toss: Magnus tosses any enemies in front of him, launching them to his rear. Enemies take damage, spend %air_duration% seconds in the air, and then are heavily slowed upon landing.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_magnataur_empower_: Base damage increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_BASEDAMAGEOUTGOING_PERCENTAGE%%%, gaining %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP%%% cleave damage.
Base damage increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_BASEDAMAGEOUTGOING_PERCENTAGE%%%.  Melee heroes gain %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP%%% cleave damage on hit.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shredder_whirling_d: Timbersaw whirls extremely sharp edges, damaging enemies and destroying trees around him in an area.  If an enemy hero is affected, it loses some of its primary attribute for a short duration.  Whirling Death will deal bonus damage per tree destroyed.
In the case that Rizzrack gets surrounded by the vines and plants of his nightmares, he has an immediate chainsaw defense.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shredder_timber_cha: Timbersaw fires a chain that embeds itself in the first tree it hits, pulling him towards it.  Any enemy in the path takes damage.
You never know when you might need to escape from malevolent saplings.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shredder_reactive_a: Each time Timbersaw is attacked, he gains increased health regen and armor.
The saw-suit is equipped to react to the slightest touch with fortified defenses.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shredder_chakram_De: Fires Timbersaw's main saw blade at the target location where it will spin in place, dealing damage in an area around it.  Enemies caught in the saw blade will move more slowly for every %slow_health_percentage%%% of health missing. The blade deals damage and cuts down trees in its path when fired and retracted.  While active the ability costs mana, and Timbersaw loses the ability to attack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shredder_chakram_No: The Chakram will return if Timbersaw runs out of mana or moves over %break_distance% distance away.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shredder_chakram_sc: Increases Chakram and Second Chakram damage per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shredder_chakram_2_: Cut cut cut cut cut cut cut cut cut cut cut!
The Chakram will return if Timbersaw runs out of mana or moves over %break_distance% distance away.
Slow effects from two chakrams do not stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shredder_flamethrow: Releases a flame in the direction Timbersaw is facing. Applies a debuff that deals damage per second and slows enemy movement speed. Affects buildings for reduced damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_shredder_whirling_: Losing a percentage of primary attribute.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_shredder_reactive_: Gaining bonus armor and HP regen per stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_shredder_chakram_d: Taking damage over time and being slowed by the Chakram.
You cannot attack while Chakram is in the air.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_shredder_timber_ch: Damaging any enemy in your path.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_shredder_flamethro: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and ticking for %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% damage per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_shredder_chakram_d: Taking damage over time and being slowed by the Chakram.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bristleback_viscous: Covers a target in snot, causing it to have reduced armor and movement speed.  Multiple casts stack and refresh the duration.
Viscous Nasal Goo becomes a no target area of effect ability, applying to all enemies within range. Increases stack limit.
Having caught a cold while stuck in the snow, Bristleback turns it to his advantage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bristleback_quill_s:
Shard: Access Hairball by toggling auto-cast on Quill Spray.

Must draft Nasal Goo for it to work with Hairball.
Sprays enemy units with quills dealing damage in an area of effect around Bristleback.  Deals bonus damage for every time a unit was hit by Quill Spray in the last %quill_stack_duration% seconds.
An enforcer's honor can be a prickly thing.  So can his quills.
Quill Spray damage is not reduced by damage block abilities.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bristleback_bristle: Quill Spray must be drafted also to release when damage threshold reached.
Bristleback takes less damage if hit on the sides or rear.  If Bristleback takes %quill_release_threshold% damage from the rear, he releases a Quill Spray of the current level.
Turning his back to a fight might be just the thing.
Bristleback's rear is considered to be within 70 degrees from the back.
Bristleback's side is considered to be within 110 degrees from the back.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bristleback_warpath: Bristleback works himself up into a fury every time he casts a spell, increasing his movement speed and damage.
'Temper, temper,' his mum always chided.  But in a fight, a temper can come in handy.
Bristleback's illusions will receive the bonuses.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bristleback_hairbal: Coughs a quill-packed hairball towards the target location. Erupts at the location, hitting enemies in with Viscous Nasal Goo and stacks of Quill Spray.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_bristleback_quill_: Each stack increases damage taken from Quill Spray
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_bristleback_warpat: Moving %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% faster and dealing %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PREATTACK_BONUS_DAMAGE% bonus damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_ice_shards_Des: Tusk compresses shards of ice into a ball of frozen energy that damages all enemies it comes in contact with. When the ball reaches its target destination the shards are released, creating a barrier that lasts for %shard_duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_ice_shards_Lor: In the frozen tundra near the Barrier, after the last sun of autumn has set, ice can form with alarming speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_ice_shards_sha: Increases depth of Ice Shards, and enemies trapped within an ice shard are slowed and take damage per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_snowball_Descr: Tusk begins rolling into a snowball. Allies within a %snowball_grab_radius% radius can also be added to the snowball by right-clicking on them, even while the snowball is moving. Once launched, any enemies caught in the snowball's path will be stunned and take damage. Each allied Hero in the snowball will add to its damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_snowball_Lore: Tales are still told of the wild feat that ended the grand brawl at White Fields.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_snowball_Note0: The snowball will break apart a maximum of 3 seconds after launch.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_snowball_Note1: The snowball can be launched early by pressing using the Launch Snowball ability.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_snowball_Note2: Doesn't carry illusions, but will carry Meepo clones and other units that Tusk controls.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_snowball_Note3: Each Meepo clone added to the snowball will add its own bonus damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_snowball_Note4: Allies can click on a snowball to add themselves to it.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_launch_snowbal: Launch the snowball toward the target.
Doesn't carry illusions, but will carry Meepo clones and other units that Tusk controls.
Each Meepo clone added to the snowball will add its own bonus damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_frozen_sigil_D: Summons a flying Sigil that slows movement speed by -40% for enemies within 650 radius. Lasts 25 seconds. Cooldown: 30
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_frozen_sigil_N: If no order is given, the Sigil will follow Tusk.

The Sigil has unobstructed movement, has a 310 movement speed, requires 3/3/4/4 hero attacks to destroy and 12/12/16/16 creep attacks to destroy, provides 400/400 vision, and gives a 90/100/110/120 gold bounty.
Heroes deal 1 damage to the sigil, while non-hero units deal 0.25 damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_tag_team_Descr: Temporarily applies a negative debuff aura around you, causing enemies that are attacked under it to take bonus physical damage and reduced movement speed. Lasts %debuff_duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_tag_team_Lore: Even far from Cobalt, Tusk carries the 'Barrier Chill' in his very bones.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_tag_team_Note0: Affects attacks from allied heroes, Tusk or any of his units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_walrus_punch_D: Tusk connects with his mighty Walrus Punch, a critical strike so powerful it launches its victim into the air. The victim is slowed upon landing.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_walrus_punch_L: It never matters who throws the first punch, only who throws the last.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_walrus_kick_De: Kicks the closest enemy unit in a targeted direction, stunning, damaging, and slowing them. Also deals damage to all heroes within %search_radius% radius of its landing area. Cooldown is reduced by %creep_cooldown_reduction_pct%%% if kicking a creep.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_walrus_kick_lo: Tusk may have made his name with his fists, but the wise enemy is wary of any and all limbs.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_tusk_frozen_sigil_: Slowing nearby enemy attack and movement speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_tusk_tag_team_Desc: Movement speed slowed by 75% and taking extra physical damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_tusk_tag_team_aura: Slowing enemies and causing attacks against them to deal more physical damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_mage_shiel: Every time Skywrath Mage casts an ability, he gains a buff that grants bonus Intelligence and Armor. Each cast stacks independently.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_mage_arcan: Skywrath Mage launches a slow-moving bolt of arcane magic, dealing damage to an enemy unit based on Skywrath Mage's intelligence.
Within the Ghastly Eyrie's endless intrigue, only the clever and calm can hope to survive.
The projectile moves very slowly (500 ms), providing 325 vision around it.  Upon impact, it will reveal the target area for 3.34 seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_mage_concu: Skywrath Mage sets off a long range shot that hits the closest hero within a long range.  Upon impact, it deals damage and slows in an area of effect.
Those who serve the court of the Ghastly Eyrie are ever locked in covert war. One must always know where danger lurks nearest.
If no enemy heroes are in range or they are in fog, Concussive Shot targets the nearest enemy creep.
Damages creeps around the impact area.
Provides 400 vision around the projectile, and reveals the target area for 3.34 seconds upon impact.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_mage_ancie: Skywrath Mage seals the targeted unit with an ancient rune, silencing it and causing it to take additional damage from spells.
Ancient Seal debuff now causes other debuffs applied to last 50%% longer. Grants vision over the target.
A holy incantation, whosoever finds themselves touched by Avilliva's sigil must suffer in penitent silence.
The magic damage resistance reduction doesn't affect creeps.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_mage_mysti: Skywrath Mage uses his ultimate magical ability to conjure a precise and violent mystical field that lays waste to his adversaries. Deals massive damage distributed evenly among any Heroes in the area over %duration% seconds.
Only the most practiced of Skywrath sorcerers could hope to shape the skies into such a storm.
Mystic Flare only affects Heroes; it does not damage illusions or creep heroes.
Spell immune enemies do not count toward the damage distribution.
Mystic Flare will damage enemy creeps if no enemy heroes are present.
When Skywrath Mage casts Mystic Flare, another Mystic Flare will be created on the position of a different random target enemy within %scepter_radius% range. Heroes will take priority.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_mage_arcan: When Skywrath Mage casts Arcane Bolt, a different random target within %scepter_radius% range willl be hit with the same ability. Heroes will take priority.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_mage_concu: When Skywrath Mage casts Concussive Shot, a different random target within cast range will be hit with the same ability. Heroes will take priority.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_mage_ancie: Anytime Skywrath Mage casts Ancient Seal, a different random target within %scepter_radius% range will be affected by the same ability. Heroes will take priority.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_skywrath_mage_anci: Silenced and magic damage increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_BONUS%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_abaddon_death_coil_: Abaddon releases a coil of deathly mist that can damage an enemy unit or heal a friendly unit at the cost of some of Abaddon's health.
A mysterious vapor from the Font of Avernus now infuses the breath of Abaddon, who releases it at will.
Abaddon can not kill himself with this skill.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_abaddon_aphotic_shi: Summons dark energies around an ally unit, creating a shield that absorbs a set amount of damage before expiring. When the shield is destroyed it will burst and deal damage equal to the amount it could absorb to an area around it. Removes certain types of negative buffs and stuns on cast.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
The powers of the black mist rise to absorb attacks like the black mist absorbs light.
The max damage is always dealt whether the shield is destroyed by expiring or absorbing damage.
The explosion does not damage units hidden by the fog of war.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_abaddon_frostmourne: Abaddon strikes an enemy, slowing the target's movement speed. If the target gets hit %hit_count% times, they become affected by a chilling curse causing them to be silenced and slowed, and all attacks against them gain an attack speed boost.
Causes Mist Coil to deal Abaddon's attack damage on impact. Increase Curse of Avernus base slow.
Shard upgrade effects require Mist Coil and/or Aphotic Shield to be drafted.
While the baptized draw strength from the Font, the gifts of Avernus are debilitating to the uninitiated.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_abaddon_borrowed_ti: When activated, all damage dealt to you will heal instead of harm. Most negative buffs will also be removed. If the ability is not on cooldown, it will automatically activate if your health falls below %hp_threshold%.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
The most unnatural of all the gifts of the Font of Avernus, this power defies mortal understanding.  What should hurt, instead heals; and what should kill gives strength anew.

Increases duration. While Borrowed Time is active, anytime an ally takes more than %ally_threshold_scepter% damage while within %redirect_range_scepter% range of Abaddon, an individual Mist Coil will automatically fire towards that ally.
Borrowed Time can be manually activated while Abaddon is disabled, but not while silenced.  The passive activation can still occur while silenced.
Aphotic Shield does not block any damage to Abaddon when Borrowed Time is active, allowing him to heal.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_abaddon_borrowed_t: All damage taken by Abaddon heals him instead.
Anytime a nearby ally takes more than a set amount of damage, an individual Mist Coil will automatically fire towards that ally.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_abaddon_aphotic_sh: Absorbing damage; upon absorbing the max damage, explodes and deals damage in an area.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_abaddon_frostmourn: Silenced and slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%.  All attacking units gain bonus attack speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_elder_titan_echo_st: Elder Titan and his Astral Spirit both stomp the ground, damaging and knocking nearby enemy units unconscious around their locations.  The Elder Titan stomp deals physical damage, while the Spirit stomp deals magical damage.
Echo Stomp may be placed on autocast to allow Elder Titan to take the place of the Astral Spirit as it completes its stomp.
Echo Stomp will still apply both the physical and magical damage values regardless of Astral Spirit being drafted.
The force of creation still echoes in the stomp of the Titan.
If a unit is hit by Astral Spirit and Elder Titan, they will take both instances of damage.

Elder Titan and his Astral Spirit both stomp the ground, damaging and knocking nearby enemy units unconscious around their locations.  The Elder Titan stomp deals physical damage, while the Spirit stomp deals magical damage.  Unconscious enemies will wake if they take damage.
The force of creation still echoes in the stomp of the Titan.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_elder_titan_ancestr: Elder Titan sends forth his Astral Spirit, damaging any units it passes through.  When the spirit rejoins the Titan, it grants bonus damage, armor, and movement speed for each unit it passed through.\n\nThe Astral Spirit can be controlled and possesses the Echo Stomp, Return Spirit, and Natural Order abilities.
Like the four fundamentals, Elder Titan exists across all planes at once and can draw other aspects of himself to assist in times of need.
Causes Elder Titan to become spell immune for %scepter_magic_immune_per_hero% seconds per affected enemy Hero when the spirit returns.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_elder_titan_return_: Returns the Astral Spirit to Elder Titan.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_elder_titan_move_sp: Moves the Astral Spirit to target location.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_elder_titan_natural: Reduces all elements to their basic levels, removing base armor and magic damage resistance from nearby enemy units. The armor reduction is centered around the hero, while the magic armor reduction is centered around Astral Spirit.
As it was at the beginning, Elder Titan makes it so again.
When the Astral Spirit isn't present, both the armor and magic armor reduction is centered around Elder Titan.
When the Astral Spirit isn't present, both the armor and magic armor reduction is centered around Elder Titan.

Reduces all elements to their basic levels, removing base armor and magic damage resistance from nearby enemy units. The armor reduction is centered around the hero, while the magic armor reduction is centered around Astral Spirit.
As it was at the beginning, Elder Titan makes it so again.
Magic resist reduction will only apply if Astral Spirit has also been drafted.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_elder_titan_earth_s: Sends forth a jagged crack in front of Elder Titan. After 3 seconds, the crack implodes, slowing movement while dealing damage to each enemy based on their maximum life. Half of the damage dealt is Magical damage, while the other half is Physical damage.
That which he created, the titan tears asunder.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_elder_titan_ancest: Gaining %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% bonus movement speed, %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS% bonus armor, and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PREATTACK_BONUS_DAMAGE% bonus damage.

Reducing base magic damage resistance and armor by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP%%%.
Reducing base magic damage resistance by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_legion_commander_ov: Turns the enemies' numbers against them, dealing damage and granting you bonus movement speed per unit or per hero.  Deals bonus damage to illusions and summoned units as a percent of their current health.
Overwhelming Odds now grants armor for every unit hit and has increased duration.
The archers of Stonehall are ready at Tresdin's command.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_legion_commander_pr: Removes debuffs and disables from the target friendly unit, and grants bonus attack speed and health regen for a short time.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
Press The Attack targets now gain Spell Immunity for 1.75 seconds. Reduces cooldown by 2 seconds.
The rallying horn of the Bronze Legion is able to inspire any heart.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_legion_commander_mo: When attacked, Legion Commander has a chance to immediately counterattack with bonus lifesteal.
Tresdin knows that an enemy's most vulnerable moment often follows their fiercest stroke.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_legion_commander_du: Legion Commander and the target enemy hero are forced to attack each other for a short duration.  Neither hero can use items or abilities.  If either hero dies during the duration, the hero winning the Duel gains permanent bonus damage.
Increases Duel duration and reduces cooldown.  Legion Commander and her opponent take reduced damage from other sources.
Duels will end if the units are pushed 2000 units apart.
Winning a Duel automatically casts Press the Attack on yourself.
To face a soldier of Stonehall in single combat is a challenge few can resist.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_legion_commander_p: Gaining %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% attack speed and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% HP regen.

Gaining bonus damage permanently from won duels.

Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ember_spirit_searin: Ember Spirit unleashes fiery bolas that wrap around nearby enemies, anchoring them in place and dealing damage each second.
Targets are chosen randomly around Xin.
Does not affect Spell Immune or invisible units.
Xin's harshest lessons often employed the use of red-hot chains.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ember_spirit_sleigh: Ember Spirit dashes around with blazing speed, attacking all enemies in the targeted area of effect, then returning to his start location.  Deals bonus damage to heroes.

A regular attack is done to each target every %attack_interval% seconds.
Any attack modifier that Xin has (such as Critical Strike, Bash, Cleave, or Orb effects) will be applied normally on these attacks.

Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ember_spirit_flame_: Ember Spirit surrounds himself with a ring of fire that consumes incoming magic damage, absorbing a percentage of the damage taken.  Flame Guard deals damage per second in an area around Ember Spirit while Flame Guard is active.  If the shield is broken, the damage is also lost.

An enemy should never be allowed to approach without difficulty.

With blazing speed does a spirit fly!

Using Activate Fire Remnant, Ember Spirit will dash out to all active Fire Remnants, destroying them and dealing damage in an area and then moving to the nearest Remnant.  Ember Spirit will end at the Remnant closest to the targeted location.
Fire Remnants deal damage per second in an area around them. If an enemy hero dies near Ember Spirit, a Fire Remnant charge will be replenished.
Increases cast range, initial remnant speed, and maximum charges.
By the spirit's power are Xin's teachings spread anew.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ember_spirit_seari: Locked in place by Searing Chains.  Cannot blink or move, taking damage per second.

Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ember_spirit_sleig: Attacking all enemies in the targeted area of effect.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spirit_boulde: Earth Spirit smashes the target enemy or ally, sending them in the direction he is facing. If Earth Spirit targets an area, he will smash the nearest Stone Remnant in a %remnant_smash_radius_tooltip% radius. The travelling unit or Remnant damages all enemy units it hits.  If an enemy is hit by a Stone Remnant, they are also slowed. Stone Remnants travel further than other units.
It is with the power of a mountain that Earth Spirit strikes his enemies.
Stone Remnant combination require drafting Magnetize to get the Stone Remnants.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spirit_rollin: Earth Spirit gathers himself into a boulder and, after a %delay%s delay, rolls toward the target location, dealing %damage% + %damage_str%%% STR damage and stunning enemy units. He will stop if he collides with an enemy hero or is stunned. If he rolls over a Stone Remnant, he will travel further and faster, and stun enemies for longer.
Calling upon his connection to the land, the Earth Spirit draws loose stone to him, which forms a protective ball that he can use to roll short distances.
Stone Remnant combination require drafting Magnetize to get the Stone Remnants.
Rolling over a Stone Remnant will destroy the Remnant.

Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere, Duel, or Black Hole.
Geomagnetic Grip can also target allied creeps.

Like calls to like. Even the minerals found in the blood and bones of living beings are not immune to the call of the Earth Spirit.

Causes Stone Remnant to provide ground vision. Increases charge count.
Earth Spirit calls forth a remnant of his stone army, long buried with him in the dark embrace of the Earth.

Magnetized heroes cause nearby Stone Remnants to explode, destroying the remnant and refreshing Magnetize's duration on all nearby enemies. This process can repeat multiple times. If an enemy hero is affected by Geomagnetic Grip or Boulder Smash, all magnetized heroes share the effects.

Also grants Stone Remnant ability. Acquiring Scepter will grant the Enchant Remnant ability.

Earth Spirit temporarily enchants a hero, granting them the properties of a Stone Remnant. After a short duration the remnant shatters, releasing the hero and damaging nearby enemies. < br>
Can be cast on Stone Remnants. Has a 5 second cooldown when used that way.

Kaolin uses the elemental power of the Earth to temporarily petrify living beings, so that they might be conscripted into his stone funerary army.

Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_abyssal_underlord_f: Calls down waves of fire that damage enemy units in the target area, burning for additional damage over time.

Twisting into the seams of reality itself, Vrogros' manifest hatred paralyzes those who defy his will.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_abyssal_underlord_a: Nearby enemy units are weakened, losing a portion of their base damage. If an enemy dies while under this effect, Underlord gains temporary bonus damage.

Allies that pass through the portal temporarily gain Damage Reduction and Movement Speed. Portals have to be at least %minimum_distance% away from each other.

Opens a dark rift at the targeted friendly unit's or building's position.  After a short delay, Underlord and all nearby friendly heroes are teleported to that unit's location.  Dark Rift can be cancelled at anytime during the cast.  If it is cancelled in this way or the target unit dies before the spell becomes active, Dark Rift goes into cooldown.
They come without warning, leaving fire and blood where kingdoms once flourished.

Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phoenix_icarus_dive: Phoenix dives forward in an arc with a fixed distance in the targeted direction, dealing damage over time and slowing the movement speed of any units it comes into contact with, and then orbiting back to its original position. If Phoenix casts Supernova, the dive ends.
Though no stranger to travelling the cosmic void, soaring within an atmosphere offers unique pleasures.

Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_terrorblade_reflect: Terrorblade brings forth an invulnerable dark reflection of all enemy heroes in a target area. Affected enemy heroes are slowed and attacked by their reflection.
In the fractal prison of Foulfell, Terrorblade learned the truth of this old tale: you are your own worst enemy.  Now it is a lesson he teaches others.
