Delayed damage and healing will take armor and magic resistance reductions into account when received.
The delayed damage and healing takes effect as soon as the target becomes vulnerable.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_oracle_fates_edict: Disarmed, magic damage resistance increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_BONUS%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_oracle_false_promi: Any healing or damage taken is delayed until False Promise ends. Delayed healing will be doubled.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_oracle_rain_of_dest: Brings forth rain to the target area. Enemies standing in the area receive damage and have reduced heal amplification. Allies in the area heal and have increased incoming heal amplification.
Through mixture of the astral and the atmospheric, Nerif bends a single reality into paradoxical alignment.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_oracle_rain_of_des: Increases allies' heal amplification and reduces enemies' by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEAL_AMPLIFY_PERCENTAGE_TARGET%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_land_mines_: Plant an invisible mine that cannot be detected by True Sight, but is visible if an enemy is within the active %radius% AoE of the mine. Mines detonate if an enemy is standing within the active AoE for %proximity_threshold% seconds dealing damage and temporarily reducing the enemy's Magic Resistance. The explosion deals full damage if the target is within %min_distance% radius and decreases up to %outer_damage%%% on the edge. Deals %building_damage_pct%%% damage to buildings.
Cannot be placed within %placement_radius% AoE of another Proximity Mine.
Proximity Mines do not block neutral creep camps from spawning.
Mines last until they explode or are destroyed.
Mines are triggered by invisible units.
Mines will not be triggered by some flying units.
Grants 30 gold if destroyed by an enemy hero.
Mines damage and debuff pierce spell immunity.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_stasis_trap: Plant an invisible trap that roots nearby enemy units instantly when triggered.
Stasis Traps destroy all other Stasis Traps in their area of effect when they detonate.
Stasis Traps are not triggered by invisible units.
Stasis Traps do not block neutral creep camps from spawning.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_suicide_Des: Techies hurtle themselves into the enemy's midst, detonating charges upon impact which deal massive area of effect damage and silence enemies. Upon landing, the assault deals Techies non-lethal damage equal to a percentage of their current health.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_suicide_sha: Increases Blast Off! cast range by %shard_bonus_cast_range% and applies a %shard_stun_duration% second stun to affected enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_suicide_Not: The self-damage Techies receive from this blast is non-lethal.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_sticky_bomb: Lobs a Sticky Bomb towards the target area. If it lands next to an enemy hero, the bomb will stick to it, slowing its movement speed. After a few seconds the bomb will explode, dealing damage in an area around the detonation and applying a secondary slow for %secondary_slow_duration% seconds.
Such revolutionary brilliance was meant to be shared.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_reactive_ta: Reactive Tazer can be cast on allies and deals %scepter_damage% damage on detonation.

Techies trigger an electric charge giving them bonus movement speed for a short period of time. Enemies attacking Techies are temporarily disarmed. At the end of the effect, the charge explodes, disarming all enemies within the radius.
A steady bomb hand prefers an abundance of personal space.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_remote_mine: Plant an invisible explosive that will only detonate after a brief delay when triggered.  Does not damage buildings.
Grants 10 gold if destroyed by an enemy hero.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_focused_det: Detonate all remote mines in the target area.
Why light one fuse when you can light them all?
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_minefield_s: Plant a warning sign to remind enemies to step lightly. Only one sign can exist at a time. Lasts %lifetime% seconds.
Allows Minefield Sign to hide any Proximity Mines, Stasis Traps, and Remote Mines in an area around the sign from True Sight.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_techies_land_mines: You can only place a Proximity Mine when you have a charge available.  Charges slowly restore over time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_techies_stasis_tra: You found one of the Techies' Stasis Traps!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_techies_land_mines: The number of Proximity Mines currently deployed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_techies_minefield_: Hidden by the Techies' Minefield Sign.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_techies_reactive_t: Movement speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and zapping attackers.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_winter_wyvern_arcti: Winter Wyvern soars upon an arctic wind, granting her unobstructed movement and allowing her to exhale a blistering chill into each attack. While soaring, her attacks travel further and faster, and slow enemies with a magical freeze that strips them of %percent_damage%%% of their current health each second. Her sight is also hardened against night's chill, granting her %night_vision_bonus% additional vision range at night while soaring.
Causes Arctic Burn to be a toggle ability, draining mana every second when active. Removes limit on number of attacks per target. Increases Winter Wyvern's movement speed.
The same organ where some dragons stoke their inner flame is, in Auroth, a crucible of unimaginable cold. From deep within her frosty gullet, an exhalation sends enemies into burning agony.
Enemy units can only receive the Arctic Burn debuff once per cast.
This ability does not affect Roshan.
Reduces Winter Wyvern's attack point to %attack_point%.
The damage and slow from Arctic Burn can be dispelled.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_winter_wyvern_splin: Launches a ball of brittle ice toward an enemy. The ice shatters on impact, leaving the primary target completely unaffected, while hurling damaging splinters into nearby enemies in a %split_radius% radius. Enemies struck by these splinters are slowed by %movespeed_slow_tooltip%%%.
Produced slowly by specialized vesicles in her frozen gullet, Winter Wyvern blast shards of ice at her enemies.
The primary projectile moves at %projectile_speed% movement speed, or reaches the target in %projectile_max_time% second, whichever is faster.
The primary projectile cannot be disjointed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_winter_wyvern_cold_: Encases an ally in an icy cocoon, freezing them solid while healing a base amount as well as a percentage of their maximum health each second. The cocoon blocks all physical damage.
When Cold Embrace ends, a Splinter Blast goes off at that location, hitting enemies within %shard_splinter_range% range. Reduces cooldown by %shard_cooldown_reduction% seconds.
Shard upgrade requires also drafting Splinter Blast.
From winter's heart comes a cold, healing embrace. The ice slows the blood and allows the spell to better work its curative magic.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_winter_wyvern_winte: Winter Wyvern freezes an enemy in place while striking those nearby with a maddening curse which causes them to attack their frozen ally with increased attack speed. The frozen ally and those cursed to attack their ally are immune to all damage from their enemies with the exception of Winter Wyvern or her controlled units.
The oldest of the bookwurm’s spells, this curse lends truth to the old saw: sometimes the enemy of my enemy is my enemy still.
If the target dies to its allies, Winter Wyvern will receive credit for the kill.
Will only pierce the spell immunity of the primary target, not the target's surrounding allies.
If there are no allies within range of the Cursed enemy for %early_out_timer% seconds the effect will end early.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_winter_wyvern_arct: Flying. Attacks travel further and faster, and slow enemies while burning them for a percentage of their current health.
Slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, and losing a percentage of current health per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_winter_wyvern_cold: Immune to physical damage, and regenerating health.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_winter_wyvern_wint: Frozen in place, and will be attacked by nearby teammates.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_arc_warden_flux_Des: Infuses a lone enemy unit with swirling, volatile energy, slowing its movement speed and dealing damage over time. The effect is muted if another enemy unit is near the target.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_arc_warden_flux_Lor: An infinitesimal fraction of the power which imprisoned the Ancients.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_arc_warden_magnetic: Generates a circular distortion field of magnetic energy that grants bonus attack speed and protects allied heroes and buildings within it by evading attacks coming from outside the field.
Magnetic Field slows pushes enemies out of the area when cast and slows them while they are in it, and provides allies in it with magic resistance.
Time and space are of little consequence to one as old as Zet.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_arc_warden_spark_wr: Summons a Spark Wraith that slowly materializes and patrols a targeted area until an enemy comes within its range. Once a target has been found the wraith fuses with them, dealing magical damage and slowing the unit.
Causes Spark Wraiths to spawn a new Spark Wraith after impacting an enemy, which then starts its %scepter_activation_delay% second activation period.
Lesser fragments of Zet's original self.
Spark Wraiths can not be disjointed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_arc_warden_tempest_: Briefly refocusing its fractured elements into a single form, the Arc Warden is able to create a perfect electrical duplication of itself. The duplicate can use all of Arc Warden's current items and spells, except most consumables and items that drop on death. The duplicate has separate item and ability cooldowns.  The Tempest Double gives bounty gold to enemies when killed. The Tempest Double loses its sense of self if he is too far away from Arc Warden and deals less attack damage.
Warped by the power of its peers, Arc Warden becomes what it despises most: disharmony.
Tempest Double and Refresher Orb cannot be used by the duplicate.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_arc_warden_flux_De: Taking damage and slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% when not near a friendly unit.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_arc_warden_magneti: Gaining bonus %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% attack speed and granting 100%% evasion from attacks outside the field.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_arc_warden_tempest: A complete clone of Arc Warden that can use spells and items with the exception of Gem of True Sight and Divine Rapier.
Outgoing damage reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_DAMAGEOUTGOING_PERCENTAGE%%% from being far from the real Arc Warden.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_king_tree_da: Monkey King jumps to a tree and perches atop it. While perched, he gains the Primal Spring ability-a channeled leap attack. If Monkey King's tree is destroyed, he falls and is stunned for 4 seconds. Taking damage from player controlled units or Roshan while on the ground puts Tree Dance on cooldown.
Sun Wukong dances nimbly along the treetop canopy, always just out of arm's reach.
Tree Dance cooldown starts upon landing.
Right-clicking the ground will have Monkey King drop from the tree.
For Ability Draft only, Tree Dance ability swaps with Primal Spring while you are perched on a tree. You can no longer jump to other trees without returning to the ground first.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_king_primal_: Monkey King springs out from his tree perch, damaging and slowing enemies in the area where he lands. Damage and slow amounts are in proportion to channel duration.
Leaping from the safety of cover into the midst of his enemies, Sun Wukong attacks without mercy.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_king_boundle: Monkey King enlarges his staff and slams it against the ground, stunning enemies in a line and damaging them with a critical hit based on his attack. Has True Strike.
The legendary Jingu Bang grows to match its master's will, ensuring no enemy can escape the Monkey King's reach.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_king_jingu_m: Monkey King's attacks awaken the Jingu Bang's power. Upon the fourth hit on the same enemy hero, Monkey King earns four charged attacks that have bonus damage and lifesteal.
Always sensitive to the moods of its master, the Jingu Bang radiates power when Sun Wukong's combat fervor is on full display.
Hitting an enemy with Boundless Strike adds to the hit counter.
Repeatedly hitting an enemy refreshes the Jingu Mastery debuff duration.
Hit charges on enemies cannot be dispelled.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_king_mischie: Mischief has a shorter cooldown, longer invulnerability period, no longer slows Monkey King and disjoints projectiles.

Changes Monkey King's shape to deceive opponents, using the environment nearby as inspiration for the disguise. Taking damage, attacking, or using any item or ability breaks Monkey King's disguise. Grants damage immunity for %invul_duration% seconds upon transforming.
If transformed into a courier, Monkey King matches the movement speed of the courier.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_king_untrans: Reverts Monkey King's shape to his original form.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_king_wukongs: Monkey King creates a circular formation of soldiers that spread out from his position. If Monkey King leaves the area his soldiers disperse. The soldiers have Monkey King's attack and only target heroes. Monkey King is granted bonus armor for the spell's duration.

Spawns a monkey soldier near Monkey King at regular intervals. Soldiers do not spawn while invisible or on trees. Soldiers only attack buildings when Monkey King himself is nearby. Soldiers can now gain Jingu Mastery charges independently.
Monkey King rips out a tuft of fur to blow at his enemies, charging each strand to transform into a copy of himself.
Soldiers do not receive Jingu Mastery bonuses.
Soldiers do not copy Basher or Abyssal.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_monkey_king_boundl: Stunned by Monkey King's Boundless Strike
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_monkey_king_unperc: Fell out of a tree; stunned
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_willow_bramble: Dark Willow creates a maze of brambles that grow in the target area after %initial_creation_delay% seconds.  Enemies that walk into a bramble are rooted and take damage over time.
The fae realm exists all around you, merely waiting to draw you in...
Does not reveal rooted invisible enemies.
Does not interrupt channeling spells upon rooting.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_willow_shadow_: Dark Willow recedes into the shadows, becoming untargetable.  Her next attack has increased attack range and deals bonus magic damage, and will end Shadow Realm. Damage scales based on how long she remains under the effects of Shadow Realm, the maximum being reached after %max_damage_duration% seconds.
What you can't see will most definitely hurt you.
Attacking no longer takes Dark Willow out of Shadow Realm. Each attack still has bonus damage based on the duration of the buff.
Spells which require vision cannot affect Dark Willow in the Shadow Realm.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_willow_cursed_: Dark Willow casts an ancient fae curse on the target. After a delay, the target and nearby enemies are stunned.

Cursed Crown creates %shard_bramble_amount% brambles in a %shard_spawn_radius% radius around the target after the counter ends. Triggers even upon dispel. Reduces stun delay by %shard_delay_reduction% second.
Didn't anyone ever tell you? Never strike a deal with a fairy...
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_willow_terrori: Dark Willow releases her pet wisp to terrorize her enemies. After a short delay, all enemies in the target area become fearful and run toward their home fountain. Terrorize cannot be used while Bedlam is active.
You think you know the first thing about fear? Jex'll show you what that word truly means...
Terrorize provides vision on affected units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_willow_bedlam_: Dark Willow's pet wisp roams around her for the duration, rapidly attacking nearby enemies.  Bedlam cannot be used while Terrorize is active.
You'll have to excuse my friend Jex. He's really into murder.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_dark_willow_shadow: Untargetable and gaining bonus magic damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_dark_willow_cursed: About to be stunned by Cursed Crown.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_dark_willow_debuff: Running to home base away from Dark Willow.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_dark_willow_bedlam: A wisp swirls around Dark Willow and attacks enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pangolier_swashbuck: Vector Targeted. Pangolier dashes along the target line, then slashes all enemies in the drawn direction with several quick swipes.\n\nLucky Shot has a chance to activate from this damage.
The Pangolier's blade is even nimbler than his tongue.
Attack modifiers have a chance to proc on Swashbuckle attacks.
Casting Swashbuckle during Rolling Thunder ends Rolling Thunder.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pangolier_shield_cr: Pangolier jumps in the air and slams back to the ground in front of his current position, damaging and slowing all enemies in a radius. For each enemy hero hit, he gains a percentage of incoming damage reduction for a short time.\n\nForward movement is maintained if Shield Crash is used while Rolling Thunder is active, and allows Rolling Thunder to clear walls or cliffs.
Causes Shield Crash to cast a 2-attack Swashbuckle in every 90 degrees around your hero.
Only in the midst of his enemies does the Pangolier truly thrive.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pangolier_heartpier: Pangolier reads his enemies perfectly, deftly slipping his blade past defenses. Each attack has a chance to negate enemy armor and slow the target for a duration, activating after a short delay.
These fools know nothing of real armor...
Does not proc when attacking Roshan or buildings.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pangolier_lucky_sho: Pangolier rolls the dice and lets fate decide the outcome for his enemies. Grants a chance to apply a Disarm and reduce armor.
The Pangolier's blade is guided more often by whim than reason.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pangolier_gyroshell:
Pangolier curls into a spell-immune ball and rolls out. When rolling, he moves at an increased speed and can move through trees, but has a decreased ability to turn. Striking enemies knocks them back, inflicting damage and stunning them when they land. 

Colliding with walls or cliffs will cause a temporary pause while Pangolier reverses in direction.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
Where his ancestors sought only refuge, the Pangolier saw opportunity...
Enemies can be stunned multiple times per use, but cannot be affected a subsequent time until the previous stun duration ends.
If Pangolier is disabled while rolling, he will continue to stun and knock enemies that come within range.
Donté Panlin stops when he pleases.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_pangolier_gyroshel: Pangolier ricochets and briefly loses control of his movement.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pangolier_rollup_De: Pangolier curls into an immobile protective ball, gaining magic immunity and allowing him to turn. Can be cast during Rolling Thunder to temporarily hit the brakes. Can cast Rolling Thunder and Shield Crash during Roll Up. If enemies attack Pangolier during this, he will roll away from the attacker, applying Rolling Thunder damage/stun if there are enemies in the way. Cooldown: %abilitycooldown%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke_dark_art: Grimstroke paints a path of ink with his brush, damaging and slowing enemies. The damage is increased with each enemy the ink hits.
The corruptive force of Grimstroke's ink, drawn from the reservoir of his fallen people, consumes any enemy caught in its path.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_grimstroke_dark_ar: This unit has slowed movement speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke_ink_crea: Summons a phantom that moves quickly towards the target, latching to it when she arrives. Once latched, the phantom damages and silences. If she survives the full latch duration she rends her victim for heavy damage and refreshes Phantom's Embrace's cooldown.\n\nHero attacks against the phantom count as 3 attacks each.
The phantom falls off if the target becomes invisible or spell immune.
The phantom will return if the target dies during the latch.
Grimstroke holds no sorrow for the downfall of his people. Only for Yaovhi, she who was most dear to him, does he feel even a semblance of longing.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_grimstroke_ink_cre: A phantom is silencing and damaging this unit.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke_spirit_w: Grimstroke shrouds an allied unit in ink, increasing its movement speed. Enemies in range of the allied unit are damaged with inky tendrils over time. After %buff_duration% seconds it triggers, applying damage and stun in an area around the unit in proportion to how long ink tendril was near any hero.
Causes Ink Swell to deal %shard_bonus_damage_pct%%% more damage and heal the target for %shard_heal_pct%%% of the damage Ink Swell deals. Upon expiration, the target will receive a strong dispell.
Now that the rise of the ink tide no longer threatens to overwhelm Grimstroke, its tendrils of power are never far from his hand.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_grimstroke_spirit_: This unit has increased movement speed and is damaging nearby enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke_soul_cha: Binds a targeted enemy hero to its nearest allied hero within the bind radius, preventing both from moving away from each other. Any unit-targeted ability that either bound hero receives also gets cast on the other hero. If the bind is broken before the duration expires, the initial target will be bound to its nearest allied hero in the radius.
Affected units are leashed, and prevented from blinking.
Provides vision of both leashed units.

The Ascended were chosen sons of Ashkavor, granted immense power by the bonds forged between their own souls and those they were charged with protecting. In the years that followed the ruination of his kin, Grimstroke discovered much more sinister applications for the binding rituals...
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke_dark_por: Creates an ink illusion of a target enemy hero. Illusion is spell immune, and has bonus movement speed and attack damage.
No dark creation is beyond the skill of the master's hand.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke_ink_over: Covers an enemy in ink for %duration% seconds, slowing their attack speed by %attack_speed%, movement speed by %move_speed%%% and dealing a total of %total_damage% damage over its duration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_grimstroke_shard_b: Taking %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% damage every %fMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% seconds. Move speed slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_grimstroke_soul_ch: Bound to another unit and leashed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_grimstroke_scepter: Deals bonus damage and movement increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mars_spear_Descript: Mars throws his legendary Spear with deadly precision, damaging each enemy unit it strikes. The first enemy hero it hits is skewered on the spear, pushing it back. If a skewered hero hits a tree, building, or cliff, they will be impaled to it and stunned.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mars_spear_shard_de: Spear of Mars impales up to two units and leaves a fire trail behind that deals damage over time and slows movement speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mars_spear_Lore: The legendary Spear of Mars still glows with the heat of the forge god's fires.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mars_spear_Note0: Spear of Mars can hit invisible units and reveals them if they are stunned.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mars_spear_Note1: Spear of Mars will only pin a unit to cliffs onto elevated areas, otherwise it will push them off onto lower ground.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_special_mars_spear: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and taking damage every second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mars_gods_rebuke_De: Mars smashes enemies in front of him with his shield, knocking them back and damaging them with a critical hit based on his attack. Bonus damage is added when hitting heroes. Has True Strike.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mars_gods_rebuke_Lo: There isn't a warrior alive who can stand unmoved by the sting of Mars' rebuke.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mars_gods_rebuke_No: Attack modifiers have a chance to proc on God's Rebuke attacks.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mars_bulwark_Descri:
Mars wields his massive shield to block a portion of each physical attack when hit from the front or sides.

Can be toggled, removing Mars's ability to attack, and locking the direction he is facing. When active, reduces movement speed and re-directs %redirect_chance%%% of the attack projectiles aimed at Mars's allies towards Mars instead.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mars_bulwark_scepte: Creates invulnerable soldiers around Mars' front while Bulwark is toggled on. Soldiers move alongside Mars, dealing his attacks that have bonus damage and slow enemies. An enemy can only be attacked by one soldier at a time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mars_bulwark_Lore: Only the very foolish dare to fight fair with the god of war.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_mars_bulwark_Descr: Blocking %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_INCOMING_DAMAGE_PERCENTAGE%%% of each physical attack from the front, half from the sides.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_mars_bulwark_soldi: Soldiers deal full damage +75 and apply procs. Attacks slow enemies by 20%% for 1 second. An enemy can only be attacked by one soldier at a time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mars_arena_of_blood: After a short formation time, Mars summons an arena lined with the undead warriors of the Ash Legion, who block enemy attacks and movement. Enemy heroes near the inside edge of the arena will be attacked by spears, dealing damage and knocking them back.

The long-dead members of the Ash Legion, assembled from the finest warriors to ever test the might of Mars, still revel in the thrill of combat, gladly beholden to the hand that fell them for as long as he so commands.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: Arena Of Blood Grants Team +{s:value} HP Regen
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_void_spirit_aether_: Vector targeted. Void Spirit dispatches a remnant to the target location. The remnant stands watch over the region, facing the direction of his vector. When a unit crosses its gaze, the remnant pulls it in and damages it.
Inai exists far beyond the scope of a single point in space and time.
Allows Void Spirit to assign a leash target to his remnants.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_void_spirit_aether: This unit is being pulled towards an Aether Remnant.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_void_spirit_dissimi: Void Spirit temporarily fades into the aether, creating a number of portals through which he can reassemble himself. Upon exiting a portal, he damages all enemies in the area.
Adds a partial outer ring to Dissimilate. Increases damage by %shard_bonus_damage%.
Inai much prefers to observe our plane free from the confines of corporeal form.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_void_spirit_astral_: Void Spirit tears a rift through the astral plane to appear at the target location, attacking all enemies along the path. This attack inflicts a void mark that slows for %pop_damage_delay% seconds and then detonates.
Astral Step attacks do not cleave.
A small step for Inai creates great devastation on the mortal plane.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_void_spirit_astral: Number of charges left on Astral Step.
Slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and will take damage on expiration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_void_spirit_resonan: Void Spirit wraps himself in a protective shield that absorbs physical damage and emits a single damaging pulse around him. The shield gains increased damage absorption for each enemy hero the pulse hits.
Causes Resonant Pulse to silence and gain %max_charges% charges.
Inai never hesitates to shroud himself in the essence of his true self when forced to interact with the mortal plane.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_void_spirit_resona: This unit has a shield that absorbs physical damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_void_spirit_planes: Has %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PREATTACK_BONUS_DAMAGE% bonus damage and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_EVASION_CONSTANT%%% bonus evasion.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: Attacks made with Astral Step deal a critical strike.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_snapfire_scatterbla: Snapfire unloads with a wide blast that damages and slows enemies in a cone. Enemies caught at point-blank range take an extra %point_blank_dmg_bonus_pct%%% damage.
Causes Scatterblast to deal extra damage as well as stun and knockback enemy units in the point blank range.
A favorite from her collection, Beadie crafted Ol' Rackatee as her first line of defense when she ventured into the Outlands.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_snapfire_firesnap_c: Snapfire feeds a potent cookie to Mortimer or an ally, causing them to hop a short distance. The hopping unit stuns and damages enemies in the landing zone.
The cookie projectile has a speed of %projectile_speed%.
With the help of a secret mixture that pairs Beadie's baking skills with her passion for black powder, these battle biscuits pack a punch.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_snapfire_cooki: A lizard-shaped cookie that was baked with love.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_snapfire_lil_shredd: Snapfire heats up her mounted turret to rapidly fire %buffed_attacks% fixed-damage attacks. Each attack reduces the enemy's armor. Provides bonus attack range for the duration.
Sets %base_attack_time% base attack rate for the duration.
Attack modifiers have a chance to proc on Lil' Shredder attacks.
Beadie constantly tinkers with a design she first dreamed up plotting an exodus from her old gang.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_snapfire_lil_shred: Attack speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% and applying attack speed reduction to the target on hit.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_snapfire_mortimer_k: Snapfire's friend launches a barrage of firespit globs over %duration_tooltip% seconds. Globs cause impact damage and create pools of firespit, which slow and apply damage over time. Snapfire has a reduced turn rate for the duration and a minimum launch range of %min_range%. Each glob can be targeted with a right click.
Can be cancelled by pressing Stop, Hold Position, or using another ability.
Has a minimum travel time of %min_lob_travel_time% and maximum travel time of %max_lob_travel_time%.
Little did Beadie know when she adopted Mortimer, dragon toads--which aren't even toads at all--share more than just a name with their distant draconic cousins.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_snapfire_mortimer_: Delivering love one glob at a time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_snapfire_magma_bur: This unit has slowed movement and is taking damage over time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_snapfire_gobble_up_: Mortimer gobbles up a creep or an allied hero, which he can then spit towards enemies. The unit stays in his belly up to %max_time_in_belly% seconds.
Snapfire earns the creep's bounty after it has been spat out and died.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_snapfire_gobble_up: This hero has swallowed a unit. If Spit Out is not used, the unit will be ejected when this expires.
This unit is in Mortimer's belly.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_snapfire_spit_creep: Mortimer spits out the unit that's in his mouth, causing impact damage and stun in a large area. The glob leaves a pool of firespit that slows and applies damage over time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: Lil' Shredder Uses Your Attack Damage
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_hoodwink_acorn_shot: Fires Hoodwink's attack with an acorn at the target unit.  The acorn bounces to nearby targets, slowing them and dealing a percentage of Hoodwink's attack with bonus damage.\nIf point targeted, a tree is created at the target position and the acorn will bounce to nearby targets.  The ability may be placed on auto-cast to force this behavior.
Though she'll make do with almost anything, Oak and Ironwood acorns make the most effective projectiles -- and the bulk of Hoodwink's stash.
The same target can be hit more than once.
Bounces will seek units in the fog of war in a 525 radius, but not invisible units.
The planted tree lasts for 20 seconds.
Acorn Shot benefits from attack range bonuses.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_hoodwink_bushwhack_: Tosses a net trap that stuns enemy heroes if they are near a tree in the area.  Affected enemies take damage and are pulled towards the tree nearest to them, and have their vision reduced to 0 for the duration of the stun.
Hoodwink favors Ironwood groves for ambushes, but the wary step carefully in all areas of the mistwoods.
Units can be freed from the stun by destroying the tree.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_hoodwink_bushwhack: Stunned by Hoodwink's Bushwhack.  Can be freed by destroying the tree holding the trap.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_hoodwink_scurry_Des: Hoodwink passively has a chance to evade physical attacks while near trees.  When activated, Hoodwink gains bonus movement speed, phased collision, and tree-walking for a brief time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_hoodwink_scurry_Lor: There's not a nook or cranny in the Wood Tomo'kan out of reach of Hoodwink's paws.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_hoodwink_scurry_ac: Gaining %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% bonus movement speed and the ability to walk through units and trees.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_hoodwink_scurry_pa: Gaining %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_EVASION_CONSTANT%%% evasion while next to a tree.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_hoodwink_sharpshoot: Hoodwink charges up and fires a deadly bolt from her crossbow, dealing heavy damage, break and slow to an enemy Hero.  The damage and debuff duration scale up to max after %max_charge_time% seconds, and the bolt is fired automatically after %misfire_time% seconds.\nHoodwink is knocked backwards for a distance of %recoil_distance% from the force of the shot.
While her first arbalest was a chance discovery, Hoodwink now takes great care in carving and caring for her own -- of course with some necessary components pilfered or otherwise cleverly procured.
Release the charged up shot, regain ability to move and attack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_hoodwink_sharpshoo: Winding up Sharpshooter for bonus damage and debuff duration; rooted and disarmed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_hoodwink_camouflag: Turning invisible when not moving, attacking, or casting spells and near a tree.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_hoodwink_decoy_Desc: Hoodwink sends a decoy illusion to the target location.  When the illusion is attacked or hit by a targeted ability, it is destroyed and it throws a lesser bushwhack towards the enemy.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_hoodwink_decoy_abil: Does not requires Bushwhack to be drafted for full effect.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_hoodwink_hunters_bo: Tosses a boomerang in an arc. Upon contact, it returns to Hoodwink.  The boomerang will deal damage as it passes through or hits enemies, and apply a Hunter's Mark that causes affected enemies to be slowed and be more vulnerable to spell damage and have reduced status resistance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_hoodwink_hunters_m: Slowed, taking increased spell damage and reduced status resistance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: Hoodwink becomes invisible near trees after {s:fade_time} seconds of not moving, attacking, or casting spells.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dawnbreaker_solar_g: Only in defense of an ally will Valora relent to call upon the last reserves of her old powers that still allow cosmic flight.

Dawnbreaker creates a pulsing effect at a location within %max_offset_distance% units of an allied hero anywhere on the map, damaging enemies and healing allies with each pulse. After a short duration, she flies to the target location, dealing additional damage and stunning enemies upon landing. Once channeled, Dawnbreaker cannot stop the ability.
Total duration flight duration is %abilitychanneltime% seconds of channel time + %airtime_duration% of flight time.
Cannot be cast without the Hammer.
Healing does not affect Dawnbreaker herself.

Reduces the channel time and increases the healing and total duration of Solar Guardian's air time. Causes allies in the destination area to have evasion while Dawnbreaker is airborne. Solar Guardian can be cast again after take off to land early.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_dawnbreaker_solar_: Cannot act while in Solar Guardian
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dawnbreaker_fire_wr: Across the vast lineage of star progeny, there were multitudes unwilling to align with the aims of the Children of Light. To those who dared organize defiance, the Children would dispatch Valora and her hammer to show a measure of their power--to leave the rebels either shattered or set back to rights.
Dawnbreaker whirls her hammer around 3 times, damaging enemies with her attack plus bonus damage. On the final strike, she smashes her hammer down, stunning and damaging enemies in front of her.
Dawnbreaker travels at a rate of %movement_speed% for the duration of the ability and takes a brief %self_stun_duration%s to recover after the final strike.
Celestial Hammer or Solar Guardian cannot be cast during the combo.
Cleave does not work with this ability.
Can be self-cast to move forward
Dawnbreaker gains magic immunity and free movement during Starbreaker.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dawnbreaker_converg: Dawnbreaker recalls her hammer, pulling them together so they meet in the middle.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dawnbreaker_celesti: The Brightmaul is Valora's oldest companion and sole remaining connection to the glow of her creators.

Dawnbreaker hurls her weapon at a target, damaging enemies struck along the way. The hammer pauses for %pause_duration% seconds at the destination before flying back to her, leaving a trail of fire that slows enemies. Dawnbreaker can recall the hammer at any time, pulling her towards it so they meet in the middle.
The hammer damages enemies both when thrown and when returning to Dawnbreaker.
Dawnbreaker's Converge movement distance is capped at the ability's cast range.
Starbreaker or Solar Guardian cannot be cast while the Hammer is out.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_dawnbreaker_luminos: Diminished in power without access to the Children's replenishing light, Valora can still recharge herself and her allies by creating order from the chaos which resides within each fight.

After %attack_count% attacks, Dawnbreaker powers up, charging her next attack with a critical hit that heals all allied heroes within %heal_radius% units around her for a portion of attack damage dealt. Creeps and neutral enemies provide less healing. Allies are healed for %allied_healing_pct%%% of the amount.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dawnbreaker_luminos: Luminosity Heal is considered a lifesteal and increased by sources of Lifesteal Amplification.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_dawnbreaker_lumino: Next hit will heal Dawnbreaker and deal a critical strike
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_marci_grapple_Descr: Marci grabs an allied or enemy target and throws it effortlessly behind her, damaging and stunning the unit if it's an enemy. Any enemy units in the landing area will also be damaged and stunned.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_marci_grapple_Lore: Marci excels at removing obstacles from Princess Mirana's path.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_marci_unleash_Descr: Marci taps a hidden power, gaining Fury charges that allow her to deliver a rapid sequence of strikes. The last strike in every Fury combo creates a damaging pulse around the target that slows movement and attack speed for %pulse_debuff_duration%s. In between Fury combos, Marci is unable to attack for %time_between_flurries%s.\n\nMarci receives a basic dispel when Unleash is cast and gains %bonus_movespeed%%% movement speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_marci_unleash_scept: Reduces Unleash cooldown by %scepter_cooldown_reduction% seconds. While Unleash is Active, all of Marci's abilities unleash pulses when cast.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_marci_unleash_Note0: Once a Fury combo is started, each attack must be delivered within 1s or the Fury combo expires.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_marci_unleash_Lore: Though some have sought to understand its origins, Marci rebuffs all attempts to divine the source of her power.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_marci_unleash_flur: This unit has greatly increased attack speed.
Waiting for the next Fury strikes.
This unit has slowed movement and attack speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_marci_unleash_pull: Being pulled in for a pummeling.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_marci_companion_run: Vector targeted. Marci bounds to the targeted unit, choosing a direction and distance she will spring away from it. Upon reaching the unit, Marci lunges to her final destination, damaging and slowing enemies in the area.\n\nIf the unit she runs to is an ally, it receives %ally_movespeed_pct%%% bonus movement speed for %ally_buff_duration%s.
Rebound can be set to autocast to throw the targeted unit instead of rebounding off it.
With a friendly or brazen boost, Marci can find her way into the midst of any fight.
Marci's initial run to her target unit can be disjointed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_marci_lunge_debuff: This unit has slowed movement speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_marci_companion_ru: This unit has bonus movement speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_marci_companion_lu: This unit has a protective shield that blocks physical damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_marci_guardian_Desc: Marci's loyalty helps ensure survival, imbuing a chosen allied hero and herself with lifesteal and attack damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_marci_guardian_Note: Marci can self-cast Sidekick to buff herself and the nearest allied hero within %nearest_ally_search_range% range.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_marci_guardian_Lore: Marci learned at a young age that the best asset in a scrap is a steady companion.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_marci_guardian_buf: This unit has lifesteal and bonus damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_primal_beast_trampl: Primal Beast stomps over everything. For every %step_distance% units traveled, all enemies around the Beast receive damage. Deals base damage plus a multiplier of Primal Beast's attack damage. Primal Beast is disarmed for the duration of the ability.

As the only member of his species to arrive on this world, locals can only speculate on the Beast's size relative to his kin. Such observation would prove easier of course if the subject didn't eat everything it sees and destroy most of what it doesn't.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_primal_beast_tramp: Deals damage to everyone around Primal Beast when walking.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_primal_beast_pulver: Primal Beast channels his rage, grabbing the target enemy and slamming them into the ground repeatedly, damaging and mini-stunning any enemies caught in the AoE. Lasts %channel_time% seconds.

Though none are certain whether his utterances have true meaning, most concede the Beast's powerful grip and tendency to smash his enemies into naught but pulp and pieces communicates his intent well enough.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_primal_beast_onslau: Primal Beast charges up and then runs in the chosen direction, knocking back enemies and allies alike. Enemy units are damaged and stunned on impact. The longer the charge duration, the farther Primal Beast's momentum will carry him. \n\n Can be cancelled at any time with the Stop command.
The Beast's single-minded focus on chosen prey leaves all other considerations scattered in his ruinous wake.
Begins the rush to the specified location.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_primal_beast_rock_t: Primal Beast throws a rock at the target location that stuns and damages enemies. The rock cannot be thrown within a minimum range of Primal Beast.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_special_bonus_uniqu: Beast dispells himself when activating Uproar
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_primal_beast_uproar: The Beast's temper passively provides bonus damage. Additionally, for every instance of %damage_limit% damage or more Primal Beast takes from enemy heroes, he accumulates stacks of Uproar. \n\n When activated, Primal Beast releases a roar that slows surrounding enemies and grants the Beast additional attack damage and armor for %roar_duration% seconds based on his current stacks of Uproar.
Already draped in a broken patchwork of barding and chains upon appearing in the mistwoods, the Beast tolerates no further attempts at subjugation.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_primal_beast_uproa: Primal Beast deals increased damage and slows enemy
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_primal_beast_roare: Gaining bonus attack damage and armor
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ad_special_bonus_go: Associated ability not drafted, have some gold!
Associated ability not drafted, have some gold!
Associated ability not drafted, have some gold!
Associated ability not drafted, have some gold!
Associated ability not drafted, have some gold!
Associated ability not drafted, have some gold!
Associated ability not drafted, have some gold!
Associated ability not drafted, have some gold!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: +{s:value} Heavenly Grace Strength/HP Regen per Stack
Allied heroes within 1200 range of Centaur gain the Return Damage aspect of Retaliate.
Enemies damaged by Sonic Wave are forced to run away from Queen of Pain for {s:value} seconds.

After blinking, an uncontrollable illusion is created at Anti-Mage's original location.  Deals {s:outgoing_damage}% less damage, takes {s:incoming_damage}% damage, and lasts {s:illusion_duration} seconds.
The extra arrows are launched in a cone shape, 30 degrees to the left and right of the original arrow, and cannot hit the same target.
Evasion works even when heroes are visible
Half Track Bonus Speed to Allies
{s:bonus_flesh_heap_strength_buff_amount}x Flesh Heap Stack Str and Damage Block bonuses

+{s:value} Armor Corruption to Visage and Familiars
This effect can stack among multiple sources
A second Soul Assumption is launched towards a random enemy unit within the cast range, prioritizing Heroes.
A second Wall of Replica is created {s:value} units behind the first wall.  Illusions are independent for each Wall.
80% Magic Resistance for Chaotic Offering Golems
+{s:value} Upheaval Attack Speed per second on Allies
Additional enemy units within cast range are also targeted by Adaptive Strike.
Enemies hit by Waveform are also instantly attacked by Morphling.
Lightning Storm Can Bounce Twice On Units
Will bounce to units it affected already only when there are no other units available
Bane gains attack speed equal to the attack speed stolen for the duration of Enfeeble.
Brain Sap Pure and Pierces Immunity

Enemies hit by the spill of Psi Blades have their movement speed slowed by {s:value}% for {s:value2} second.
+{s:value} Psi Blades Attack and Spill Range
Cinder Brew applies Fear when ignited
Instead of being slowed, all enemy units within 900 range have the current level of Wraithfire Blast cast on them when Reincarnation triggers.
Spawns 3 Ghostships, {s:value} seconds apart, towards the target location.
+{s:bonus_ally_ms}% X Mark the Spot Move Speed
Affects Allies positively and Enemies negatively
+{s:value} AoE Dragon Tail During Elder Dragon Form
Releases {s:bonus_radial_count} additional Deafening Blasts around Invoker in a circular pattern.  An enemy can only be hit once per cast.
Launched when Sun Strike is double tapped. Puts it on a {s:cooldown} second cooldown. Creates {s:value} visible Sun Strikes within {s:min_range}-{s:max_range} range of each enemy hero.
Allows Ice Wall to be cast as a Vector Target ability with {s:bonus_vector_cast_range} cast range.
+{s:bonus_armor_per_stack} Bonus Armor per Culling Blade Stack
+{s:bonus_damage_amp}% Wild Axes Damage Amp Per Stack
When using Searing Arrows, a second Searing Arrow targets a random enemy within the spell's range.
Skeleton Walk Exit Summons A Burning Army Skeleton
The slow is still applied for the same duration.
Lunar Blessing Global and +{s:bonus_bonus_night_vision} Night Vision
Grants a {s:dodge_chance_pct}% chance to avoid damage entirely. Disabled by break.
+{s:bonus_bonus_attack_speed_night} Hunter In The Night Attack Speed
+{s:bonus_bonus_movement_speed_pct_night}% Hunter In The Night Movement Speed
Focus Fire Kills Advance Cooldown by {s:value}s.
Triggers if Focus Fired unit dies, regardless of killer.
+{s:value} Agility gain/stolen per Essence Shift Stack
{s:value} Distance Auto Remnant in Ball Lightning
Every {s:value} distance travelled in Ball Lightning creates a Static Remnant.
50% chance of Anchor Smash on attack
Toss can target the ground as well as enemy units.
Can be cast while stunned and applies a strong dispel to Troll Warlord.
+{s:bonus_move_pct_heroes}% Astral Spirit Move Speed Per Hero
Automatically targets additional enemy units with a mana pool within 400 distance around the original target.
+{s:bonus_damage_per_kill} Finger of Death Damage Per Kill
+{s:value} Max Health Per Finger of Death Kill
The duration of the stun is not affected.
Allows on-hit effects to apply to the secondary attacks from Split Shot.
Launches two extra Stifling Daggers towards random visible enemies within the cast range.
+{s:value} Range and Ground Target Stifling Dagger
Allows using Blink Strike on the Dagger. Grants 800 vision. Lasts up to 2 minutes.
Tricks of the Trade Applies a Basic Dispel
Can be cast when rooted or leashed
Walrus Punch gains a chance to be triggered on normal attacks, independent of mana cost or cooldown.
Song of the Siren heals allies {s:value}% Max HP/s
The target of False Promise also becomes invisible for the duration (with a 0.6 second fade time).
Enemy units in range of Sand Storm have their movement speed slowed by {s:value}% and miss {s:value}% of their attacks.
Soul Catcher Creates 2 Illusion On Death
Corrosive Hazed targets leave Puddle trails
Trails are {s:bonus_puddle_radius} units wide and last {s:bonus_puddle_duration} seconds
Fires 3 Call Downs in the specified direction 500 range from each other. Last 2 deal 50% damage
Press the Attack grants {s:value}s Spell Immunity
Puck instantly attacks all enemies while affected by Dream Coil, every {s:value} seconds.
+{s:value} Holy Persuasion Max Units and Charges
+{s:bonus_heal_amount}/+{s:bonus_heal_per_second} Hand of God Heal/Heal Over Time
+{s:value} True Form and Spirit Bear Health
While tethered to a friendly Hero, each time that Hero attacks, Io will attack the same target automatically.
While tethered to a friendly Hero, that Hero gains its Aghanim's Scepter ability upgrades for the duration.
Earthbind grants True Strike on Targets
