Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_roshan_spell_block_: Roshan will block one targeted spell every 15 seconds. Also reduces status effects by 25%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_roshan_bash_Descrip: Roshan has a chance to stun on attack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_roshan_slam_Descrip: Roshan slams the ground, damaging and slowing all nearby enemies. Slam's damage will increase every minute.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_roshan_devotion_Des: Roshan possesses numerous protective abilities, including 55%% magic damage resistance, the ability to reduce damage from attacking illusions, and a scaling armor bonus that increases as time goes on.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_roshan_spell_block: Roshan will block one targeted spell every 15 seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_roshan_devotion_De: 55%% magic damage resistance, the ability to reduce damage from attacking illusions, and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS% bonus armor. The armor bonus increases over time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kobold_disarm_Descr: Every third attack Kobold Soldier will disarm its target temporarily. Attack counter doesn't increase while ability is on cooldown.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_berserker_troll_bre: Whenever Hill Troll Berserker attacks a unit it applies break to it.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_hill_troll_rally_De: Skeleton's allies gain bonus attack damage. This Aura stacks.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ogre_bruiser_ogre_s: Ogre slowly charges a big attack stunning for %hero_stun_duration% seconds and dealing %damage% + %damage_pct%%% of their current HP damage to all units in front of him.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kobold_tunneler_pro: Kobolds are adept at finding gold, increasing nearby allied heroes' GPM.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kobold_taskmaster_s: The Kobold Foreman's cruel efficiency increases his movement speed and the movement speed of all nearby allies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_forest_troll_high_p: Provides bonus mana regeneration to all nearby allies.
Provides bonus Heal Amplification to all nearby allies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_centaur_khan_endura: The fearsome Hellbear attacks more quickly and bullies nearby allies into following suit.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furbolg_enrage_atta: When Hellbear dies, all nearby allies go into a frenzy gaining attack speed for a short amount of time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furbolg_enrage_dama: When Hellbear Smasher dies, all nearby allies go into a rampage gaining bonus attack damage for a short amount of time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_centaur_khan_war_st: The Centaur Conqueror's powerful hooves stomp the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemies. Heroes recover more quickly.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gnoll_assassin_enve: The Vhoul Assassin has soaked his weapons in his own blend of painful predator venoms that causes his enemies' natural regeneration to work against themselves. Heroes recover from the poison more quickly.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_gnoll_assassin_env: Deals %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% poison damage per second for %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP%s on creeps, and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP%s on heroes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ghost_frost_attack_: The Ghost launches an eerie attack that chills her enemies to their bones.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ghost_frost_attack: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Reduce target's movement by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP%%% and attack speed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_polar_furbolg_ursa_: The Hellbear Smasher claps his massive hands together, creating a deafening blast. The blast damages nearby enemies and throws them off their footing.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_polar_furbolg_ursa: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_neutral_spell_immun: This creature does not feel the effects of most magical spells.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_neutral_spell_immu: This creature does not feel the effects of most magical spells.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_neutral_creep_lost: This creature is homeless until it finds a way back to its camp.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mudgolem_cloak_aura: This creature protects its allies with a Magic resistance aura. Creeps are better protected.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ogre_magi_frost_arm: The Ogre Frostmage summons an invisible layer of icy air that surrounds the target friendly unit, increasing its armor and temporarily slowing any enemies that dare attack it.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ogre_magi_frost_ar: Armor increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS%. Enemy melee units that attack will suffer reduced movement and attack speed.
Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_troll_warlord_: The Dark Troll Summoner tosses netting around an enemy's feet, briefly immobilizing the unit, though the unit can still attack and use abilities.
The Dark Troll Summoner stirs the ground underfoot, raising the remains of trolls long dead, bringing to life three skeleton Warriors who will fight at his side.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_giant_wolf_critical: The Giant Wolf's ferocious attacks occasionally tear a vital tendon, inflicting critical damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_giant_wolf_intimida: The Giant Wolf's ferocious roar reduces all nearby enemies total attack damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alpha_wolf_critical: The cruel Alpha Wolf attacks his enemy's unprotected vitals at every opportunity, inflicting critical damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ice_shaman_incendia: The Ice Shaman chucks a blue flame towards an enemy unit or building, dealing damage over time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_frostbitten_golem_t: Coming from a different era, the Frostbitten Golem has an innate control of time, speeding up the cooldowns of all nearby allies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alpha_wolf_command_: The Alpha Wolf's ruthless attacks do extra damage. His commanding presence inspires nearby allies to attack ruthlessly as well.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ancient_rock_golem_: The Rock Golem's imposing figure makes enemies more susceptible to Physical Damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_black_drake_magic_a: The Black Drakes' gaze make enemies more susceptible to Spell Damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tornado_tempest_Des: The Tornado's overpowering winds slow all nearby enemies, flinging debris at them and inflicting damage every second. Enemies closer to the center of the Tornado take more damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_tornado_tempest_de: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%. Taking damage per second based on proximity to the Tornado.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enraged_wildkin_tor: CHANNELED - The Wildwing calls on the spirit of the wind, creating a sentient Tornado that he can control. The Tornado slows nearby enemies and does damage. It is invulnerable and can move anywhere.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enraged_wildkin_hur: The Wildwing Ripper calls on the spirit of the wind, creating a hurricane that can push a unit in the direction of Wildwing Ripper's choice.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enraged_wildkin_tou: The Wildwing Ripper's fury numbs it to attacks and inspires nearby allies to withstand more blows.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_granite_golem_hp_au: Increases the health capacity of nearby units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spawnlord_aura_Desc: Gives lifesteal and health regeneration to nearby allies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_spawnlord_aura_bon: Provides %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP%%% lifesteal and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% hp per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spawnlord_master_fr: Causes the next attack to petrify the enemy, rooting them and dealing %damage% damage per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_spawnlord_master_f: Unit is rooted and is damaged %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% hp per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spawnlord_master_st: Stomps the ground, dealing damage to nearby units and reducing their base physical armor by %armor_reduction_pct%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_satyr_trickster_pur: The Satyr Banisher knows every trick in the book, allowing him to remove debuffs from allies or buffs from enemies. His trickery also slows the enemy's movement.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_satyr_soulstealer_m: The Satyr Mindstealer removes a fragment of his enemy's soul, burning away some mana and dealing damage equal to the amount of mana burned.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_satyr_hellcaller_sh: The Satyr Tormenter tears open an unstable rift to the underworld, creating a shockwave that travels in a line along the ground, dealing damage to enemies it hits.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_satyr_hellcaller_un: The Satyr Tormenter's demonic communion allows him to emanate regenerative power, increasing the health regeneration of himself and all nearby allies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_satyr_hellcaller_u: Health regeneration increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_forest_troll_high_p: The Hill Troll Priest lays his holy blessing upon the target ally, replenishing some health.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_warpine_raider_seed: Hucks a seed at a target, slowing and damaging it. The seed can bounce multiple times to nearby targets.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mud_golem_hurl_boul: Hurls a boulder at the target, damaging and stunning them.
\"Why do they hesitate? What are they afraid of throwing?\"
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mud_golem_rock_dest: On death, Mud Golems shatter into 2 Shard Golems. Shard Golems have %shard_health_tooltip% health, deal %shard_damage_tooltip% damage per attack, and live for %shard_duration_tooltip% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_mud_golem_rock_des: On death, will shatters into 2 Shard Golems. Shard Golems have %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% health, deal %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% damage per attack, and live for %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_harpy_storm_chain_l: The Harpy Stormcrafter releases a high-voltage bolt of electricity at the target enemy, dealing damage. The bolt jumps to other nearby enemies, losing power with each jump.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_harpy_scout_take_of: Harpy Scout gains flying movement at the cost of movement speed. Consumes mana while active.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_black_dragon_splash: The Black Dragon's explosive attacks are felt by all nearby enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_black_dragon_dragon: The Ancient Black Dragon's dreaded presence grants nearby allies additional armor. This bonus can stack with itself.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_black_dragon_fireba: Hurls a fire blast on the ground, igniting the area in a %radius% radius for %duration% seconds. Enemies caught in the fire will take %damage% damage per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_blue_dragonspawn_so: The Drakken Sentinel has assumed a partially ethereal form, making him difficult to hit with attacks.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_blue_dragonspawn_ov: The Drakken Armorer moves about quickly, making him difficult to hit with attacks.
The Drakken Armorer is wholly devoted to his cause, increasing his tolerance for physical attacks. Nearby allies are similarly devoted to the Overseer and are able to withstand more blows.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_big_thunder_lizard_: The Ancient Thunderhide slams his mammoth body against the ground. The shock damages nearby enemies and throws them off their footing. Heroes regain their balance more quickly.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_big_thunder_lizard: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_big_thunder_lizard_: The Ancient Thunderhide works an ally into a frenzy, causing his ally to have increased attack speed.
The rhythm of the Thunderhide's heartbeat increases the attack speed and accuracy of nearby allies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_big_thunder_lizard: Attack speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%, and attack damage increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_BASEDAMAGEOUTGOING_PERCENTAGE%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_aegis_Descript:
Passive: Reincarnation

Brings you to life with full health and mana %reincarnate_time% seconds after you die, at the location where you died.

Reincarnation must be used within %disappear_time_minutes_tooltip% minutes or Aegis of the Immortal disappears. If it expires, it will heal you over 5 seconds (dispels on damage).
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_aegis_Lore: The Immortal was said to own a shield that protected him from death itself.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_abyssal_blade_:
Active: Overwhelm

Stuns a target enemy unit for %stun_duration% seconds.

Pierces Spell Immunity.

Range: %abilitycastrange%\n

Passive: Bash

Grants melee heroes a %bash_chance_melee%%% chance on hit to stun the target for %bash_duration% seconds and deal %bonus_chance_damage% bonus physical damage. Bash chance for ranged heroes is %bash_chance_ranged%%%.\n

Passive: Damage Block

Grants a %block_chance%%% chance to block %block_damage_melee% damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and %block_damage_ranged% damage on ranged.
The lost blade of the Commander of the Abyss, this edge cuts into an enemy's soul.
Does not stack with other bashes, and does not grant bash to Clones and Tempest Doubles.
Multiple sources of damage block do not stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_arcane_ring_De:
Active: Replenish Mana

Restores %mana_restore% mana to all nearby allies.

Radius: %radius%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_arcane_ring_Lo: Once a prized heirloom of a minor lord's house.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_armlet_Descrip:
Toggle: Unholy Strength

When active, Unholy Strength grants +%unholy_bonus_damage% damage, +%unholy_bonus_strength% strength and +%unholy_bonus_armor% armor, but drains %unholy_health_drain_per_second% health per second.

You cannot die from the health drain when Unholy Strength is activated, nor from the strength loss when Unholy Strength is deactivated.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_armlet_Lore: Weapon of choice among brutes, the bearer sacrifices his life energy to gain immense strength and power.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_armlet_Note0: The strength change will affect both maximum and current HP, but you cannot die from the change.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_armlet_Note1: The strength change occurs over 0.6 seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_armlet_Note2: Activating or deactivating Unholy Strength does not interrupt channeling.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_armlet_unholy:
Damage increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PREATTACK_BONUS_DAMAGE%.
Strength increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_STATS_STRENGTH_BONUS%.
Armor increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS%.
Losing %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% health per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_assault_Descri:
Passive: Assault Aura

Grants %aura_attack_speed% attack speed and %aura_positive_armor% armor to nearby allied units and structures, and decreases nearby enemy unit and structure armor by %aura_negative_armor%.

Radius: %aura_radius%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_assault_Lore: Forged in the depths of the nether reaches, this hellish mail provides an army with increased armor and attack speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_assault_posit: Armor enhanced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS%.\nAttack speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_tenderizer_Des:
Passive: Bash

Grants melee heroes a %bash_chance_melee%%% chance on hit to stun the target for %bash_duration% seconds and deal %bonus_chance_damage% bonus physical damage. Bash chance for ranged heroes is %bash_chance_ranged%%%.\n

Passive: Tenderize

Every Attack on an enemy will reduce their total attack speed by %weaken_per_hit%%% per hit. Lasts %weaken_duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_tenderizer_Not: Does not stack with other sources of Bash, however it will stack with Mini-Bash.
The following heroes cannot trigger Bash on this item: Spirit Breaker, Faceless Void, and Slardar.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_basher_Descrip:
Passive: Bash

Grants melee heroes a %bash_chance_melee%%% chance on hit to stun the target for %bash_duration% seconds and deal %bonus_chance_damage% bonus physical damage. Bash chance for ranged heroes is %bash_chance_ranged%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_basher_Lore: A feared weapon in the right hands, this maul's ability to shatter the defenses of its opponents should not be underestimated.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_basher_Note0: Does not stack with other sources of Bash.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_basher_Note1: The following heroes cannot trigger Bash on this item: Spirit Breaker, Faceless Void, and Slardar.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_basher_Note2: Does not grant Bash to Clones and Tempest Doubles.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_basher_ability: Spirit Breaker, Faceless Void, and Slardar can trigger Bash in Ability Draft. Bash will proc even if Time Lock is drafted.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_belt_of_streng: A valued accessory for improving vitality.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bfury_Descript:
Active: Chop Tree

Destroy a target tree.

Cast Range: %abilitycastrange%\n

Passive: Quell

Increases attack damage against non-hero units by %quelling_bonus% for melee heroes, and %quelling_bonus_ranged% for ranged. \n

Passive: Cleave

Deals %cleave_damage_percent%%% of attack damage as physical damage in a cone up to %cleave_distance% around the target. Deals %cleave_damage_percent_creep%%% against creeps. (Melee Only)
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bfury_Lore: The bearer of this mighty axe gains the ability to cut down swaths of enemies at once.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bfury_Note0: Cleave damage goes through spell immunity.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bfury_Note1: If multiple sources of Cleave are present, each Cleave's damage is applied separately.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_black_king_bar:
Active: Avatar

Grants Spell Immunity. Duration decreases with each use.

Duration: %duration%
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
A powerful staff imbued with the strength of giants.
Purchasing another Black King Bar will not reset its immunity duration.
Using Black King Bar may remove some positive buffs.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blade_mail_Des:
Active: Damage Return

For %duration% seconds, the damage returned from all sources is increased by %active_reflection_pct%%%.\n

Passive: Damage Return

Everytime you are attacked, you return %passive_reflection_constant% damage plus %passive_reflection_pct%%% of the attack damage dealt to you.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blade_mail_Lor: A razor-sharp coat of mail, it is the choice of selfless martyrs in combat.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blade_mail_Not: Damage Return is calculated before any kind of reduction.
Damage Return doesn't reflect damage from other forms of Blade Mail.
Returned damage type is the same as it was received.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blades_of_atta: The damage of these small, concealable blades should not be underestimated.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blade_of_alacr: A long blade imbued with time magic.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blink_Descript:
Active: Blink

Teleport to a target point up to %blink_range% units away.

Blink Dagger cannot be used for %blink_damage_cooldown% seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blink_Lore: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blink_Note0: Self-casting will cause you to teleport in the direction of your team's fountain.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blink_Note1: If you used Blink to teleport to a distance over the maximum range, you'll be teleported 4/5 of the maximum range instead.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_overwhelming_b:
Active: Overwhelming Blink

Teleport to a target point up to %blink_range% units away.

After teleportation, all enemies in a %radius% AoE have %movement_slow%%% movement speed slow and %attack_slow% attack speed slow for %duration% seconds, and take damage equal to 100 + %damage_pct%%% of your strength.

Overwhelming Blink cannot be used for %blink_damage_cooldown% seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.
A horrifying dagger forged in the chaos maw and nigh untouchable by mortal hands.
Self-casting will cause you to teleport in the direction of your team's fountain.
If you used Overwhelming Blink to teleport to a distance over the maximum range, you'll be teleported 4/5 of the maximum range instead.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_overwhelming_: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_swift_blink_De:
Active: Swift Blink

Teleport to a target point up to %blink_range% units away.

After teleportation, you gain %bonus_movement%%% phased movement speed and +%bonus_agi_active% Agility for %duration% seconds.

Swift Blink cannot be used for %blink_damage_cooldown% seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_swift_blink_Lo: A cunning blade able to anticipate and enable its bearer's movements.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_swift_blink_No: Self-casting will cause you to teleport in the direction of your team's fountain.
If you used Swift Blink to teleport to a distance over the maximum range, you'll be teleported 4/5 of the maximum range instead.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_swift_blink_b: Agility increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_STATS_AGILITY_BONUS%. Movement speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and hero has phased movement.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_arcane_blink_D:
Active: Arcane Blink

Teleport to a target point up to %blink_range% units away.

After teleportation, you gain %manacost_reduction%%% Mana Cost Reduction, %debuff_amp%%% Debuff Amplification and %cast_pct_improvement%%% Cast Point reduction for %duration% seconds.

Arcane Blink cannot be used for %blink_damage_cooldown% seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_arcane_blink_L: A revitalizing tool to help bear the weight of arcane expenditure.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_arcane_blink_N: Self-casting will cause you to teleport in the direction of your team's fountain.
If you used Arcane Blink to teleport to a distance over the maximum range, you'll be teleported 4/5 of the maximum range instead.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_arcane_blink_: Mana Costs reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MANACOST_PERCENTAGE_STACKING%%%. Debuff Amplification increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_STATUS_RESISTANCE_CASTER%%%. Cast Point time reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_CASTTIME_PERCENTAGE%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_super_blink_De:
Active: Blink

Teleport to a target point up to %blink_range% units away.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_super_blink_Lo: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bloodstone_Des:
Active: Bloodpact

Doubles Bloodstone's Spell Lifesteal and also converts the same percentage of damage dealt to mana. Lasts %buff_duration% seconds. Costs %hp_cost%%% of your current HP to activate
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bloodstone_Lor: The Bloodstone's bright ruby color is unmistakable on the battlefield, as the owner seems to have infinite vitality and spirit.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bloodstone_Not: Using Bloodpact leaves you drained for 40 seconds and can't benefit from Bloodpact again during that time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_bloodstone_dr: Bloodpact's Bonuses will not apply to a unit that's drained.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_boots_Descript: Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_boots_of_elves: A tensile fabric often used for its light weight and ease of movement.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bottle_Descrip:
Active: Regenerate

Consumes a charge to restore %health_restore% health and %mana_restore% mana over %restore_time% seconds. If the hero is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

The Bottle automatically refills at the fountain.

Hold Control to use on an allied hero.

Range: %abilitycastrange%\n

Passive: Store Rune

Runes can be stored in the bottle for later use by right-clicking them. Unused runes will automatically activate after 90 seconds.

Using a stored rune fully refills the Bottle.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bottle_Lore: An old bottle that survived the ages, the contents placed inside become enchanted.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bottle_Note0: Bottle is shareable. Stored runes cannot be shared.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_bottle_regeneratio: Regenerating %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% HP and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MANA_REGEN_CONSTANT% mana per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bracer_Lore: The bracer is a common choice to toughen up defenses and increase longevity.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_branches_Descr:
Use: Plant Tree

Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for %tree_duration% seconds.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_branches_Lore: A seemingly ordinary branch, its ironlike qualities are bestowed upon the bearer.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_broadsword_Lor: The classic weapon of choice for knights, this blade is sturdy and reliable for slaying enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_buckler_Descri:
Passive: Buckler Aura

Grants %bonus_aoe_armor% armor to allied player units.

Radius: %bonus_aoe_radius%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_buckler_Lore: A powerful shield that imbues the bearer with the strength of heroes past, it is capable of protecting entire armies in battle.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_butterfly_Note: Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_butterfly_Lore: Only the mightiest and most experienced of warriors can wield the Butterfly, but it provides incredible dexterity in combat.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_chainmail_Lore: A medium weave of metal chains.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cheese_Descrip:
Use: Fondue

Instantly restores %health_restore% health and %mana_restore% mana.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cheese_Lore: Made from the milk of a long lost Furbolg vendor, it restores the vitality of those who taste it.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_refresher_shar:
Use: Reset Cooldowns

Resets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.
Across an epoch of endless battle, the Immortal's will to triumph never faltered.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_circlet_Lore: An elegant circlet designed for human princesses.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_fluffy_hat_Lor: Fine and functional foppery for the fashion-forward fighter.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_falcon_blade_L: An enchanted blade that long ago raised a hopeless urchin from pauper to king.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_voidwalker_scy:
Passive: Swift Strike

Every %attacks% attacks, deal %bonus_damage% with your next attack. That attack can't be evaded.\n

Passive: Void Shift

Every %attacks% attacks received, become untargettable for %buff_duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mage_slayer_De:
Passive: Mage Slayer

Places a debuff when you attack enemies, causing them to do %spell_amp_debuff%%% less spell damage for %duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mage_slayer_Lo: Forged by a secret order in The Third Age of Praxa'cia to fell the False King.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_crown_Lore: A stately crown created to ensure a well-meaning but ungifted heir could fend off usurpers and govern with a strong hand.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_clarity_Descri:
Use: Replenish

Grants %mana_regen% mana regeneration to the target for %buff_duration% seconds.

If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_clarity_Lore: Clear water that enhances the ability to meditate.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_faerie_fire_Lo: The ethereal flames from the ever-burning ruins of Kindertree ignite across realities.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_infused_raindr:
Passive: Magical Damage Block

Consumes a charge to block %magic_damage_block% magic damage from damage instances over %min_damage% damage.

Comes with %initial_charges% charges. When the charges are gone, the item disappears.
Uses at most one charge per damage instance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bloodthorn_Des:
Active: Soul Rend

Silences a target for %silence_duration% seconds. At the end of the silence, an additional %silence_damage_percent%%% of all damage taken during the silence will be dealt to the target as magical damage.

All attacks on the silenced target will have True Strike and %tooltip_crit_chance%%% chance to crit for %target_crit_multiplier%%% damage.

Range: %abilitycastrange%\n

Passive: Mage Slayer

Places a debuff when you attack enemies, causing them to do %spell_amp_debuff%%% less spell damage for %duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bloodthorn_Lor: A reviled blade that bites deeper with each wriggle of its victim's final throes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_bloodthorn_debuff_: Silenced and taking 30%% increased damage, dealt at the end of the duration of the debuff as magic damage.\nCauses all incoming attacks to crit for 130%% damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_echo_sabre_Des:
Passive: Echo Strike

Causes melee attacks to attack twice in quick succession. The double attacks apply a %movement_slow%%% movement slow for %slow_duration% seconds on each strike.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_echo_sabre_Lor: A deceptively swift blade imbued with resonant magic.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_blight_stone_D:
Passive: Lesser Corruption

Your attacks reduce the target's armor by %corruption_armor% for %corruption_duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_blight_stone_L: An unnerving stone unearthed beneath the Fields of Endless Carnage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_blight_stone_N: Does not stack with its upgrades.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_wind_lace_Desc: Bonuses from multiple Wind Laces do not stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_wind_lace_Lore: Hasten to battle on wind-touched heels.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_tome_of_knowle:
Use: Enlighten

Grants you %xp_bonus% experience plus %xp_per_use% per tome consumed by your team after the first two.

Tomes Used By Team: %customval_team_tomes_used%
That which raises beast to man and man to god.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_tome_of_knowl: Immediately grants 700 experience plus 135 per tome previously consumed by your team.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dragon_lance_D:
Passive: Dragon's Reach

Increases attack range of ranged heroes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dragon_lance_L: The forward charge of the wyvern host grants no quarter.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_hurricane_pike:
Active: Hurricane Thrust

Pushes you and target enemy %enemy_length% units away from each other, and for %range_duration% seconds, allows you to make %max_attacks% attacks against the target without range restrictions and with +%bonus_attack_speed% attack speed.

Works like Force Staff when used on self or allies.

Allied Range: %abilitycastrange%
Enemy Range: %cast_range_enemy%\n

Passive: Dragon's Reach

Increases attack range of ranged heroes.
A legendary pike once held as royal sigil of the ancient wyvern riders.
Self-cast will use Hurricane Pike on yourself.
Hurricane Pike doesn't interrupt the target's actions.
Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere, Duel, or Black Hole.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_hurricane_pik: Can attack the target without range restrictions.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_aether_lens_De:
Passive: Aethereal Focus

Increases targeted spell and item cast range.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_aether_lens_Lo: Polished with the incantation of his final breath, the gift of a dying mage to his sickly son.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_serenity_charm:
Passive: Aethereal Focus

Increases targeted spell and item cast range by %cast_range_bonus%.\n

Passive: Protection Charm

If you haven't taken damage in the last %cooldown% seconds, create a shield around you that prevents the next %damage_block% damage and increases your cast range by an additional %cast_range_bonus_extra%
Does not stack with other sources of Cast Range.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_orb_of_revelat:
Passive: Aethereal Focus

Increases targeted spell and item cast range by %cast_range_bonus%. \n\n

Active: Scry

Uncovers the path forward and reveals invisible units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_claymore_Lore: A sword that can cut through armor, it's a commonly chosen first weapon for budding swordsmen.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cloak_Lore: A cloak made of a magical material that works to dispel any magic cast on it.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cloak_Note0: Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of spell resistance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_courier_Descri:
Use: Deploy Courier

Deploys a creature to carry items to and from your team's base.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_courier_Lore: Losing the courier is punishable by death.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_flying_courier:
Use: Upgrade Courier

Upgrades your team's Animal Courier to a Flying Courier, granting it swift, unobstructed movement to carry items to and from your team's base.

Requires a deployed Animal Courier.
The faithful mount upon which soar the fortunes of battle.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cyclone_Descri:
Active: Cyclone

Sweeps a target unit up into a cyclone, making them invulnerable for %cyclone_duration% seconds. Cyclone can only be cast on enemy units or yourself.

Enemy units take %tooltip_drop_damage% magical damage upon landing.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cyclone_Lore: A mysterious scepter passed down through the ages, its disruptive winds can be used for good or evil.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cyclone_Note1: Cyclones cast on yourself go through spell immunity.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cyclone_Note2: Cyclone can purge some buffs and debuffs.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_wind_waker_Des:
Active: Cyclone

Sweeps a target unit up into a cyclone, making them invulnerable for %cyclone_duration% seconds. Cyclone can be cast on yourself, enemy units or allied units.

Enemy units take %tooltip_drop_damage% magical damage upon landing.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_wind_waker_Lor: Proof enough to some that unseen forces manipulate the happenings of the material plane.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_wind_waker_Not: Cyclone can purge some buffs and debuffs.
When cast on yourself, the cyclone can be moved anywhere at a speed of 360.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_wind_waker_Descrip: Swept up in a cyclone, you are invulnerable and unable to act.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_eul_cyclone_Descri: Swept up in a cyclone, you are invulnerable and unable to act.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cyclone_2_Desc:
Active: Cyclone

A target unit is swept up in a cyclone and made invulnerable for %cyclone_duration% seconds. Cyclone can be cast on yourself. Enemy units take 50 magical damage upon landing.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cyclone_2_Lore: A mysterious scepter passed down through the ages, its disruptive winds can be used for good or evil.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cyclone_2_Note: Cyclones cast on yourself go through spell immunity.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dagon_Descript:

Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.

Damage: %damage%
Range: %abilitycastrange%
Mana Cost: %mana_cost_tooltip%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dagon_Lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_demon_edge_Lor: One of the oldest weapons forged by the Demon-Smith Abzidian, it killed its maker when he tested its edge.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_desolator_Desc:
Passive: Corruption

Your attacks reduce the target's armor by %corruption_armor% for %corruption_duration% seconds.\n

Passive: Soul Stealer

Desolator gains +%bonus_damage_per_kill% damage every time an enemy hero dies while affected by Corruption, to a maximum of %max_damage%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_desolator_Lore: A wicked weapon, used in torturing political criminals.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_desolator_buff_Des: Desolator attacks reduced your armor by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_diffusal_blade:
Active: Inhibit

Targets an enemy, slowing it for %purge_slow_duration% seconds.

Range: %abilitycastrange%\n

Passive: Manabreak

Each attack burns %feedback_mana_burn% mana from the target, and deals %damage_per_burn% physical damage per burned mana.

Burns %feedback_mana_burn_illusion_melee% mana per attack from melee illusions and %feedback_mana_burn_illusion_ranged% mana per attack from ranged illusions.
Does not stack with other diffusal blades.
An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.

Active: Purge

Targets an enemy, removing buffs from the target and slowing it for %purge_slow_duration% seconds.

Range: %abilitycastrange%\n

Passive: Manabreak

Each attack burns %feedback_mana_burn% mana from the target, and deals %damage_per_burn% physical damage per burned mana.

Burns %feedback_mana_burn_illusion_melee% mana per attack from melee illusions and %feedback_mana_burn_illusion_ranged% mana per attack from ranged illusions.

Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
Does not stack with other diffusal blades.
An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dust_Descripti:
Use: Reveal

Reveals and slows invisible heroes by %movespeed%%% in a %radius% radius around the caster for %duration% seconds. Invisible units revealed by dust take %damage% damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dust_Note0: Places a debuff on enemy units in the area that reveals them when they are invisible.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dust_Lore: One may hide visage, but never volume.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_dustofappeara: Can be seen by enemies and slowed when invisible. Slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_eagle_Lore: Capturing the majestic call of an eagle, this mystical horn brings limitless dexterity to those who hear it.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_energy_booster: This lapis gemstone is commonly added to the collection of wizards seeking to improve their presence in combat.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ethereal_blade:
Active: Ether Blast

Converts the target unit to ethereal form, rendering them immune to physical damage, but unable to attack and %ethereal_damage_bonus%%% more vulnerable to magic damage.

Enemy targets are also slowed by %blast_movement_slow%%%, and take %blast_agility_multiplier%x your target's primary attribute + %blast_damage_base% as magical damage.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Duration: %duration% seconds
Ethereal units take %ethereal_damage_bonus%%% bonus magic damage.
Using a Town Portal Scroll or Boots of Travel will not dispel Ethereal Form.
A flickering blade of a ghastly nature, it is capable of dealing damage in both magical and physical planes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_ethereal_blad: Ethereal Form. Taking %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_DECREPIFY_UNIQUE%%% increased magic damage and cannot attack or be attacked.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_flask_Descript:
Use: Salve

Grants %health_regen% health regeneration to the target for %buff_duration% seconds.

If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

Heals for half the amount when cast on an ally.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_flask_Lore: A magical salve that can quickly mend even the deepest of wounds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_force_staff_De:
Active: Force

Pushes any target unit %push_length% units in the direction it is facing.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_force_staff_Lo: Allows you to manipulate others, for good or evil.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_force_staff_No: Self-cast will cause you to use Force on yourself.
Force Staff doesn't interrupt the target's actions.
Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere, Duel, or Black Hole.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_gauntlets_Lore: Studded leather gloves that add brute strength.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_gem_Descriptio:
Active: Reveal

Gives True Sight over a %active_radius% radius revealing wards and units even in Fog of War.

\nPassive: True Sight

Grants the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within %radius% range of its carrier. \n

Passive: Everlasting

Dropped on death, and cannot be destroyed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_gem_Lore:
Not one thrall creature of the depths,
Nor spirit bound in drowning's keep,
Nor Maelrawn the Tentacular,
Shall rest till seas, gem comes to sleep.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_eagle_eye_Desc:
Active: Predator's Gaze

Reveal a target %active_radius% area of the map within %abilitycastrange% distance for %duration% seconds.\n

Passive: True Sight

Grants the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within %radius% range of its carrier. \n

Passive: Everlasting

Cannot be dropped. On Death it dissassembles and the gem drops on the floor.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ghost_Descript:
Active: Ghost Form

You enter ghost form for %duration% seconds, becoming immune to physical damage, but are unable to attack and %extra_spell_damage_percent%%% more vulnerable to magic damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ghost_Note0: Ends if you become Spell Immune, and will have no effect if you are already Spell Immune.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ghost_Lore: Imbues the wielder with a ghostly presence, allowing them to evade physical damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ghost_state_Descri: Ethereal Form. Taking %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_DECREPIFY_UNIQUE%%% increased magic damage and cannot attack or be attacked.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_gloves_Lore: A pair of magical gloves that seems to render weapons weightless.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_greater_crit_D:
Passive: Critical Strike

Grants each attack a %crit_chance%%% chance to deal %crit_multiplier%%% damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_greater_crit_N: Critical Strike does not work against buildings.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_greater_crit_L: A weapon of incredible power that is difficult for even the strongest of warriors to control.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_hand_of_midas_:
Active: Transmute

Kills a non-hero target for %bonus_gold% gold and %xp_multiplier%x experience.

Cannot be used on Ancient Creeps.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Preserved through unknown magical means, the Hand of Midas is a weapon of greed, sacrificing animals to line the owner's pockets.
The gold given is reliable gold (you do not get the normal creep bounty).
Experience gained by using Transmute is not shared.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_headdress_Desc:
Passive: Regeneration Aura

Grants %aura_health_regen% health regeneration to allies.

Radius: %aura_radius%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_headdress_Lore: Creates a soothing aura that restores allies in battle.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_heart_Lore: Preserved heart of an extinct monster, it bolsters the bearer's fortitude.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_helm_of_iron_w: The helmet of a legendary warrior who fell in battle.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_helm_of_the_do:
Active: Dominate

Takes control of one neutral, non-ancient target unit and sets its movement speed to %speed_base% and max health to a minimum of %health_min%. Also provides the unit with +%creep_bonus_damage% base attack damage, +%creep_bonus_hp_regen% health regen, +%creep_bonus_mp_regen% mana regen and +%creep_bonus_armor% armor.

Dominated units with a max health of greater than %health_min% retain their original max health. Dominated unit's bounty is set to %bounty_gold% gold.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
The powerful headpiece of a dead necromancer.
Cannot dominate more than one unit at a time.  If a new unit is dominated, the old one will die.
Can also Dominate enemy lane creeps and summoned units.
Selling Helm of the Dominator will cause dominated units to die.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_helm_of_the_ov:
Active: Dominate

Takes control of one neutral target unit and sets its movement speed to %speed_base% and max health to a minimum of %health_min%. Also provides the unit with +%creep_bonus_damage% base attack damage, +%creep_bonus_hp_regen% health regen, +%creep_bonus_mp_regen% mana regen and +%creep_bonus_armor% armor.

Dominated units with a max health of greater than %health_min% retain their original max health. Dominated unit's bounty is set to %bounty_gold% gold.

Range: %abilitycastrange%\n

Passive: Vladmir's Aura

Grants %lifesteal_aura%%% lifesteal, %damage_aura%%% bonus damage, %mana_regen_aura% mana regeneration, and %armor_aura% armor to nearby allies.
The powerful headpiece of a dead necromancer.
Can dominate up to two at a time.
Can also Dominate enemy lane creeps and summoned units.
Selling will cause dominated units to die.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_helm_of_the_d: Increases health regen by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% and base damage by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_BASEDAMAGEOUTGOING_PERCENTAGE%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_hood_of_defian:
Active: Barrier

Creates a spell shield that absorbs up to %barrier_block% magical damage. Lasts %barrier_duration% seconds.
A furred, magic resistant headpiece that is feared by wizards.
Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of spell resistance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_eternal_shroud:
Active: Shroud

Creates a spell shield that absorbs up to %barrier_block% magical damage, converting damage taken into mana. Lasts %barrier_duration% seconds.
A pristine hood that feeds upon strife to empower its owner.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_eternal_shrou: Magic shield that blocks %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_INCOMING_SPELL_DAMAGE_CONSTANT% incoming magic damage, converting damage taken into mana.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_hood_of_defia: Magic shield that blocks %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_INCOMING_SPELL_DAMAGE_CONSTANT% incoming magic damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_hyperstone_Lor: A mystical, carved stone that boosts the fervor of the holder.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_moon_shard_Des:
Use: Consume

Consume the Moon Shard to permanently gain %consumed_bonus% attack speed and %consumed_bonus_night_vision% bonus night vision. Max 1 use.\n

Passive: Shade Sight

Grants bonus night vision.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_moon_shard_Lor: Said to be a tear from the lunar goddess Selemene.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_moon_shard_co: Attack speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% and night vision increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_BONUS_NIGHT_VISION_UNIQUE% after consuming a Moon Shard.
Attack speed and night vision increased after consuming a Moon Shard.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_invis_sword_De:
Active: Shadow Walk

Makes you invisible for %windwalk_duration% seconds, or until you attack or cast a spell. While Shadow Walk is active, you move %windwalk_movement_speed%%% faster and can move through units.

If attacking to end the invisibility, you gain %windwalk_bonus_damage% bonus physical damage on that attack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_invis_sword_Lo: The blade of a fallen king, it allows you to move unseen and strike from the shadows.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_invis_sword_No: If the invisibility ends without attacking, the bonus damage is lost.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_invisibility_: Invisible as the wind. Movement speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and you can move through units. Attacking to break invisibility will deal 175 bonus damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_silver_edge_De:
Active: Shadow Walk

Makes you invisible for %windwalk_duration% seconds, or until you attack or cast a spell. While invisible, you move %windwalk_movement_speed%%% faster and can move through units.

Attacking to end the invisibility will deal %windwalk_bonus_damage% bonus physical damage and a guaranteed %crit_multiplier%%% critical strike to the target, and disable their passive abilities for %backstab_duration% seconds.\n

Passive: Critical Strike

Grants each attack a %crit_chance%%% chance to deal %crit_multiplier%%% damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_silver_edge_Lo: Once used to slay an unjust king, only to have the kingdom erupt into civil war in the aftermath.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_silver_edge_w: Invisible. Movement speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and you can move through units. Attacking to break invisibility will deal %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% bonus damage, slow the target and disable their passives.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_glimmer_cape_D:
Active: Glimmer

After a %fade_delay% second delay, grants invisibility and %active_magical_armor%%% magic resistance to you or a target allied unit for %duration% seconds.

Range: %abilitycastrange%

Can be cast while channelling.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_glimmer_cape_L: The stolen cape of a master illusionist.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_octarine_core_:
Passive: Cooldown Reduction

Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items.
At the core of spellcraft are spectrums only the very gifted can sense.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_enchanted_mang: Hold Control to use on a nearby allied hero.
The bittersweet flavors of Jidi Isle are irresistible to amphibians.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_iron_talon_Des:
Active: Chop

Targets a non-player enemy unit to remove %creep_damage_pct%%% of its current HP.

If cast on a tree, instantly destroys it.

Unit Range: %abilitycastrange%
Tree Range: %abilitycastrange%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_iron_talon_Not: Has a 4 second cooldown on Trees.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_iron_talon_Lor: A simple but effective weapon devised to quell a great Hellbear uprising.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_lotus_orb_Desc:
Active: Echo Shell

Applies a shield to the target unit for %active_duration% seconds which re-casts most targeted spells back to their caster.

The shielded unit will still take damage from the spell.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_lotus_orb_Lore: The jewel at its center still reflects a pale image of its creator.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_lotus_orb_act: Most targeted spells will be re-cast at the caster.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_guardian_greav:
Active: Mend

Restores %replenish_health% health and %replenish_mana% mana to nearby allies, and removes most negative effects from the caster.

Radius: %replenish_radius%
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel\n

Passive: Guardian Aura

Grants %aura_health_regen% health regeneration and %aura_armor% armor to allied units. If an allied hero's health falls below %aura_bonus_threshold%%%, this is increased to %aura_health_regen_bonus% health regeneration and %aura_armor_bonus% armor.

Radius: %aura_radius% \nMovement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
One of many holy instruments constructed to honor the Omniscience.
The aura boost only applies to heroes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_solar_crest_De:
Active: Shine

When cast on an ally, grants them %bonus_armor% armor, %target_attack_speed% attack speed, and %target_movement_speed%%% movement speed. When cast on an enemy, removes %bonus_armor% armor, %target_attack_speed% attack speed, and %target_movement_speed%%% movement speed.

Removes the armor from the caster when used.

Cannot target spell immune enemies.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_solar_crest_Lo: A talisman forged to honor the daytime sky.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_solar_crest_a: Armor reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS%, movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.

Armor increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS%, movement speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, and attack speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_javelin_Descri:
Passive: Pierce

Grants each attack a %bonus_chance%%% chance to pierce through evasion and deal %bonus_chance_damage% bonus magical damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_javelin_Lore: A rather typical spear that can sometimes pierce through an enemy's armor when used to attack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_lesser_crit_De:
Passive: Critical Strike

Grants each attack a %crit_chance%%% chance to deal %crit_multiplier%%% damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_lesser_crit_No: Critical Strike does not work against buildings.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_lesser_crit_Lo: A blade forged from rare crystals, it seeks weak points in enemy armor.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_lifesteal_Desc:
Passive: Lifesteal

Heals the attacker for a percentage of attack damage dealt.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_lifesteal_Lore: A mask that drains the energy of those caught in its gaze.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_voodoo_mask_De:
Passive: Spell Lifesteal

Spell damage dealt to enemy heroes is returned to the caster as health, regardless of spell damage type.

Lifesteal reduced against creeps.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_voodoo_mask_Lo: A mask tuned to sip the arcane bindings that pass between caster and foe.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_sphere_Descrip:
Passive: Spellblock

Blocks most targeted spells once every %block_cooldown% seconds.\n

Active: Transfer Spellblock

Temporarily removes Spellblock from the item's owner and transfers it to an allied unit for %block_cooldown% seconds.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_sphere_Lore: This magical sphere once protected one of the most famous heroes in history.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_sphere_target: The next targeted spell will be blocked.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_maelstrom_Desc:
Passive: Chain Lightning

Grants a %chain_chance%%% chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between %chain_strikes% targets within a %chain_radius% radius, dealing %chain_damage% magical damage to each. Lightning proc pierces evasion.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_maelstrom_Lore: A hammer forged for the gods themselves, Maelstrom allows its user to harness the power of lightning.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_gungir_Descrip:
Active: Eternal Chains

Roots all enemies in a target %radius% radius for %duration% seconds and deals %active_damage% damage.

Range: %abilitycastrange% \n\n

Passive: Chain Lightning

Grants a %chain_chance%%% chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between %chain_strikes% targets within a %chain_radius% radius, dealing %chain_damage% magical damage to each. Lightning proc pierces evasion.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_gungir_Lore: Bindings forged by impossible means to leash an ancient evil.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_warhammer_Desc:
Active: Warhammer

Deals %damage% damage and reduces the target's armor by %armor_reduction% for %duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bullwhip_Descr:
Active: Whip

Grants %speed%%% movement speed when cast on allies, and slows by %speed%%% when cast on enemies. Lasts %duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bullwhip_Lore: Once the favored lash of an infamous broker of pit fighters and other live trade.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_quicksilver_am:
Passive: Quicksilver

Grants you a bonus %bonus_movement%%% movement speed and %bonus_attack% attack speed anytime one of your abilities are on cooldown.
An enchanted talisman brimming with a mysterious substance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_quicksilver_a: Granting bonus movespeed and attack speed while an ability is on cooldown.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_psychic_headba:
Active: Psychic Push

Pushes the target enemy unit away from you %push_length% distance.
A failed experiment in finer telekinetic control, still fit for other ends.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ceremonial_rob:
Passive: Ceremonial Aura

Lowers enemy Status Resistance by %status_resistance%%% and Magic Resistance by %magic_resistance%%%.

Radius: %aura_radius%
One of many items lost in the looting of Zelenwyr's sacred reliquary.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ceremonial_robe_au: Status resistance decreased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_STATUS_RESISTANCE_STACKING%%%, and magic damage increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_BONUS%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_book_of_shadow:
Active: Shadows

Target an enemy, ally or self. Causes the target to become untargetable but also silenced, muted and disarmed for 3 seconds. Applies a Basic Dispel.
An impossible tome filled with unreadable prose of unknowable thoughts.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_book_of_shado: Becomes untargetable, silenced, disarmed and muted.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_giants_ring_De:
Passive: Giant's Foot

Can path over any terrain and deals %pct_str_damage_per_second%%% of your strength per second to units you are standing ontop of.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_giants_ring_Lo: Prized procurement of an otherwise unremarkable ruler of Elze who abdicated his position and vanished.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_vengeances_sha:
Passive: Vengeance's Shadow

Upon death, you spawn a strong-illusion that deals %illusion_outgoing_damage%%% damage and takes %illusion_incoming_damage%%% damage. Can cast all basic spells. Illusion casts %illusion_duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_magic_stick_De:
Active: Energy Charge

Instantly restores %restore_per_charge% health and mana per charge stored.

Max %max_charges% charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within %charge_radius% range uses an ability.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_magic_stick_Lo: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_magic_stick_No: Gains charges for spells cast by visible enemies in 1200 range.
Certain abilities and item abilities will not add charges.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_magic_wand_Des:
Active: Energy Charge

Instantly restores %restore_per_charge% health and mana per charge stored.

Max %max_charges% charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within %charge_radius% range uses an ability.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_magic_wand_Lor: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_magic_wand_Not: Gains charges for spells cast by visible enemies in 1200 range.
Certain abilities and item abilities will not add charges.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_manta_Descript:
Active: Mirror Image

Creates %images_count% images of your hero that last %tooltip_illusion_duration% seconds.

Melee images deal %tooltip_damage_outgoing_melee%%% damage, while Ranged images deal %tooltip_damage_outgoing_ranged%%%. Illusions take %tooltip_damage_incoming_total_pct%%% damage.

Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_manta_Lore: An axe made of reflective materials that causes confusion amongst enemy ranks.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_manta_Note0: Has a %invuln_duration% second cast time during which you are invulnerable.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_manta_Note1: Many effects are removed upon using Manta.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_manta_Note2: Yasha based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mantle_Lore: A beautiful sapphire mantle worn by generations of queens.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mask_of_madnes:
Active: Berserk

Gives %berserk_bonus_attack_speed% attack speed and %berserk_bonus_movement_speed% movement speed, but reduces your armor by %berserk_armor_reduction% and silences you. Lasts %berserk_duration% seconds.\n

Passive: Lifesteal

Heals the attacker for a percentage of attack damage dealt.
Once this mask is worn, its bearer becomes an uncontrollable aggressive force.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_mask_of_madne: Attack speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% and movement speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% but reduces armor by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS% and silences you.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mekansm_Descri:
Active: Restore

Heals %heal_amount% health to allied units in a %heal_radius% radius.\n

Passive: Mekansm Aura

Grants %aura_health_regen% health regeneration to allied units in a %aura_radius% radius.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mekansm_Lore: A glowing jewel formed out of assorted parts that somehow fit together perfectly.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mekansm_Note0: Restore does not affect units that have been affected by Restore in the last 25 seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mekansm_Note1: Multiple instances of Mekansm Aura do not stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_mekansm_nohea: Mekansm Restore and Guardian Greaves Mend will not affect a unit that has recently been healed by Restore or Mend.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mithril_hammer: A hammer forged of pure mithril.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mjollnir_Descr:
Active: Static Charge

Places a charged shield on a target unit for %static_duration% seconds which has a %static_chance%%% chance to release a %static_damage% magical damage shocking bolt at a nearby attacker and %static_strikes% additional enemies.

Range: %abilitycastrange%\n

Passive: Chain Lightning

Grants a %chain_chance%%% chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between %chain_strikes% targets within a %chain_radius% radius, dealing %chain_damage% magical damage to each. Lightning proc pierces evasion.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mjollnir_Lore: Thor's magical hammer, made for him by the dwarves Brok and Eitri.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mjollnir_Note0: Static Charge cannot trigger more than once per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mjollnir_Note1: Static Charge's shock deals magical damage centered on hero with the Static Charge. Static Charge's targets cannot be more than %static_seconary_radius% range away.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mjollnir_Note2: Static Charge procs will not bounce to heroes that are invisible or hidden by Fog of War.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_mjollnir_stat: When attacked, there is a %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP%%% chance that lightning will strike attacker and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% other nearby enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_monkey_king_ba:
Passive: Pierce

Grants each attack a %bonus_chance%%% chance to pierce through evasion and deal %bonus_chance_damage% bonus magical damage.
A powerful staff used by a master warrior.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mystic_staff_L: Enigmatic staff made of only the most expensive crystals.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_necronomicon_D:
Active: Demonic Summoning

Summons a Warrior and an Archer to fight for you for %summon_duration% seconds.

Warrior:

Burns mana every hit, and deals magical damage to whoever kills it. Gains True Sight at level 3.
Health: %warrior_health_tooltip%
Damage: %warrior_damage_tooltip%
Mana Break Damage: %warrior_mana_break_tooltip%
Last Will Damage: %explosion%

Archer:

Has a passive movement and attack speed aura. Gains Purge at Level 3.
Health: %archer_health_tooltip%
Damage: %archer_damage_tooltip%
Aura Move Speed: %archer_move_speed%
Aura Radius: %archer_aura_radius_tooltip%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_necronomicon_L: Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.

Active: Demonic Summoning

Summons a Warrior and an Archer to fight for you for %summon_duration% seconds.

Warrior:

Burns mana every hit, and deals magical damage to whoever kills it. Gains True Sight at level 3.

Damage: %archer_damage_tooltip%
Aura Move Speed: %archer_move_speed%
Aura Radius: %archer_aura_radius_tooltip%
Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.

Active: Demonic Summoning

Summons a Warrior and an Archer to fight for you for %summon_duration% seconds.

Warrior:

Burns mana every hit, and deals magical damage to whoever kills it. Gains True Sight at level 3.
Health: %warrior_health_tooltip%
Damage: %warrior_damage_tooltip%
