Aura Radius: %archer_aura_radius_tooltip%
Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_null_talisman_: A small gemstone attached to several chains.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_whip_Descripti: Whips a target, causing them to move 35% faster for 2 seconds, then slower by 35% for 3.5 seconds. Deals 50 physical damage. Can target allies or enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_oblivion_staff: Deceptively hidden as an ordinary staff, it is actually very powerful, much like the Eldritch who originally possessed it.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_witch_blade_De:
Passive: Witch Blade

Causes your next attack to apply a poison for %slow_duration% seconds, slowing by %slow%%% and dealing %int_damage_multiplier%x your intelligence as damage every second. This attack has True Strike.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_witch_blade_Lo: A spiteful blade inadvertently possessed by the soul of its incautious creator.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_witch_blade_s: Taking damage per second and reducing movement speed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ogre_axe_Lore: You grow stronger just by holding it.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_orchid_Descrip:
Active: Soul Burn

Silences the target unit for %silence_duration% seconds. At the end of the silence, %silence_damage_percent%%% of the damage received while silenced is inflicted as bonus magical damage.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_orchid_Lore: A garnet rod constructed from the essence of a fire demon.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_orchid_malevolence: Silenced. 30%% of damage received while silenced will be inflicted as bonus magical damage at the end of the silence.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_pers_Lore: A gem that grants heart to the bearer.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_phase_boots_De:
Active: Phase

Gives %phase_movement_speed%%% increased movement speed on melee heroes, and %phase_movement_speed_range%%% on ranged heroes, and lets you move through units and turn more quickly for %phase_duration% seconds.\nMovement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_phase_boots_Lo: Boots that allow the wearer to travel between the ether.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_phase_boots_a: Movement speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and allows you to move through units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_pipe_Descripti:
Active: Barrier

Gives a shield that blocks %barrier_block% magic damage to all nearby allies. Lasts %barrier_duration% seconds.

Radius: %barrier_radius%\n

Passive: Insight Aura

Gives allied units %aura_health_regen% health regeneration and %magic_resistance_aura%%% magic resistance.

Radius: %aura_radius%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_pipe_Lore: A powerful artifact of mysterious origin, it creates barriers against magical forces.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_pipe_Note0: Multiple instances of Barrier do not stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_pipe_Note1: Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of magic resistance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_pipe_aura_Des: Regenerating %fMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% HP per second and +%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_BONUS%%% bonus magic resistance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_pipe_barrier_: Magic shield that blocks %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_INCOMING_SPELL_DAMAGE_CONSTANT% incoming magic damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_platemail_Lore: Thick metal plates that protect the entire upper body. Avoid dropping on feet.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_point_booster_: A perfectly formed amethyst that nourishes body and mind when held.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_poor_mans_shie:
Passive: Damage Block

Gives a 100% chance to block %damage_block_melee% damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and %damage_block_ranged% damage on ranged.

Has a %block_chance%%% chance to block damage from creeps.
A busted old shield that seems to block more than it should.
Multiple sources of damage block do not stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_power_treads_D:
Active: Switch Attribute

Switches between +%bonus_stat% Strength, +%bonus_stat% Agility, or +%bonus_stat% Intelligence.\nMovement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_power_treads_N: Power Treads can be built using a Belt of Strength, Band of Elvenskin, or a Robe of the Magi.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_power_treads_L: A pair of tough-skinned boots that change to meet the demands of the wearer.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_quarterstaff_L: A basic staff that allows you to strike quickly.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blitz_knuckles: An underground arcanist's update of a back-alley classic.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_quelling_blade:
Active: Chop Tree

Destroy a target tree.

Cast Range: %abilitycastrange%\n

Passive: Quell

Increases attack damage against non-hero units by %damage_bonus% for melee heroes, and %damage_bonus_ranged% for ranged.
The axe of a fallen gnome, it allows you to effectively maneuver the forest.
Effects of multiple quelling blades do not stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_radiance_Descr:
Toggle: Burn

When active, scorches enemies for %aura_damage% magical damage per second and causes them to miss %blind_pct%%% of their attacks. Illusions deal %aura_damage_illusions% magical damage per second.

Radius: %aura_radius%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_radiance_Lore: A divine weapon that causes damage and a bright burning effect that lays waste to nearby enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_radiance_debu: Taking 60 damage per second, and missing %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MISS_PERCENTAGE%%% of attacks.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_rapier_Descrip:
Passive: Everlasting

Dropped on death, and cannot be destroyed.

Becomes unusable if picked up by an ally of its owner until it is returned to its owner. It is immediately usable by anybody if an enemy of the owner picks it up and is killed. A dropped Rapier cannot be picked up by a courier.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_rapier_Note0: If Divine Rapier is dropped and picked up by an enemy of its original owner, it cannot be dropped again except by death.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_rapier_Lore: So powerful, it cannot have a single owner.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_aeon_disk_Desc:
Passive: Combo Breaker

When you take damage and your health falls below %health_threshold_pct%%%, a strong dispel is applied and you gain a %buff_duration% second buff that provides +%status_resistance%%% Status Resistance and causes all damage you deal and are dealt to be reduced to zero. Only triggers on player based damage. Cooldown increases every time it triggers.

Dispel Type: Strong Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_aeon_disk_lore: A powerful artifact long ago smuggled out of the Ivory Incubarium. Or so many believe.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_aeon_disk_buf: All incoming and outgoing damage negated.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_kaya_lore: The staff of a renowned sorceress, lost for countless millennia.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_kaya_note0: Multiple instances of this item do not stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_reaver_Lore: A massive axe capable of tearing whole mountains down.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_refresher_Desc:
Active: Reset Cooldowns

Resets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_refresher_Lore: A powerful artifact created for wizards.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_relic_Lore: An ancient weapon that often turns the tides of war.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ring_of_basili:
Passive: Basilius Aura

Grants %aura_mana_regen% mana regeneration to allies.

Radius: %aura_radius%
Ring given as a reward to the greatest mages.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_holy_locket_De:
Active: Energy Charge

Target an allied unit to instantly restore %restore_per_charge% health and mana per charge stored.

Max %max_charges% charges. Automatically gains a charge every %charge_gain_timer% seconds and whenever a visible enemy within %charge_radius% range uses an ability.

Passive: Holy Blessing

Amplifies heals you provide by %heal_increase%%%.

Passive: Regeneration Aura

Grants %aura_health_regen% health regeneration to allies.

Radius: %aura_radius%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_holy_locket_Lo: A prized relic long thought lost forever in a failed crusade.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ring_of_health: A shiny ring found beneath a fat halfling's corpse.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ring_of_protec: A glimmering ring that defends its bearer.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ring_of_regen_: This ring is considered a good luck charm among the Gnomes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ring_of_tarras: An ageless ring forged with an otherwise simple blood magic amplified by the presumed source of its key component.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_robe_Lore: This robe corrupts the soul of the user, but provides wisdom in return.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_rod_of_atos_Lo: Atos, the Lord of Blight, has his essence stored in this deceptively simple wand.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_sange_Lore: Sange is an unusually accurate weapon, seeking weak points automatically.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_kaya_and_sange: Two of three known items of unimaginable power that many believe were crafted at the same enchanter's forge.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_yasha_and_kaya: Yasha and Kaya when paired together share a natural resonance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_sange_buff_Descrip: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_heavens_halber:
Active: Disarm

Prevents a target from attacking for %disarm_melee% seconds on melee targets, and %disarm_range% seconds on ranged targets.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
This halberd moves with the speed of a smaller weapon, allowing the bearer to win duels that a heavy edge would not.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_heavens_halberd_bu: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_heavens_halberd_de: Disarmed by Heaven's Halberd, cannot attack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_sange_and_yash: Yasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
Sange and Yasha, when attuned by the moonlight and used together, become a very powerful combination.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_sange_and_yasha_bu: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_satanic_Descri:
Active: Unholy Rage

Increases Lifesteal percentage to %unholy_lifesteal_total_tooltip%%% for %unholy_duration% seconds.

Dispel Type: Basic Dispel \n

Passive: Lifesteal

Heals the attacker for a percentage of attack damage dealt.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_satanic_Lore: Immense power at the cost of your soul.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_sheepstick_Des:
Active: Hex

Turns a target unit into a harmless critter for %sheep_duration% seconds. The target has a base movement speed of %sheep_movement_speed% and will be silenced, muted, and disarmed.
Instantly destroys illusions.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_sheepstick_Not: The target will have a base movement speed of %sheep_movement_speed%, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_sheepstick_Lor: The most guarded relic among the cult of Vyse, it is the most coveted weapon among magi.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_sheepstick_debuff_: You are a pig. Cannot attack or cast spells.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_shivas_guard_D:
Active: Arctic Blast

Emits a freezing wave that deals %blast_damage% magical damage to enemies and slows their movement by %blast_movement_speed%%% for %blast_debuff_duration% seconds.

Radius: %blast_radius%\n

Passive: Freezing Aura

Reduces the attack speed of all enemies by %aura_attack_speed% and all heals, regeneration and lifesteal by %hp_regen_degen_aura%%%.

Radius: %aura_radius%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_shivas_guard_L: Said to have belonged to a goddess, today it retains much of its former power.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_shivas_guard_N: The wave extends at a speed of %blast_speed% to a max size of %blast_radius%.
The Arctic Blast follows its caster.
Multiple instances of Freezing Aura do not stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_shivas_guard_: Attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% and regeneration by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_LIFESTEAL_AMPLIFY_PERCENTAGE%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_skadi_Descript:
Passive: Cold Attack

Attacks lower enemy movement and attack speed and reduces heals, health regeneration, lifesteal and spell lifesteal by %heal_reduction%%% for %cold_duration% seconds. Slows enemy ranged units by %cold_slow_ranged%%% movement speed and by %cold_attack_slow_ranged% attack speed. Slows enemy melee units by %cold_slow_melee%%% movement speed and by %cold_attack_slow_melee% attack speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_skadi_Lore: Extremely rare artifact, guarded by the azure dragons.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_skadi_slow_De: Heals, health regeneration, lifesteal and spell lifesteal reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_LIFESTEAL_AMPLIFY_PERCENTAGE%%%. Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%. Attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_slippers_Lore: Light boots made from spider skin that tingles your senses.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_sobi_mask_Lore: A mask commonly used by mages and warlocks for various rituals.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_soul_ring_Desc:
Active: Sacrifice

Consume %health_sacrifice% health to temporarily gain %mana_gain% mana. Lasts %duration% seconds.

If the mana gained cannot fit in your mana pool, it creates a buffer of mana that will be used before your mana pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_soul_ring_Lore: A ring that feeds on the souls of those who wear it.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_soul_ring_Note: If this mana is not used before the duration ends, the extra mana is lost.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_soul_ring_buf: Mana increased at the cost of health. Extra mana will be lost at the end of Sacrifice's duration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_staff_of_wizar: A staff of magical powers passed down from the eldest mages.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_stout_shield_D:
Passive: Damage Block

Grants a %block_chance%%% chance to block %damage_block_melee% damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and %damage_block_ranged% damage on ranged.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_stout_shield_L: One man's wine barrel bottom is another man's shield.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_stout_shield_N: Multiple sources of damage block do not stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_talisman_of_ev: Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
A necklace that allows you to anticipate enemy attacks.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_tango_Descript:
Use: Devour

Consumes a target tree to gain %health_regen% health regeneration for %buff_duration% seconds. Consuming an Ironwood Tree doubles the heal amount.

Comes with %tooltip_charges% charges. Can be used on an allied hero to give them one Tango.

Tree Range: %abilitycastrange%

Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_broom_handle_L: The surprisingly dangerous creation of an apprentice sorcerer with a strange fondness for brooms.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_trusty_shovel_:
Active: Dig

Channel for %abilitychanneltime% second.
Can find a Bounty Rune, a Flask, an Enchanted Mango, or an enemy Kobold.
Former plaything of a young deity, received as a gift from his uncle.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_nether_shawl_L: An otherworldly garment tethered to our plane by unknown means.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_dragon_scale_D:
Passive: Afterburn

Causes attacks to burn the enemy, dealing %damage_per_sec% damage per second for %duration% seconds. Affects buildings.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_dragon_scale_L: The remains of a dragon always outvalue the wealth of even the most prodigious hoard.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_essence_ring_D:
Active: Life Essence

Increases your current and max health by %health_gain% for %health_gain_duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_essence_ring_L: An ancient bauble blessed by the breath of Verodicia.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_clumsy_net_Des:
Active: Ensnare

Ensnares the target enemy and yourself for %duration% seconds.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_enchanted_quiv:
Passive: Certain Strike

Empowers your next attack with %bonus_damage% bonus magical damage and True Strike. Ranged Attackers have +%bonus_attack_range% bonus range for the attack.
A graceful gift blessed by the goddess of the hunt.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_ninja_gear_Des:
Active: Solitary Disguise

Casts Smoke of Deceit on yourself only.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_ninja_gear_Lor: Valuable equipment recovered by a young explorer sifting through the flotsam and detritus drifting in the void.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_illusionsts_ca:
Active: Create Illusion

Creates an image under your control. \n

Passive: Illusion Mastery

Increases outgoing damage of all units and illusions controlled by the hero by %attack_damage_aura%%%.
A dashing cape whose creator insists on calling 'Cloak of Apparition' as opposed to his assistant's 'Illusion' drivel.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_havoc_hammer_D:
Active: Havoc

Knocks back enemies in %range% range around you, slowing them by %slow%%% for %slow_duration% seconds and dealing %nuke_base_dmg% + %nuke_str_dmg%x your str as magical damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_panic_button_D:
Passive: Rejuvenate

When the wearer's health falls below %health_threshold%%%, they will receive a hard dispel and be healed for %heal% health.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_apex_Lore: Three orbs of remarkable power bound within a single scepter.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_ballista_Descr:
Passive: Knockback

Knocks back enemies %knockback_distance% distance and deals %bonus_damage% pure damage with every attack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_ballista_Lore: A simple design much improved by a master smith's loving hand.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_woodland_strid:
Active: Woodland Stride

Create a path of trees behind you for %active_duration% seconds. Trees last up to %tree_duration% seconds.

Passive: Tree Walking

Removes movement speed limit and allows free pathing through trees. Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_woodland_striders_: Creating a path of trees behind the wearer.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_trident_Descri: Combines Sange, Yasha and Kaya together.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_demonicon_Desc:
Active: Greater Demonic Summoning

Summon 2 sets of Level 3 Necronomicon Units that last %summon_duration% seconds. Units have 100% more health and 75% more damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_demonicon_Lore: A record of the final reckoning. With one page torn out.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_fallen_sky_Des:
Active: Fallen Sky

Transform into a meteor that strikes down at the target area after %land_time% seconds in a %impact_radius% AoE, stunning enemies for %stun_duration% seconds and dealing impact damage. Continues to deal damage every %burn_interval% seconds to enemy units and buildings for %burn_duration% seconds.

Building Impact Damage: %impact_damage_buildings%
Building Over Time Damage: %burn_dps_buildings%

Non-Building Impact Damage: %impact_damage_units%
Non-Building Over Time Damage: %burn_dps_units%

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_fallen_sky_Lor: One of the few surviving creations of the acolytes of the Wyrmforge.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_pirate_hat_Des:
Active: Dig

Channel for %abilitychanneltime% second.
Always finds a Bounty Rune!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_pirate_hat_Lor: A salty skulltopper cursed with endless good fortune.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_dimensional_do:
Active

Teleport instantly anywhere on the map.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_ex_machina_Des:
Active: Reset Cooldowns

Reset the cooldown on all items (except Refresher Orb).
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_ex_machina_Lor: The remains of an ancient universe, preserved within a single sphere.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_faded_broach_L: A life-saving jewel bestowed upon a young queen by a kindly vizier.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_paladin_sword_: The sigil blade of the legendary Brother Yhols of Gausra, stripped from its scabbard on the day of his controversial excommunication.

Passive: Greater Healing

Amplifies the wearer's Regeneration, Healing, Lifesteal and Spell Lifesteal by %bonus_amp%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_minotaur_horn_: The trophy from a mighty beast ambushed and slain in the recesses of its own home.

Active: Lesser Avatar

Grants Spell Immunity for %duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_orb_of_destruc:
Passive: Impeding Corruption

Attacks reduce the target's armor and movement speed. Slow amount varies based on whether the wearer is melee or ranged.
An ingot of chaos suspended in wizard's ether, housed within an arcanist's orb.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_orb_of_destruction: Armor reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS% and movement speed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_the_leveller_L: A demonic blade that struck the final blow to crack the gates of the Sanctum of Solanas.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_titan_sliver_L: Though many desire this brilliant shard for its obvious qualities, a school of study exists to determine the true size and purpose of its incomprehensible whole.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_chipped_vest_D:
Passive

Everytime you are attacked, you return %damage_return_hero% damage to heroes and %damage_return_creep% damage to creeps.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_chipped_vest_L: It doesn't look like much, but it's oddly comfy.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_orb_of_corrosi:
Passive: Corrosion

Dealing %damage% damage per second, reducing armor by %armor%, and slowing movement by %slow_melee%%% if the equipped hero is melee, or by %slow_range%%% if they are ranged.

Lasts for %duration% seconds.
Seepage from the wounds of a warrior deity, sealed in an arcanist's orb following a campaign of vicious slaughter.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_orb_of_corrosion_d: Armor is reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS%. Taking %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% poison damage per second and moving %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% more slowly.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_wizard_glass_D:
Active

Deals %damage% damage to up to %count% random enemy units within %radius%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_gloves_of_trav: Reduces TP cooldown by %tp_cooldown_reduction% seconds and causes TP scrolls to not be consumed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_elven_tunic_Lo: Even simple items of elven make seem imbued with inexplicable efficacy.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_cloak_of_flame:
Passive: Immolate

Burns enemy units for %damage% damage per second. Illusions deal %damage_illusions% damage per second.

Radius: %radius%
A very fine cloak that plays host to an overly-protective living flame.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_trickster_cloa: A fantastic garment immediately misplaced by its creator upon completion.

Active: Cloak

Causes you to become invisible for %duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_gladiator_helm: Upon taking hero damage, you gains %damage% damage, %armor% armor, %movement_speed% for %duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_possessed_mask:
Passive: Lifesteal

Heals the attacker for %lifesteal% HP on each attack.
Even when discarded with specific purpose and great care, this frightening mask always finds its way onto the face of a new owner.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_force_field_De:
Active: Mega Shield

Force Field Aura Grants %active_reflection_pct%%% Damage Reflection for 5 seconds.\n

Passive: Shield

Grants +%bonus_aoe_armor% armor and +%bonus_aoe_mres%%% Magic Resistance to all other allies within %bonus_aoe_radius% radius.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_force_field_Lo: An exquisite piece commissioned by a paranoid monarch who choked on a piece of fruit long before the item saw its intended use.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_force_field_e: Armor increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS% and magic resistance increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_BONUS%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_black_powder_b:
Passive: Hair Trigger

The next time you get attacked by a hero within %radius% range, explode dealing %damage% damage to all enemies within a %radius% radius and causing them to miss %blind_pct%%% of their attacks for %blind_duration% seconds.
One of a set of custom rigs once worn by infamous road agents in the Outlands, its siblings have been lost to misfires and the various tides of time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_ascetic_cap_De:
Passive: Endurance

Whenever a debuff would be applied to the owner, grant %status_resistance%%% Status resistance for %duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_ascetic_cap_Lo: An austere hat thought to be of Turstarkuri origin.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_pogo_stick_Des:
Active: Vault

Propels your hero forward %leap_distance% units. Tumbler's Toy gets disabled for 3 seconds if its owner receives damage from a player source.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_pogo_stick_Lor: An antique plaything found in the ruins of an Ozenja circus bazaar.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_paintball_Desc:
Active: Shadow Brand

Throws a Mark towards an enemy within %abilitycastrange% range applying a debuff that deals %dps% damage every second and provides vision of the unit for %duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_paintball_Lore: Those marked for death by the fae shine brightly to all manner of creatures in the shadow realm.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_heavy_blade_De:
Active: Cleanse

Purge Target Enemy or Ally.\n

Passive: Subjugate

Your attacks deal bonus damage equal to 4% of your target Max Mana.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_heavy_blade_Lo: With ready access to test subjects, untold cruelties have been dreamed up and loosed upon the world from within the walls of the Tyler Estate.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_unstable_wand_:
Active: Pig, Out!

Turns your hero into a critter for %duration% seconds and gives them +10% Movement Speed.
A makeshift charm misplaced by a peace-loving, addlebrained enchanter.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_unstable_wand: You are a pig. Movement Speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%. Cannot attack or cast spells.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_misericorde_De:
Passive: Dark Mercy

Your attacks deal %bonus_damage% more damage to enemies for each %missing_hp%%% HP they are missing.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_misericorde_Lo: An infamous assassin's blade stolen and smuggled out of White Spire after its owner's mysterious demise.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_oakheart_Descr:
Active: Rejuvenate

Target an allied hero and restore %heal% health over %duration% seconds.

If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_stormcrafter_D:
Active: Whirlwind

Cyclones your hero for %cyclone_duration% seconds. \n\n

Passive: Bottled Lightning

Zaps an enemy within %range% range, dealing %damage% damage and a %slow%%% slow for %slow_duration% seconds. Strikes every %interval% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_stormcrafter_L: The accidental byproduct of a spell conjured to entrap a lesser god.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_overflowing_el: Restores %health% health, and %mana% mana over %duration% seconds. Can capture runes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_mysterious_hat: A small token imbued with the fortune of the fae in recognition of an intriguing display of mortal kindness.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_satchel_Descri: Increases XP that you earn by %xp_gain%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_star_mace_Desc:
Passive: Cleave

Melee heroes deal %cleave_damage_percent%%% of attack damage as physical damage in a cone up to %cleave_distance% around the target.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_penta_edged_sw: The final, twisted work of a severely pious blacksmith, completed immediately before the taking of his own life.

Passive: Maim

Each attack has a %maim_chance%%% chance to reduce enemy hero movement speed by %maim_slow_movement%%% and attack speed by %maim_slow_attack% for %maim_duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_penta_edged_sword_: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_vambrace_Lore: The coveted treasure that divided the heirs of Queen Raiya upon her death, resulting in the eventual downfall of her kingdom.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_vambrace_Descr:
Also provides one of the following, based on the Vambrace's main attribute:
 <font color='#ec3d06'>Strength:</font> +%bonus_magic_resistance%%% Magic Resistance 
 <font color='#3ed038'>Agility:</font> +%bonus_attack_speed% Attack Speed 
 <font color='#00d9ec'>Intelligence:</font> +%bonus_spell_amp%%% Spell Amp

Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_halloween_cand: Use: Deposit the candy in your bucket to give all heroes on the map gold and XP, or use it to satisfy a rampaging Roshan's sweet tooth. Get the highest candy in your bucket to win a prize! Carrying candy makes you less healthy, and decreases your max HP.
A strange looking candy, made out of Greevil cream and gummy vitamins.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_candy_drop_De: Holding candy, max health reduced by %fMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP%%%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_roshan_halloween_ap: Roshan launches devastating beams of incineration from the sky at all enemy heroes outside of 400 range, but within 1200 range.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_roshan_halloween_wa: After a delay, Roshan smashes the ground, causing massive radial damage in an area around him, knocking back all enemies.  The closer to Roshan the enemy is, the more damage it takes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_roshan_halloween_to: Roshan tosses a nearby enemy unit at an enemy that is further away.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_roshan_halloween_sh: Roshan becomes immune to physical damage, but takes enhanced magical damage for a brief time.  When Roshan uses Shell, all ability and item cooldowns are refreshed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_roshan_halloween_bu: Roshan breathes a lethal arc of searing fire.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_roshan_halloween_su: Roshan calls a group of Roshlings to aid him.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_roshan_halloween_fi: Roshan launches a number of slow moving fireballs at all nearby enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_roshan_halloween_f: Roshan just ate some candy, you can't feed him yet!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_halloween_roshan_b: You have 3 seconds to give Roshan candy!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_roshan_halloween_s: Roshan is immune to physical damage but taking 400% enhanced magic damage!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_roshan_sugar_rush_: Roshan is waiting for a victim to attack!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_halloween_truce_De: You can't get hurt by other players!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_filler_heal_Descri: Heals %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% hp and restores %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MANA_REGEN_CONSTANT_UNIQUE% mana per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_fountain_aura_buff: Heals %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_PERCENTAGE%%% HP and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MANA_REGEN_TOTAL_PERCENTAGE%%% mana per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_fountain_glyph_Des: This structure is briefly impervious to damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_fountain_invulnera: Invulnerable until issuing a command due to an enemy presence in the base.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_stacked_neutral_De: Killing this stacked creep will provide bonus gold to the stacker.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_backdoor_protectio: Structure takes reduced damage, and quickly regenerates any damage taken while no enemy creeps are nearby.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_watch_tower_allied: This unit will provide 8%% more gold and experience.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_rune_arcane_description: Reduces cooldowns and mana costs by 30%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_rune_illusion_description: Conjures 2 illusions of your hero which deal 35% damage.  Melee illusions take 200% damage.  Ranged illusions take 300% damage.  Illusions last 75 seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_rune_invisibility_descripti: Become invisible for 45 seconds.  This invisibility is broken by attacking or by using an ability or item.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_rune_regeneration_descripti: Regenerates health and mana to maximum.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_rune_xp_description: Grants bonus XP to your team.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_rune_regen_Descrip: Regenerating %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% HP and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MANA_REGEN_CONSTANT% mana per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_rune_arcane_Descri: Reduces cooldowns by 30%% and manacosts by 30%%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_rune_super_arcane_descripti: Reduces cooldowns and mana costs by 60%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_rune_flying_haste_descripti: Increases movement speed to maximum, can path through trees and cliffs.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_rune_super_illusion_descrip: Conjures 4 illusions of your hero which deal 35% damage. Melee illusions take 200% damage. Ranged illusions take 300% damage. Illusions last 75 seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_rune_persistent_invisibilit: Become invisible for 45 seconds. Invisibility will be re-applied after attacking or using an ability.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_rune_super_regeneration_des: Regenerates health and mana to maximum.  Does not break on damage, or end when full.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_rune_flying_haste_: Movement speed increased to maximum, can path through trees and cliffs.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_rune_super_invis_D: Invisibility will be re-applied after attacking or using an ability.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_rune_super_regen_D: Regenerating %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% HP and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MANA_REGEN_CONSTANT% mana per second.  Does not break on damage, or end when full.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_rune_super_arcane_: Reduces cooldowns by 60%% and manacosts by 60%%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_fountain_aura_Desc: Quickly restores Health and Mana of nearby allies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_tower_aura_bonus_D: Armor increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS% and health regeneration by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_tower_aura_Descrip: Armor of nearby friendly heroes increased.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_tower_armor_bonus_: Tower armor increases the more enemy heroes are nearby.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_aegis_regen_descri: The Aegis of the Immortal has expired. Quickly restoring health and mana.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_backdoor_protectio: Structure takes reduced damage, and quickly regenerates any damage taken while no enemy creeps are nearby.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_mutation_killstrea: Each kill increases damage done and taken by 20%. Resets on death.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_throw_snow: Throw a snowball at an ally or enemy.
Hand crafted at the perfect temperature.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_summon_sno: He'll stay friends as long as he can.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_summon_pen: Summon a friendly penguin who slides around. Each time a hero bumps the penguin, it gains speed and lasts a bit longer.
Nothing gets age-old enemies to set aside their differences quite like a penguin to play with.
Your team's penguins will pass through enemy heroes that you don't have vision of.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_decorate_t: Give any tree a delightfully seasonal touch.
Festive trappings for even the bloodiest of battlefields.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_festive_fi: Shoot a firework into the air.
There's nothing more festive than explosions!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_frostivus2018_throw: Throw a snowball at an enemy, damaging and stunning all enemy units around it.\n\nNote: All Frosthaven consumables have a shared cooldown.
Enjoy a bold, rocky center with a packed-ice crust!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_frostivus2018_summo: Summons a snowman that taunts nearby enemies.\n\nNote: All Frosthaven consumables have a shared cooldown.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_frostivus2018_decor: Decorate a tree with blinking lights that damage nearby enemies.\n\nNote: All Frosthaven consumables have a shared cooldown.
Who knew a few twinkling lights could be so deadly?
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_frostivus2018_festi: Fires a global range firework that explodes over a given area, damaging enemies, blinding them, and providing vision for 10 seconds.\n\nNote: All Frosthaven consumables have a shared cooldown.
There's nothing more festive than explosions!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_high_five_Descripti: Throw your hand (or handy appendage) in the air!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_summon_ti9: No one can resist the sky snake's goofy charms.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_ti9_shovel: Dig around the map for buried treasure!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_ti9_monkey: He'll fling filth at your enemies so you don't have to.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_ti9_banner: Plant your personal battle standard to mark this battleground as yours!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ti9_monkey_poop_De: The monkey has expressed its displeasure with your actions.
